aphotic_shield.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Allied UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
aphotic_shield.attrib:
DURATION: 15
MAX DAMAGE ABSORBED: 110 / 140 / 170 / 200
BURST RADIUS: 675
aphotic_shield.desc: Summons dark energies around an ally unit, creating a shield that absorbs a set amount of damage before expiring. When the shield is destroyed it will burst and deal damage equal to the amount it could absorb to an area around it. Removes certain types of negative buffs and stuns on cast.
aphotic_shield.lore: The powers of the black mist rise to absorb attacks like the black mist absorbs light.

borrowed_time.attrib:
HEALTH THRESHOLD: 400
DURATION: 4 / 5 / 6
SCEPTER DURATION: 5 / 6 / 7
SCEPTER DAMAGE REDIRECT: 50%
SCEPTER REDIRECT RANGE: 900
borrowed_time.desc:
When activated, all damage dealt to you will heal instead of harm. Most negative buffs will also be removed. If the ability is not on cooldown, it will automatically activate if your health falls below 400.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
borrowed_time.lore: The most unnatural of all the gifts of the Font of Avernus, this power defies mortal understanding.  What should hurt, instead heals; and what should kill gives strength anew.
borrowed_time.notes: Borrowed Time can be activated while Abaddon is disabled, but not while silenced.

death_coil.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: HeroesDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
death_coil.desc: Abaddon releases a coil of deathly mist that can damage an enemy unit or heal a friendly unit at the cost of some of Abaddon's health.
death_coil.lore: A mysterious vapor from the Font of Avernus now infuses the breath of Abaddon, who releases it at will.

frostmourne.attrib:
DEBUFF DURATION: 2.5
BUFF DURATION: 4.5
MOVEMENT SLOW: 8% / 12% / 16% / 20%
ATTACK SLOW: 8 / 12 / 16 / 20
MOVE SPEED BONUS: 15%
ATTACK SPEED BONUS: 10 / 20 / 30 / 40
frostmourne.desc: Abaddon strikes an enemy with chilling curse on each attack, causing all units who attack the slowed enemy to gain increased movement speed, along with faster attack speed, for a limited time.
frostmourne.lore: The curse that slows an enemy, speeds an ally.

acid_spray.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: PhysicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
acid_spray.attrib:
RADIUS: 625
DURATION: 16
DAMAGE PER SECOND: 15 / 20 / 25 / 30
ARMOR REDUCTION: 4 / 5 / 6 / 7
acid_spray.desc: Sprays high-pressure acid across a target area. Enemy units who step across the contaminated terrain take damage per second and have their armor reduced.
acid_spray.lore: Using traditional Alchemy from the Darkbrew family, Razzil concocts an acid that dissolves even the toughest metals.

chemical_rage.attrib:
DURATION: 25
BASE ATTACK TIME: 1.4 / 1.2 / 1
BONUS HEALTH REGEN: 50 / 75 / 100
BONUS MANA REGEN: 3 / 7.5 / 12
BONUS MOVE SPEED: 30 / 40 / 60
chemical_rage.desc: Alchemist causes his Ogre to enter a chemically induced rage, reducing base attack cooldown and increasing movement speed and regeneration.
chemical_rage.lore: The brew Razzil gave to the Ogre during their prison bust has become a useful potion in the midst of combat.
chemical_rage.notes: Has a 0.35 second transformation time, which can be used to dodge projectiles and stuns.

goblins_greed.attrib:
RECENT KILL WINDOW: 30
BASE BONUS GOLD: 6 / 8 / 10 / 12
EXTRA BONUS GOLD: 3
MAX BONUS GOLD PER KILL: 12 / 20 / 28 / 36
BOUNTY RUNE MULTIPLIER: 3 / 4 / 5 / 6
goblins_greed.desc: Alchemist synthesizes additional gold from his enemies and bounty runes. With each kill, Alchemist earns base bonus gold and extra bonus gold. If Alchemist kills another unit which yields gold within the next 30 seconds, an additional instance of Extra Bonus Gold is added to the total. Additionally, causes bounty runes to yield 3 times their normal gold.
goblins_greed.lore: While it is not a mountain, Razzil has mastered the conversion of smaller compounds to line his pockets.

unstable_concoction.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: PhysicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
unstable_concoction.attrib:
MAX STUN: 1.75 / 2.5 / 3.25 / 4
MAX DAMAGE: 150 / 220 / 290 / 360
EXPLOSION RADIUS: 175
unstable_concoction.desc: Alchemist brews up an unstable concoction that he can throw at an enemy hero, to stun and deal damage in an area around the explosion. The longer the concoction brews, the more damage it deals and the longer the stun. After 5 seconds, the brew reaches its maximum damage and stun time. However, after 5.5 seconds, the concoction will explode on Alchemist himself if not thrown.
unstable_concoction.lore: A silver lining to the failure of turning a mountain into gold, this volatile solution has destructive potential.
unstable_concoction.notes: Alchemist can move and act normally while brewing.A timer above Alchemist's head will indicate the remaining brew time. This timer is visible to enemies.You can deny yourself with this skill.Unstable Concoction cannot be disjointed.Once thrown, Unstable Concoction stops brewing.

unstable_concoction_throw.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy HeroesPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
unstable_concoction_throw.desc: Throw it before it blows up!

alchemist.droles: Carry - Support - Durable - Disabler - Initiator - Nuker

chilling_touch.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
chilling_touch.attrib:
RADIUS: 525
MAX ATTACKS: 3 / 4 / 5 / 6
DAMAGE: 50 / 60 / 70 / 80
ATTACK SPEED: 20
chilling_touch.desc: A frigid gust enchants allied heroes, granting them bonus magical damage for a given number of physical attacks, while slowing their attack speed slightly.  Ancient Apparition always receives the buff. Lasts 30 seconds.
chilling_touch.lore: The Ancient Apparition's eternal knowledge brings a frigid enchantment to his allies.
chilling_touch.notes: Extra damage is its own instance of damage.Only works against heroes and creeps.

cold_feet.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
cold_feet.attrib:
DAMAGE PER TICK: 37.5 / 50 / 62.5 / 75
BREAK DISTANCE: 740 / 740 / 740 / 740
STUN DURATION: 1.25 / 2 / 2.75 / 3.5
CAST RANGE: 700 / 800 / 900 / 1000
cold_feet.desc: Places a frozen hex on an enemy unit that deals damage over time, but can be dispelled by moving away from the initial cast point.  If the enemy unit doesn't move outside of the given range, it will be stunned and frozen in place after 4 seconds.
cold_feet.lore: Kaldr's presence draws those around him into a frozen void, threatening to lock them in an icy prison for eternity.
cold_feet.notes: Total possible damage: 150/200/250/300.Deals damage every 0.8 seconds.

ice_blast.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
ice_blast.attrib:
FROSTBITTEN DURATION: 8 / 9 / 10
FROSTBITTEN DAMAGE PER SECOND: 12.5 / 20 / 32
SHATTER HEALTH THRESHOLD: 10% / 11% / 12%
SCEPTER FROSTBITTEN DURATION: 17
ice_blast.desc:
Launches a tracer toward any location on the battlefield, which must be triggered again to mark the area to be blasted by a damaging explosion of hail. The further the tracer travels, the larger the explosion will be. Enemies caught in the explosion, or who touch the icy ball of hail as it travels, are Frostbitten, taking damage and prevented from regenerating or healing. If a Frostbitten unit's health drops below a certain percentage, they will instantly shatter.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
ice_blast.lore: Ice storms from ages past flow through Kaldr's frosty limbs, crashing into the world and turning its inhabitants into monuments to his eternal power.
ice_blast.notes: The area of effect is 275 + 50*TimeTraveled, capped at 1000.  The freeze area along the path is 275.Kill will be granted to the source of the damage that triggers the shatter.The instant kill doesn't work on illusions.The HP Freeze prevents most kinds of healing, including the fountain.The Frostbitten debuff cannot be purged.

ice_blast_release.desc: Releases the ice blast to explode at the tracer's current location.

ice_vortex.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
ice_vortex.desc: Creates a vortex of icy energy that slows movement speed and increases magic damage done in its range.  Lasts 16 seconds.
ice_vortex.lore: Frozen, caustic winds are at the whim of Kaldr, chilling the field of battle.

blink.desc: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.
blink.lore: In his encounter with the Dead Gods, Anti-Mage learned the value of being elusive.
blink.notes: You can use Blink to dodge incoming projectiles.

mana_break.affects: ABILITY: PassiveDAMAGE TYPE: PhysicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
mana_break.desc:
Burns an opponent's mana on each attack.  Mana Break deals 60% of the mana burned as damage to the target.

Mana Break is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
mana_break.lore: A modified technique of the Turstarkuri monks' peaceful ways is to turn magical energies on their owner.
mana_break.notes: Mana Burn is blocked by spell immunity.You can lifeleech the damage dealt by this skill with a Lifesteal aura.

mana_void.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
mana_void.desc: For each point of mana missing by the target unit, damage is dealt to it and surrounding enemies.  The main target is also mini-stunned.
mana_void.lore: After bringing enemies to their knees, Anti-Mage punishes them for their use of the arcane arts.
mana_void.notes: The stun passes through spell immunity.Damage is calculated based on the primary target's mana, but applied to all enemies within the area of effect.

spell_shield.desc: Increases Anti-Mage's resistance to magic damage.
spell_shield.lore: Years of meditation and obsession with revenge have hardened Anti-Mage's skin against mystical opponents.
spell_shield.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.

flux.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
flux.attrib:
DURATION: 6
DAMAGE PER SECOND: 15 / 30 / 45 / 60
ALLY SEARCH RADIUS: 225
MOVEMENT SPEED SLOW: 35% / 40% / 45% / 50%
CAST RANGE: 600 / 700 / 800 / 900
flux.desc: Infuses a lone enemy unit with swirling, volatile energy, slowing its movement speed and dealing damage over time. The effect is muted if another enemy unit is near the target.
flux.lore: An infinitesimal fraction of the power which imprisoned the Ancients.

magnetic_field.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
magnetic_field.attrib:
RADIUS: 275
DURATION: 3.5 / 4.5 / 5.5 / 6.5
ATTACK SPEED BONUS: 50 / 60 / 70 / 80
EVASION BONUS: 100%
magnetic_field.desc: Generates a circular distortion field of magnetic energy that protects allied heroes and buildings within it by evading attacks coming from outside the field.
magnetic_field.lore: Time and space are of little consequence to one as old as Zet.

spark_wraith.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
spark_wraith.attrib:
SEARCH RADIUS: 375
ACTIVATION DELAY: 2
DURATION: 50
WRAITH SPEED: 400
DAMAGE: 100 / 160 / 220 / 280
PURGE DURATION: 0.4 / 0.5 / 0.6 / 0.7
spark_wraith.desc: Summons a Spark Wraith that slowly materializes and patrols a targeted area until an enemy comes within its range. Once a target has been found the wraith fuses with them, dealing magical damage and purging the unit.
spark_wraith.lore: Lesser fragments of Zet's original self.

tempest_double.desc: Briefly refocusing its fractured elements into a single form, the Arc Warden is able to create a perfect electrical duplication of itself. The duplicate can use all of Arc Warden's current items and spells, except items that drop on death. The duplicate has seperate item and ability cooldowns.
tempest_double.lore: Warped by the power of its peers, Arc Warden becomes what it despises most: disharmony.

battle_hunger.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
battle_hunger.desc: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to be slowed and take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. Axe gains movement speed for each unit affected with Battle Hunger.
battle_hunger.lore: Ordinary heroes cannot withstand Mogul Khan's rage for battle, such that it injures them until it is satisfied.
battle_hunger.notes: Destroying buildings will also remove the debuff.Units affected by Battle Hunger cannot be denied.

berserkers_call.affects: ABILITY: No TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
berserkers_call.desc: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.
berserkers_call.lore: Mogul Khan's warcry taunts opponents into engaging in an unconquerable battle with the Axe.

counter_helix.affects: ABILITY: PassiveDAMAGE TYPE: PurePIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
counter_helix.desc: When attacked, Axe performs a helix counter attack, dealing pure damage to all nearby enemies.
counter_helix.lore: Axe is the only reinforcement this army needs.
counter_helix.notes: Counter Helix triggers when the attack hits.

culling_blade.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
culling_blade.attrib:
KILL THRESHOLD: 250 / 325 / 400
DAMAGE: 150 / 250 / 300
KILL MOVE SPEED BONUS: 30%
KILL ATTACK SPEED BONUS: 30
KILL SPEED DURATION: 6
KILL SPEED RADIUS: 900
SCEPTER COOLDOWN: 6 / 6 / 6
SCEPTER KILL THRESHOLD: 300 / 425 / 550
SCEPTER SPEED DURATION: 10
culling_blade.desc:
Axe spots a weakness and strikes, instantly killing an enemy unit with low health, or dealing moderate damage otherwise. When an enemy hero is killed with Culling Blade, its cooldown is reset, and Axe and nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
culling_blade.lore: Mogul Khan is the embodiment of battle and fury, launching into a gruesome fatality against those who dare engage the Axe in combat.

brain_sap.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: PurePIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
brain_sap.desc: Feasts on the vital energies of an enemy unit, healing Bane and dealing damage.
brain_sap.lore: Atropos finds no greater pleasure than to harvest the fear he creates.

enfeeble.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
enfeeble.desc: Weakens an enemy unit, reducing its physical damage.  Lasts 20 seconds.
enfeeble.lore: Even the mightiest of warriors crumble before the terror of Atropos.

fiends_grip.affects: ABILITY: Channeled, Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
fiends_grip.attrib:
MANA DRAIN: 5%
DURATION: 5 / 5 / 5
DAMAGE: 100 / 155 / 215
SCEPTER MANA DRAIN: 10%
SCEPTER DURATION: 7
SCEPTER DAMAGE: 155 / 215 / 270
fiends_grip.desc:
CHANNELED - Grips an enemy unit, disabling it and causing heavy damage over time, while stealing mana every second based on the unit's maximum mana.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
fiends_grip.lore: Victims of Atropos are frequently torn apart by vivid conjurations of their own nightmares.
fiends_grip.notes: Fiend's Grip will disable and drain mana from Spell Immune units, but not damage them.

nightmare.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: HeroesDAMAGE TYPE: PurePIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
nightmare.desc: Puts the target enemy or friendly Hero to sleep and deals damage per second.  Sleeping units are awakened when attacked, but the Nightmare passes to the attacking unit.  The nightmared unit instantly wakes up if it takes damage.
nightmare.lore: A stolen prowess from the goddess Nyctasha is to put his prey into forever sleep.
nightmare.notes: Nightmare deals damage to allies and himself, so it can be used to deny heroes or himself.Any source of damage except Nightmare will awaken the unit, but only physical attacks cause the Nightmare to be transferred.In the first second of Nightmare, the unit is invulnerable.Bane can wake himself up from Nightmare.

firefly.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
firefly.desc: Batrider takes to the skies, laying down a trail of flames from the air.  The fire damages any enemies it touches, and destroys trees below Batrider. While flying, Batrider gains unobstructed movement and vision.
firefly.lore: When an enemy escapes into the Yama Raskav Jungle, most would cut through the brush to find the fugitive.  Batrider just chooses to destroy the jungle along with his foes.
firefly.notes: During this the Batrider can fly above units, trees and impassable terrain.If duration ends when above impassable terrain, the Batrider can get stuck.The trail persists through Batrider's death.

flamebreak.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
flamebreak.attrib:
DAMAGE PER SECOND: 25 / 30 / 35 / 40
BURN DURATION: 3 / 4 / 5 / 6
TOTAL DAMAGE: 75 / 120 / 175 / 240
RADIUS: 375 / 375 / 375 / 375
flamebreak.desc: Hurls an explosive cocktail that explodes when it reaches the target location, knocking back, briefly stunning, and dealing damage over time to enemies in the area.
flamebreak.lore: A molotov cocktail is the weapon of choice for Batrider.

flaming_lasso.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
flaming_lasso.attrib:
DURATION: 3 / 3.5 / 4
SCEPTER TETHER RANGE: 400
SCEPTER DAMAGE PER SECOND: 100
flaming_lasso.desc:
Lassoes an enemy and drags them in Batrider's wake.  Victims cannot be dragged over impassable terrain. Dragged units cannot move, attack, or use abilities.  Teleporting or blinking will break the lasso.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
flaming_lasso.lore: Few dare to ask to ride on the bat, as Batrider gives them free of charge.
flaming_lasso.notes: Killing the target or the Batrider will break the lasso before its expiration.If Batrider moves more than 400 units in 0.05 seconds the lasso breaks.Disable works on Spell Immune units.Batrider cannot attack while using Flaming Lasso.

sticky_napalm.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
sticky_napalm.attrib:
EXTRA DAMAGE: 10 / 15 / 20 / 25
RADIUS: 375 / 375 / 375 / 375
DURATION: 8 / 8 / 8 / 8
MOVEMENT SLOW: 3% / 5% / 7% / 9%
TURN RATE SLOW: 70% / 70% / 70% / 70%
sticky_napalm.desc: Drenches an area in sticky oil, amplifying damage from Batrider's attacks and abilities and slowing the movement speed and turn rate of enemies in the area.  Additional casts of Sticky Napalm continue to increase damage, up to 10 stacks.  The extra damage is halved against creeps.
sticky_napalm.lore: It's not uncommon to hear the Rider cackle while he increases the flammability of his opponents.
sticky_napalm.notes: All damage from Batrider gets amplified, except for Radiance and Orb of Venom.

call_of_the_wild.attrib:
HAWK HEALTH: 40 / 60 / 80 / 100
HAWK MOVEMENT SPEED: 250 / 275 / 300 / 325
HAWK DAY SIGHT RANGE: 500 / 750 / 1000 / 1250
HAWK NIGHT SIGHT RANGE: 500 / 650 / 800 / 950
HAWK DURATION: 60 / 60 / 60 / 60
call_of_the_wild.desc: Beastmaster calls forth a watchful Hawk to scout the battlefield. At level 3 and beyond, the hawk can become invisible after being still for 4 seconds.
call_of_the_wild.lore: After befriending the strange beast of his childhood, Beastmaster has learned to call to animals in times of need.

call_of_the_wild_boar.attrib:
BOAR HEALTH: 200 / 300 / 400 / 500
BOAR ATTACK DAMAGE: 10 / 25 / 40 / 55
BOAR MOVEMENT SLOW: 10% / 20% / 30% / 40%
BOAR ATTACK SLOW: 10 / 20 / 30 / 40
BOAR POISON DURATION: 3
BOAR DURATION: 60 / 60 / 60 / 60
call_of_the_wild_boar.desc: Beastmaster calls a powerful Boar to stalk the battlefield, capable of spitting poison at enemies to slow their movement and attack speed.
call_of_the_wild_boar.lore: After befriending the strange beast of his childhood, Beastmaster has learned to call to animals in times of need.

inner_beast.desc: Untaps the inner fury of allies, passively increasing their attack speed.
inner_beast.lore: Beastmaster's ability to incite the innate strength of animals was seen in the mauling of the king of Slom.

primal_roar.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
primal_roar.attrib:
STUN DURATION: 3 / 3.5 / 4
DAMAGE: 200 / 250 / 300
SHOUT WIDTH: 300
MOVEMENT SLOW: 50% / 50% / 50%
ATTACK SLOW: 50 / 50 / 50
SLOW DURATION: 2 / 3 / 4
SCEPTER CAST RANGE: 950 / 950 / 950
SCEPTER COOLDOWN: 45 / 45 / 45
primal_roar.desc:
Beastmaster lets loose a deafening roar that stuns, and shoves open, a path to its target. All units in the path of the roar are damaged, while units shoved aside by the roar have their movement and attack speed slowed.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
primal_roar.lore: The Beastmaster has learned to channel his primal instincts into an animalistic roar, causing devastation in the ranks of enemies.
primal_roar.notes: The stun will hit Spell Immune units. The damage will not.

wild_axes.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: PhysicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
wild_axes.desc: Beastmaster sends his axes flying and calls them home again, slicing through enemy units and trees along their path.  Each axe can hit an enemy once.
wild_axes.lore: While learning to maneuver in nature alone, the Beastmaster also mastered the use of a pair of tomahawks, adept at cutting down trees as well as adversaries.
wild_axes.notes: This ability hits Spell Immune units.This ability destroys trees.

blood_bath.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: PurePIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
blood_bath.desc: Bloodseeker baptizes an area in sacred blood. After 3 seconds the ritual completes, causing any enemies caught in the area to take damage and become silenced.
blood_bath.lore: The Flayed Twins are ever willing to aid those who spill blood upon the field of battle.
blood_bath.notes: Total time is a 2.6 second delay plus a 0.4 second cast time.

bloodrage.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: HeroesDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
bloodrage.attrib:
DURATION: 9 / 10 / 11 / 12
DAMAGE INCREASE: 25% / 30% / 35% / 40%
KILL HEAL PERCENTAGE: 19% / 21% / 23% / 25%
bloodrage.desc: Drives a unit into a bloodthirsty rage during which a unit deals, and takes, increased damage. Units affected by Bloodrage will be healed for a percentage of the max health of any units they kill. Units affected by Bloodrage when killed will heal a percentage of their max health to their killer.
bloodrage.lore: Strygwyr shares his animalistic thirst for bloodshed.
bloodrage.notes: Bloodrage can be cast on enemy and allied units, as well as Bloodseeker himself.Only amplifies for half values when the damage dealer and the receiver are over 2200 range apart.

rupture.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: PurePIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
rupture.attrib:
DURATION: 12
MOVE DAMAGE: 20% / 40% / 60%
CAST RANGE: 1000
SCEPTER CHARGES: 2
SCEPTER REPLENISH TIME: 40
rupture.desc:
Causes an enemy unit's skin to rupture. If the unit moves, it takes a percentage of the distance traveled as damage.  The damage is dealt through spell immunity.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
rupture.lore: When the Bloodseeker hunts you, injuries become fatalities.

thirst.attrib:
THIRST HEALTH THRESHHOLD: 75%
MAX THIRST MOVE SPEED: 10% / 20% / 30% / 40%
MAX THIRST DAMAGE: 10 / 20 / 30 / 40
VISIBILITY HEALTH THRESHHOLD: 25%
thirst.desc: Bloodseeker is invigorated by the wounds of his enemies, gaining bonus movement speed and attack damage whenever an enemy hero's health falls below 75%, with the bonuses increasing as their health falls further. If an enemy hero's health falls below 25%, he will also gain vision and True Sight of that hero. Bonuses stack per hero.
thirst.lore: Strygwyr becomes frenzied when blood is spilled.
thirst.notes: Not triggered by Illusions.Max movement speed and attack damage bonuses occur when an enemy's health is at or below 25%.

jinada.attrib:
CRITICAL DAMAGE: 150% / 175% / 200% / 225%
MOVE SLOW: 15% / 20% / 25% / 30%
ATTACK SLOW: 15 / 20 / 25 / 30
DURATION: 3 / 3 / 3 / 3
jinada.desc: Bounty Hunter plans his next hit, passively adding a critical strike and maim to his next attack.
jinada.lore: Whispering an enchantment he learned from Soruq to his faithful blades, Gondar targets vital tendons and joints to disable his opponents.

shuriken_toss.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
shuriken_toss.desc: Hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing damage and mini-stunning the target.  The shuriken will bounce between any Tracked units who are within a 1200 radius of each other.
shuriken_toss.lore: While the shuriken may be small, Gondar's precise aim can cause critical damage.

track.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy HeroesPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
track.attrib:
SPEED RADIUS: 900 / 900 / 900
BONUS SPEED: 20% / 20% / 20%
BONUS GOLD FOR SELF: 170 / 260 / 350
BONUS GOLD FOR ALLIES: 40 / 80 / 120
DURATION: 30 / 30 / 30
CAST RANGE: 1200
track.desc: Tracks an enemy hero, granting True Sight of the target, and information on how much gold it is carrying. Allies near the hunted are granted bonus movement speed. If the target dies, Bounty Hunter and nearby heroes collect a bonus bounty of gold.
track.lore: Using his elevated senses of sight and smell, Gondar's hits have quite a good chance of success.
track.notes: Bounty Hunter will get the bonus gold if the target dies while Track is active, regardless of how it died.Track's effect is only visible to allies.The allies that are receiving the bonus speed from Track are the ones that will receive the bonus gold.Bonus gold is reliable gold.

wind_walk.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: PhysicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
wind_walk.desc: Bounty Hunter becomes invisible and gains the ability to move through other units until he attacks or uses an ability.  If he breaks the invisibility with an attack, that attack will deal bonus damage.
wind_walk.lore: The court jesters present during King Goff's assassination can recount no other image than a dancing shadow.
wind_walk.notes: Will not break most channeling of spells upon activation.The bonus damage is a separate instance, and isn't considered in Jinada's calculation.

drunken_brawler.attrib:
DODGE CHANCE: 10% / 15% / 20% / 25%
CRIT CHANCE: 10% / 15% / 20% / 25%
CRIT DAMAGE: 200%
CERTAIN TRIGGER TIMER: 16 / 14 / 12 / 10
drunken_brawler.desc:
Gives a chance to avoid attacks and to deal critical damage. Drunken Brawler will always trigger if you have not attacked, or have not been attacked, in the last several seconds.

Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
drunken_brawler.lore: When Mangix won his title as the Brewmaster of the Order of Oyo, he also claimed his place in the mastery of inebriation.
drunken_brawler.notes: The guaranteed critical attack and guaranteed dodge chance are on separate timers.

drunken_haze.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
drunken_haze.attrib:
RADIUS: 200
HERO DURATION: 8 / 8 / 8 / 8
CREEP DURATION: 12 / 12 / 12 / 12
MOVEMENT SLOW: 14% / 18% / 22% / 26%
MISS CHANCE: 45% / 55% / 65% / 75%
drunken_haze.desc: Drenches a small area in alcohol, causing their movement speed to be reduced, and causing their attacks to have a chance to miss.
drunken_haze.lore: The Order of the Oyo's solution to all problems - another round!

primal_split.desc:
Splits Brewmaster into elements, forming 3 specialized warriors, adept at survival. If any of them survive until the end of their summoned timer, the Brewmaster is reborn.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
primal_split.lore: It isn't clear whether Mangix is consciously aware of his potent bond with nature, as it often occurs in the midst of a drunken stupor.
primal_split.notes: The Earth Element will carry all auras that the Brewmaster has, as well as True Sight.The Fire Element has phased movement.When the spell ends, Brewmaster will take the place of an element in this order, assuming they are alive: Earth, Storm, Fire.

thunder_clap.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
thunder_clap.attrib:
RADIUS: 400 / 400 / 400 / 400
DAMAGE: 100 / 175 / 250 / 300
MOVEMENT SLOW: 25% / 35% / 45% / 55%
ATTACK SLOW: 25 / 35 / 45 / 55
HERO DURATION: 4
CREEP DURATION: 8 / 8 / 8 / 8
thunder_clap.desc: Slams the ground, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed and attack rate of nearby enemy land units.
thunder_clap.lore: A slam of Mangix' mighty keg starts the festivities.

bristleback.attrib:
SIDE DAMAGE REDUCTION: 8% / 12% / 16% / 20%
BACK DAMAGE REDUCTION: 16% / 24% / 32% / 40%
DAMAGE THRESHOLD: 210
bristleback.desc: Bristleback takes less damage if hit on the sides or rear.  If Bristleback takes 210 damage from the rear, he releases a Quill Spray of the current level.
bristleback.lore: Turning his back to a fight might be just the thing.
bristleback.notes: Bristleback's rear is considered to be within 70 degrees from the back.Bristleback's side is considered to be within 110 degrees from the back.

quill_spray.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: PhysicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
quill_spray.attrib:
RADIUS: 625
QUILL BASE DAMAGE: 20 / 40 / 60 / 80
QUILL STACK DAMAGE: 30 / 32 / 34 / 36
STACK DURATION: 14
MAX DAMAGE: 450
quill_spray.desc: Sprays enemy units with quills dealing damage in an area of effect around Bristleback.  Deals bonus damage for every time a unit was hit by Quill Spray in the last 14 seconds.
quill_spray.lore: An enforcer's honor can be a prickly thing.  So can his quills.
quill_spray.notes: Quill Spray damage is not reduced by damage block abilities.

viscous_nasal_goo.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
viscous_nasal_goo.attrib:
DURATION: 5
ARMOR LOSS: 1 / 1.4 / 1.8 / 2.2
BASE MOVEMENT SLOW: 20%
MOVE SLOW PER STACK: 3% / 6% / 9% / 12%
STACK LIMIT: 4
SCEPTER RADIUS: 700
viscous_nasal_goo.desc:
Covers a target in snot, causing it to have reduced armor and movement speed.  Multiple casts stack and refresh the duration.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
viscous_nasal_goo.lore: Having caught a cold while stuck in the snow, Bristleback turns it to his advantage.

warpath.attrib:
DAMAGE PER STACK: 20 / 25 / 30
MOVEMENT PER STACK: 3% / 4% / 5%
STACK DURATION: 14
MAX STACKS: 5 / 6 / 7
warpath.desc:
Bristleback works himself up into a fury every time he casts a spell, increasing his movement speed and damage.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
warpath.lore: 'Temper, temper,' his mum always chided.  But in a fight, a temper can come in handy.
warpath.notes: Bristleback's illusions will receive the bonuses.Items will not trigger Warpath.

incapacitating_bite.desc: Broodmother's venom cripples enemy units, causing her attacks to slow and giving the affected unit a chance to miss its attacks.
incapacitating_bite.lore: Paralytic toxins come from Black Arachnia's fangs, causing a slow and painful death to those who intrude on her webs.
incapacitating_bite.notes: The miss chance stacks with evasion and terrain dodge chance.

insatiable_hunger.desc: A violent lust for vital fluids increases Broodmother's attack damage and gives her a vampiric attack.
insatiable_hunger.lore: While most of her prey is wrapped in silken cocoons and saved for her young, the Broodmother herself has a taste for wandering heroes.
insatiable_hunger.notes: Fully stacks with other sources of lifesteal.Insatiable hunger can be removed by purge effects.

spawn_spiderlings.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
spawn_spiderlings.desc: Broodmother injects her young into an enemy unit, dealing damage. The spiderlings will hatch if the target is killed while under this influence.
spawn_spiderlings.lore: Black Arachnia continues to raise her young, even amidst the field of combat.  The brood quickly learns how to support their mother.
spawn_spiderlings.notes: If the target is killed within 2 seconds of being hit with this skill, the Spiderlings will spawn.Units killed by Spiderlings will then give birth to Spiderites, smaller and less powerful versions of the Spiderlings.

spin_web.attrib:
MAX WEBS: 2 / 4 / 6 / 8
HEALTH REGEN: 2 / 4 / 6 / 8
MOVE INCREASE: 40% / 50% / 60% / 70%
MAX WEB CHARGES: 1 / 2 / 3 / 4
CHARGE RESTORE TIME: 40
spin_web.desc: Spins a large web that renders Broodmother invisible, grants a passive movement speed increase, gives free movement, and boosts regeneration while in its vicinity. Spin Web charges restore every 40 seconds. If damage is taken, free movement is disabled and the movement speed increase is halved for 6 seconds. Spin Web can be cast from anywhere as long as the new web touches an existing web. Webs never expire, and can be manually destroyed. When the maximum limit of webs is exceeded, the oldest web disappears.
spin_web.lore: Weaving a bed of silken fibers, Arachnia's web both protects her and her offspring, as well as giving advancing opponents a sense of forboding.
spin_web.notes: Has a fade time of 2 seconds.Also affects Spiderling and Spiderites.If free movement is disabled, you will destroy nearby trees.

double_edge.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
double_edge.desc: Centaur strikes a mighty blow at melee range, damaging both himself and a small area around the target.  Centaur cannot die from Double Edge.
double_edge.lore: In the spurs of combat, Bradwarden's vicious strikes sometimes cause self-inflicted collateral damage.
double_edge.notes: Double Edge deals magic type damage to both the targets and himself.

hoof_stomp.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
hoof_stomp.desc: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy units.
hoof_stomp.lore: When the mighty hoof of the Warrunner touches soil, the tremors are felt far and wide.

return.affects: ABILITY: PassiveDAMAGE TYPE: PhysicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
return.desc: Centaur counters every attack, damaging the attacker based on a percentage of Centaur's strength.
return.lore: Bradwarden has no need to parry his opponent's attacks; his armor-like hide does it for him.
return.notes: Return triggers when the attack hits.Return deals damage to towers.

stampede.affects: ABILITY: No TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
stampede.attrib:
STAMPEDE DURATION: 4
STRENGTH MULTIPLIER DAMAGE: 1 / 2 / 3
STOP DURATION: 1.5
TRAMPLE RADIUS: 105
SCEPTER DAMAGE REDUCTION: 60%
stampede.desc:
Centaur leads all allies into a vicious charge causing them to move through units at max speed and stop any enemy units they trample. Trampled enemies take damage based on Centaur Warrunner's strength. Each enemy can be trampled once.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
stampede.lore: The great belt of Omexe, which labels Bradwarden as the greatest warrior of his kind, incites his fellow gladiators to follow him into barbarous combat.

chaos_bolt.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
chaos_bolt.attrib:
MINIMUM STUN: 1 / 1 / 1 / 2
MAXIMUM STUN: 2 / 3 / 4 / 4
MINIMUM DAMAGE: 75 / 100 / 125 / 150
MAXIMUM DAMAGE: 200 / 225 / 250 / 275
chaos_bolt.desc: Throws a mysterious bolt of energy at the target unit. It stuns for a random duration and deals random damage.
chaos_bolt.lore: Even Chaos Knight cannot predict this manifest of unholy energy.
chaos_bolt.notes: The stun duration and damage values dealt are inversely related.

chaos_strike.attrib:
CRITICAL CHANCE: 10% / 10% / 10% / 10%
CRITICAL DAMAGE: 125% / 175% / 225% / 275%
ARMOR REDUCTION: 5
REDUCTION DURATION: 8
chaos_strike.desc: Each of Chaos Knight's attacks has a chance to deal bonus damage and reduce the target's armor by 5 for 8 seconds.
chaos_strike.lore: Chaos Knight's unwieldy power bludgeons those who stand before him, crushing the thickest of armors.
chaos_strike.notes: The armor reduction debuff is applied before the damage occurs, similar to Desolator.Illusions can apply the armor reduction debuff, however it does not stack.

phantasm.attrib:
NUMBER OF PHANTASMS: 1 / 2 / 3
EXTRA PHANTASM CHANCE: 50%
PHANTASM DURATION: 42
PHANTASM DAMAGE: 100% / 100% / 100%
PHANTASM DAMAGE TAKEN: 200%
phantasm.desc: Summons several phantasmal copies of the Chaos Knight from alternate dimensions. There is a 50% chance an extra phantasm will be summoned. The phantasms deal full damage, but take double damage.
phantasm.lore: Drawing on his battles fought across many worlds and many times, phantasms of the Chaos Knight rise up to quell all who oppose him.
phantasm.notes: Removes most negative buffs from Chaos Knight.Chaos Knight is invulnerable for 0.5 seconds when casting, allowing him to dodge stuns and damage.

reality_rift.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
reality_rift.desc: Teleports you, any images you have and the target unit to a random point along the line between the two of you. Gives you bonus attack damage for one attack.
reality_rift.lore: Armageddon rides between the planes, bringing Chaos Knight to his victim wherever he may hide.
reality_rift.notes: Chaos Knight and the target unit are made to face each other, and Chaos Knight and his phantasms are issued an attack order against the target.

hand_of_god.affects: ABILITY: No TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
hand_of_god.desc:
Heals all allied heroes on the map as well as all units under Chen's control.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
hand_of_god.lore: Using the mental link with his thralls, Chen calls down restoration and well-being to those who share his fanaticism.

holy_persuasion.desc:
Chen takes control of an enemy or neutral creep. If the persuaded creep's base health is naturally below the health minimum, its base health will be raised to the health minimum.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter, allowing Chen to persuade Ancient Creeps. The number of Ancient Creeps that can be persuaded is based on the level of Hand of God.
holy_persuasion.lore: Although they may not be knights, Chen incorporates beasts into the Fold in the same way he himself was converted.
holy_persuasion.notes: You may only cast this ability on Ancient Creeps with Aghanim's Scepter.When persuading a new creep above your max unit count, the oldest persuaded unit will die.The health of creeps that are currently persuaded will not be increased further if more levels are added to the skill.

penitence.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
penitence.desc: Forces an enemy unit to move slower and take more damage from attacks and spells.
penitence.lore: Although Chen's brand of animal enthrallment isn't quite strong enough to control the minds of enemy heroes, it still tests their resolve in combat.

test_of_faith.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: PurePIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
test_of_faith.desc: Deals random damage to test an enemy unit's faith.
test_of_faith.lore: Knights of the Fold possess a fanatical form of magic that is considered quite unwieldy by most other users of arcane arts.

test_of_faith_teleport.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Allied UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
test_of_faith_teleport.desc: Teleports an allied unit back to the base.  Creeps are teleported instantly, while Heroes have a delay before teleporting. If cast on Chen, all units controlled by Chen through Holy Persuasion will be teleported to him after a delay.

death_pact.desc: Clinkz consumes the target friendly or enemy creep, gaining a percent of its hitpoints as max health and damage.
death_pact.lore: Sutherex' bond of life and death has become a part of Clinkz, and his old bones are refreshed with repetition of the pact on lesser beings.
death_pact.notes: If the target is an enemy, Clinkz will gain the correct experience and gold.Increases Clinkz' current and max HP.When the duration ends, max HP returns to normal, but current HP stays the same.

g_caustic_finale.affects: ABILITY: PassiveDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
g_caustic_finale.attrib:
EXPLODE RADIUS: 400
EXPLODE DEATH DAMAGE: 90 / 130 / 170 / 220
EXPLODE TIMER DAMAGE: 45 / 65 / 85 / 110
EXPLODE TIMER: 6
MOVE SLOW: 30%
SLOW DURATION: 3
g_caustic_finale.desc:
Sand King's attacks inject a venom that causes enemy units to violently explode when its timer expires, or when the unit dies, damaging and slowing nearby enemies. Deals 50% damage if its timer expires.

Caustic Finale is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifier.
g_caustic_finale.lore: An injection from Crixalis makes one brittle and as dry as the arid wastes, subject to implosive demise.
g_caustic_finale.notes: Units afflicted with the debuff will explode even if Sand King did not deliver the killing blow.The buff is not placed on allied units.

searing_arrows.affects: ABILITY: Auto-Cast, Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: PhysicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
searing_arrows.desc: Imbues Clinkz's arrows with fire for extra damage.
searing_arrows.lore: Clinkz simply lights his arrows from his flaming essence for quite the destructive effect.
searing_arrows.notes: Searing Arrows deal damage to structures.The damage is directly added to Clinkz' attack damage, as physical damage.

strafe.desc: Clinkz attacks with a barrage of arrows.  Dramatically increases attack speed for a short time.
strafe.lore: It's hard to say whether the blur around the Bone Fletcher is from his flaming heart or his speed with the quiver.

wind_walk.desc: Clinkz moves invisibly through units until the moment he attacks or uses an ability.
wind_walk.lore: With a burst of fire and puff of smoke, the Bone Fletcher was nowhere to be seen.
wind_walk.notes: Will not break most channeling of spells or items upon activation.Has a fadetime of 0.6 seconds.

brilliance_aura.attrib:
ALLY MANA REGEN: 1 / 1.5 / 2 / 3
SELF MANA REGEN: 2 / 3 / 4 / 8
brilliance_aura.desc: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. This bonus is increased for Crystal Maiden.
brilliance_aura.lore: Cold temperatures promote the essence of magic, causing Rylai's presence to allow spell usage in abundance.
brilliance_aura.notes: Stacks with other flat mana regeneration bonuses.The flat mana regeneration bonus is not considered for percentage mana regeneration increases.

crystal_nova.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
crystal_nova.attrib:
RADIUS: 400
MOVEMENT SLOW: 20% / 30% / 40% / 50%
ATTACK SLOW: 20 / 30 / 40 / 50
DURATION: 4.5
crystal_nova.desc: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.
crystal_nova.lore: The air temperature around Rylai drops rapidly, chilling all around her to the core.

freezing_field.affects: ABILITY: No Target, ChanneledDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
freezing_field.attrib:
RADIUS: 835
EXPLOSION RADIUS: 300
MOVEMENT SLOW: 30%
ATTACK SLOW: 30
DAMAGE: 105 / 170 / 250
SCEPTER DAMAGE: 170 / 250 / 310
SCEPTER MOVEMENT SLOW: 50%
SCEPTER ATTACK SLOW: 50
freezing_field.desc:
CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage.  Lasts 10 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
freezing_field.lore: Once the place of her exile, Icewrack has become an anchor for Rylai's frigid onslaught.
freezing_field.notes: The slow is applied on all enemies in the radius, even if they aren't hit by an explosion (lasts 1 second).Every 0.1 second an explosion occurs, for a total of 100 explosions.

frostbite.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
frostbite.attrib:
DAMAGE PER HALF-SECOND: 50
HERO DURATION: 1.5 / 2 / 2.5 / 3
HERO TOTAL DAMAGE: 150 / 200 / 250 / 300
CREEP DURATION: 10 / 10 / 10 / 10
CREEP TOTAL DAMAGE: 1000
frostbite.desc: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing 50 damage every half-second. Lasts 10 seconds on creeps level 6 or lower.
frostbite.lore: Rylai channels winds from the Blueheart Glacier, imprisoning attackers in thick blocks of ice.
frostbite.notes: Blink abilities cannot be used while under the affects of Frostbite.

ion_shell.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: HeroesDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
ion_shell.desc: Surrounds the target unit with a bristling shield that damages enemy units in an area around it.
ion_shell.lore: The Dark Seer slices holes into the 'Land Behind the Wall,' causing prismatic energy to seep forth.
ion_shell.notes: Deals small amounts of damage in 0.1 intervals.Doesn't damage the target it is cast on.If cast on a unit that already has Ion Shell, the new Shell replaces the old one.

surge.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Allied UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
surge.desc: Charges a target friendly unit with power, giving it a brief burst of maximum movement speed.
surge.lore: Ish'Kafel once used his speed of mind to navigate the maze between the walls.
surge.notes: Units with Surge cannot be slowed unless the Surge effect is removed.

vacuum.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
vacuum.desc: Dark Seer creates a vacuum over the target area that sucks in enemy units, disrupting them and dealing damage.
vacuum.lore: Ish'Kafel modifies the center of gravity to a place of his choosing.
vacuum.notes: This ability interrupts channeling.Pulls units over 0.5 seconds before dealing damage.Doesn't pull invulnerable units.Trees near the center of the vacuum will be destroyed.

wall_of_replica.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
wall_of_replica.attrib:
WALL DAMAGE: 150 / 150 / 150
WALL DURATION: 45
REPLICA DAMAGE: 60% / 75% / 90%
REPLICA DAMAGE TAKEN: 400% / 400% / 400%
CAST RANGE: 500 / 900 / 1300
SCEPTER REPLICA DAMAGE: 100% / 120% / 140%
wall_of_replica.desc:
Raises a wall of warping light that damages and creates replicas of any enemy hero who crosses it. Enemy replicas serve at the Dark Seer's will. Replicas last until they are destroyed, or until the wall's duration ends.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
wall_of_replica.lore: The Dark Seer, while unable to return to his natural realm, can channel part of the prismatic wall with powerful strength of mind, sowing confusion amongst enemy ranks.
wall_of_replica.notes: Doesn't create illusions from other illusions, or Meepo clones.Creates a wall 1000 units long, perpendicular to the line between Dark Seer and the target point.

poison_touch.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: PhysicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
poison_touch.desc:
Casts a poisonous spell on an enemy unit, gradually slowing movement, and causing damage over time.
LEVEL 1 - Slows the target by 33% for 3 seconds.
LEVEL 2 - Slows the target by 33% for 2 seconds, then by 66% for 1 second.
LEVEL 3 - Slows the target by 33%, 66%, and 100%, for 1 second each.
LEVEL 4 - Slows the target by 33% for 1 second, then 66% for 1 second, then stuns for 1 second.
poison_touch.lore: One of the few Dezun rites used for offensive purposes, the paralytic enchantment often proves useful.
poison_touch.notes: The damage is not reduced by damage block abilities.

shadow_wave.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Allied UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: PhysicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
shadow_wave.attrib:
HEAL ARC RADIUS: 475
DAMAGE RADIUS: 185
MAX HEAL TARGETS: 4 / 5 / 6 / 7
shadow_wave.desc: Sends out a bolt of power that arcs between allies, healing them while damaging any units standing nearby.  Dazzle is always healed by Shadow Wave.
shadow_wave.lore: While it is a simplistic and routine rite among Shadow Priests, the Shadow Wave is also the most critical for success.
shadow_wave.notes: Prioritizes allied heroes over creeps.If enemies are near multiple allied units affected by Shadow Wave, they will take multiple instances of damage.

shallow_grave.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Allied HeroesPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
shallow_grave.desc: An ally blessed with Shallow Grave, no matter how close to death, cannot die while under its protection.
shallow_grave.lore: Only a seasoned acolyte of the Shadow can properly perform the rite of preventing death.
shallow_grave.notes: HP cannot go below 1 while under the effects of Shallow Grave, but Axe's Culling Blade will still kill the hero.

weave.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
weave.attrib:
RADIUS: 575 / 575 / 575
ARMOR PER SECOND: 0.75 / 1 / 1.25
DURATION: 24
SCEPTER RADIUS: 775 / 775 / 775
SCEPTER ARMOR PER SECOND: 1.25 / 1.5 / 1.75
weave.desc:
Applies a buff that increases the armor of allied heroes while decreasing the armor of enemy heroes in the target area over time.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
weave.lore: His ethereal journey into the Nothl realm has allowed Dazzle to mend together the powers of light and dark, creating shifting waves of enchantments.
weave.notes: Places a buff on units, so entering or leaving the area after the cast has no effect.

carrion_swarm.affects: ABILITY: Unit Target, Point TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
carrion_swarm.desc: Sends a swarm of winged beasts to savage enemy units in front of Death Prophet.
carrion_swarm.lore: Krobelus' many trips to the grave gather a flock of the damned.
carrion_swarm.notes: Can hit units up to 1110 range away.

exorcism.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: PhysicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
exorcism.attrib:
RADIUS: 700 / 700 / 700
SPIRITS: 8 / 16 / 24
LIFE DRAIN: 25% / 25% / 25%
SPIRIT DAMAGE: 55 / 55 / 55
exorcism.desc: Unleashes evil spirits to drain the life of nearby enemy units and structures. At the end of the spell's duration, Death Prophet is healed in proportion to the damage dealt.  Lasts 35 seconds.
exorcism.lore: Over time, the banshee remnants of her previous lives return to haunt the present.
exorcism.notes: Radius represents the area in which the spirits will acquire targets around Death Prophet.Spirit damage isn't reduced by damage block abilities.

silence.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
silence.desc: Prevents enemy units in a target area from casting spells.
silence.lore: Peering into the veil of her opponent's demise, Krobelus sees a silent future.

spirit_siphon.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
spirit_siphon.attrib:
BASE DAMAGE: 25
MAX HP AS DAMAGE: 1% / 2.5% / 4% / 5.5%
DURATION: 6
ENEMY SLOW: 5% / 10% / 15% / 20%
MAX CHARGES: 1 / 2 / 3 / 4
CHARGE RESTORE TIME: 45
spirit_siphon.desc: Creates a spirit link between Death Prophet and an enemy unit, draining 25 + 1% Max HP per second and slowing the enemy's movement speed by 5%.
spirit_siphon.notes: Cannot cast multiple on same target.

glimpse.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy HeroesPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
glimpse.desc: Teleports the target hero back to where it was 4 seconds ago.  Instantly kills illusions.
glimpse.lore: Playing with electricity can have unexpected results.
glimpse.notes: The travel time is a function of the distance the target will travel.

kinetic_field.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
kinetic_field.desc: After a short formation time, creates a circular barrier of kinetic energy that enemies can't pass.
kinetic_field.lore: The stryder is immune to the gale-force winds that will consume its adversaries.
kinetic_field.notes: Spell Immune units can travel through the field.

static_storm.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
static_storm.attrib:
RADIUS: 450
PULSES: 20
MAX DAMAGE PER SECOND: 200 / 250 / 300
DURATION: 5
SCEPTER DURATION: 7
SCEPTER PULSES: 28
static_storm.desc:
Creates a damaging static storm that also silences all enemy units in the area for the duration.  The damage starts off weak, but increases in power over the duration.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
static_storm.lore: A summer squall in Druud is a hardship that only an Oglodi can survive.

thunder_strike.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
thunder_strike.desc: Repeatedly strikes the targeted unit with lightning.  Each strike damages nearby enemy units in a small radius.  Provides vision of its target.
thunder_strike.lore: Disruptor's charged coils occasionally overload, and a singed armor plate or tuft of fur is the enemy's result.

devour.desc: Consumes an enemy or neutral creep, acquiring any special abilities that it possessed.
devour.lore: Lucifer's appetite and greed are never sated.
devour.notes: Gives Doom the original bounty of the creep, along with the bonus gold.The amount of time it takes to Devour depends on the current HP of the unit.Doom can't Devour mechanical or ancient units.If you devour a creep without abilities, you'll keep the abilities you had previously.

doom.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: PurePIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
doom.attrib:
DURATION: 15
DAMAGE PER SECOND: 20 / 35 / 50
SCEPTER DURATION: 16
doom.desc:
Inflicts a curse that prevents an enemy Hero from casting spells or using items, while taking damage over time.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
doom.lore: When a name is tolled from the bell of Vashundol, doom is sure to follow.
doom.notes: Units afflicted by Doom can be denied when their HP drops below 25%.

infernal_blade.affects: ABILITY: Auto-Cast, Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
infernal_blade.attrib:
BASE BURN DAMAGE: 25 / 30 / 35 / 40
MAX HP AS DAMAGE: 1.25% / 2.5% / 3.75% / 5%
BURN DURATION: 4
STUN DURATION: 0.3
infernal_blade.desc: Doom swings his burning sword, igniting the enemy. Stuns for 0.3 seconds and applies a 4 second burn that deals 25 + 1.25% of the target's Max HP as damage per second.
infernal_blade.lore: Lucifer shares the fire branding bestowed upon him at the time of his exile.

scorched_earth.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
scorched_earth.attrib:
DAMAGE/REGEN: 10 / 20 / 30 / 40
RADIUS: 600 / 600 / 600 / 600
BONUS MOVE SPEED: 14%
DURATION: 10 / 12 / 14 / 16
scorched_earth.desc: Carpets the nearby earth in flames which damage enemies and heal Doom, while also granting him increased movement speed.
scorched_earth.lore: The Fallen One spreads destruction in his wake, sparing none from the flame which sustains him.
scorched_earth.notes: Scorched Earth follows Doom, centered on his location.Other units Doom controls also benefit from Scorched Earth.

breathe_fire.affects: ABILITY: Unit Target, Point TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
breathe_fire.desc: Unleashes a breath of fire in front of Dragon Knight that burns enemies and reduces the damage their attacks deal.
breathe_fire.lore: Knight Davion's breath has become that of the mighty Eldwurm Slyrak, remembered for burning numerous other knights to a crisp.
breathe_fire.notes: Affects mechanical units.Hits units up to 900 away.

dragon_blood.desc: The life blood of the Dragon improves health regeneration and strengthens armor.
dragon_blood.lore: Slyrak's blood still courses through Davion's veins, giving him twice the vitality of an ordinary knight.

dragon_tail.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
dragon_tail.desc: Dragon Knight smites an enemy unit in melee range with his shield, stunning it while dealing minor damage.  When in Elder Dragon Form, the cast range increases to 400.
dragon_tail.lore: Davion's combination of dragon talents and knightly skills makes him a vicious opponent in melee combat.

elder_dragon_form.affects: ABILITY: No TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
elder_dragon_form.attrib:
DURATION: 60 / 60 / 60
BONUS MOVE SPEED: 25 / 25 / 25
BONUS ATTACK RANGE: 350
elder_dragon_form.desc:
Dragon Knight takes the form of one of three powerful elder dragons, increasing his speed, and Dragon Tail's range, while granting him new powers.
LEVEL 1 Green Dragon - Corrosive Breath: attacks deal 20 poison damage per second for 5 seconds. Works on structures.
LEVEL 2 Red Dragon - Splash Attack: attacks damage all enemy units in a 300 radius, with Corrosive Breath added to the primary target.
LEVEL 3 Blue Dragon - Frost Breath: slows movement speed by 30% and attack speed by 20 of enemy units in Splash Attack range for 3 seconds, with Corrosive Breath added to the primary target.
elder_dragon_form.lore: The dormant dragon power springs forth from within Davion, combining the powers of a legendary knight with a legendary Eldwurm.
elder_dragon_form.notes: Corrosive Breath poison damage is lethal.Splash Attack deals 100/75/50% damage in a 150/225/300 radius. Splash damage does not affect buildings.Frost Breath stacks with Unique Attack Modifiers.Manta Style's cooldown time will be based on whether Dragon Knight was in his ranged or melee form when the item was used.

dragon_knight.droles: Carry - Pusher - Durable - Disabler - Initiator - Nuker

frost_arrows.affects: ABILITY: Auto-Cast, Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
frost_arrows.attrib:
MOVEMENT SLOW: 15% / 30% / 45% / 60%
HERO DURATION: 1.5
CREEP DURATION: 7
frost_arrows.desc:
Adds a freezing effect to Drow's attacks, slowing enemy movement.  Lasts 1.5 seconds on Heroes, and 7 seconds on creeps.

Frost Arrows is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
frost_arrows.lore: Ice-encased arrows pierce the silence, chilling their victims to the core.
frost_arrows.notes: The slow duration is refreshed on successive casts.

marksmanship.attrib:
BONUS AGILITY: 40 / 60 / 80
SPLIT COUNT: 2
SEARCH RANGE: 375
DAMAGE REDUCTION: 50%
marksmanship.desc:
Drow's experiences in battle improve her accuracy and effectiveness in combat, providing a passive bonus to Agility. Grants no bonus if there are enemy heroes within 400 range.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
marksmanship.lore: The Drow Ranger is the epitome of archery prowess.

trueshot.desc: Adds bonus damage to the physical attack of allied, ranged Hero units based on a percentage of Drow's agility.  Affects creeps for 30 seconds when cast.
trueshot.lore: Traxex' time spent alone in the forests of her Drow home has allowed her to teach other archers how to improve their bow skills.

wave_of_silence.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
wave_of_silence.attrib:
RANGE: 900
WIDTH: 250
SILENCE DURATION: 3 / 4 / 5 / 6
KNOCKBACK DURATION: 0.6 / 0.7 / 0.8 / 0.9
wave_of_silence.desc: Releases a wave that silences and knocks back enemy units. Knockback distance is relative to how close they are to you.
wave_of_silence.lore: Traxex is rather fond of the tranquility of physical combat, calling on her Drow heritage to end the incantations of opposing magi.

boulder_smash.affects: ABILITY: Unit Target, Point TargetAFFECTS: HeroesDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
boulder_smash.attrib:
REMNANT SMASH RADIUS: 200
DAMAGE: 50 / 100 / 150 / 200
STUN DURATION: 0.75 / 1.25 / 1.75 / 2.25
TRAVEL SPEED: 900
DISTANCE: 500 / 600 / 700 / 800
DISTANCE (REMNANT): 2000
boulder_smash.desc: Earth Spirit smashes the target enemy or ally, sending them in the direction he is facing. If Earth Spirit targets an area, he will smash the nearest Stone Remnant in a 200 radius. The travelling unit or Remnant damages all enemy units it hits.  If an enemy is hit by a Stone Remnant, they are also stunned. Stone Remnants travel further than other units.
boulder_smash.lore: It is with the power of a mountain that Earth Spirit strikes his enemies.
boulder_smash.notes: Stun is only applied if the initial target is a Stone Remnant.Boulder Smash's cooldown is not reset if it fails to knock back a unit or Remnant.

geomagnetic_grip.affects: ABILITY: Unit Target, Point TargetAFFECTS: Allied UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
geomagnetic_grip.attrib:
SILENCE DURATION: 2.5 / 3 / 3.5 / 4
HERO PULL SPEED: 600
REMNANT DAMAGE: 50 / 100 / 150 / 200
REMNANT PULL SPEED: 1000
geomagnetic_grip.desc:
Earth Spirit pulls the target Stone Remnant. Enemies struck by the gripped target will be silenced, and take damage if the gripped target is a Stone Remnant.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
geomagnetic_grip.lore: Like calls to like. Even the minerals found in the blood and bones of living beings are not immune to the call of the Earth Spirit.
geomagnetic_grip.notes: Will not work on a unit inside Chronosphere, Duel, or Black Hole.Can pull allied heroes with Scepter.

magnetize.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
magnetize.attrib:
RADIUS: 300
DAMAGE PER SECOND: 50 / 75 / 100
MAGNETIZE DURATION: 6
REMNANT REFRESH RADIUS: 400
REMNANT EXPLOSION RADIUS: 600
magnetize.desc: Magnetizes units in a small nearby area, causing them to take damage for a short duration. Magnetized heroes cause nearby Stone Remnants to explode, destroying the remnant and refreshing Magnetize's duration on all nearby enemies. This process can repeat multiple times. If an enemy hero is affected by silence or slows as a result of Geomagnetic Grip or Rolling Boulder, all magnetized heroes share the effects.
magnetize.lore: At the Earth Spirit's call, the minerals in the blood and bones of his enemies rebel against the bodies they find themselves in.

petrify.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
petrify.attrib:
REMNANT DURATION: 3
SHATTER DAMAGE: 300
SHATTER RADIUS: 300
petrify.desc: Earth Spirit temporarily enchants a hero, granting them the properties of a Stone Remnant. After a short duration the remnant shatters, releasing the hero and damaging nearby enemies.
petrify.lore: Kaolin uses the elemental power of the Earth to temporarily petrify living beings, so that they might be conscripted into his stone funerary army.

rolling_boulder.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
rolling_boulder.attrib:
SPEED: 800
SPEED (REMNANT): 1600
DISTANCE: 800
DISTANCE (REMNANT): 1600
DAMAGE: 100
MOVEMENT SLOW: 80%
SLOW DURATION: 1.4 / 1.6 / 1.8 / 2
rolling_boulder.desc: Earth Spirit gathers himself into a boulder and, after a 0.6s delay, rolls toward the target location, damaging enemy units. He will stop if he collides with an enemy hero or is stunned. If he rolls over a Stone Remnant, he will travel further and faster, and enemies hit by the boulder will have their movement speed slowed.
rolling_boulder.lore: Calling upon his connection to the land, the Earth Spirit draws loose stone to him, which forms a protective ball that he can use to roll short distances.
rolling_boulder.notes: Rolling over a Stone Remnant will destroy the Remnant.The boulder has a radius of 150.

stone_caller.attrib:
MAX CHARGES: 6
CHARGE RESTORE TIME: 30
DURATION: 120
stone_caller.desc: Call a Stone Remnant to the target location.  Stones Remnants have no vision and are invulnerable, and can be used with Earth Spirit's abilities.  Calling a Stone Remnant consumes a charge, which recharge over time.
stone_caller.lore: Earth Spirit calls forth a remnant of his stone army, long buried with him in the dark embrace of the Earth.

aftershock.affects: ABILITY: PassiveDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
aftershock.desc: Causes the earth to shake underfoot, adding additional damage and stuns to nearby enemy units when Earthshaker casts his abilities.
aftershock.lore: The earth trembles beneath the mighty footsteps of Raigor.
aftershock.notes: Using items does not trigger Aftershock.

echo_slam.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
echo_slam.desc: Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units.  Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units.
echo_slam.lore: Tectonic plates crack, mountains fold, and foes are crushed by the Echo Slam.
echo_slam.notes: Will not damage ethereal units, such as those in Ghost Form.Units creating echoes also take damage from the wave they produced.

enchant_totem.desc:
Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage on the next attack.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
enchant_totem.lore: Raigor's gorilla strength can destroy mountains.
enchant_totem.notes: Bonus damage is based on base damage and that given by primary attribute.Self-cast with Scepter will make it behave in the non-Scepter form, without jumping.

fissure.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
fissure.attrib:
FISSURE RANGE: 1400
FISSURE DURATION: 8
STUN DURATION: 1 / 1.25 / 1.5 / 1.75
fissure.desc: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, creating an impassable ridge of stone while stunning and damaging enemy units along its line.
fissure.lore: The Nishian totem splits the world to its core with tectonic force.
fissure.notes: Creeps will wait for Fissure to disappear. They will not attempt to walk around it.Fissure is not blocked by Linken's Sphere.

ancestral_spirit.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
ancestral_spirit.attrib:
RADIUS: 275
DAMAGE: 60 / 90 / 120 / 150
DURATION: 8
BUFF DURATION: 9
BONUS SPEED(CREEPS): 1%
BONUS SPEED(HEROES): 5%
BONUS DAMAGE(CREEPS): 6 / 9 / 12 / 15
BONUS DAMAGE(HEROES): 10 / 20 / 30 / 40
ancestral_spirit.desc:
Elder Titan sends forth his Astral Spirit, damaging any units it passes through.  When the spirit rejoins the Titan, it grants bonus damage and movement speed for each unit it damaged.

The Astral Spirit possesses the Echo Stomp, Return Spirit, and Natural Order abilities.
ancestral_spirit.lore: Like the four fundamentals, Elder Titan exists across all planes at once and can draw other aspects of himself to assist in times of need.

earth_splitter.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
earth_splitter.attrib:
EXPLODE DELAY: 3.14
CRACK WIDTH: 300
CRACK LENGTH: 2400
MOVEMENT SLOW: 30% / 40% / 50%
SLOW DURATION: 3 / 4 / 5
MAX HP AS DAMAGE: 30% / 40% / 50%
SCEPTER SLOW/DISARM DURATION: 4 / 5 / 6
earth_splitter.desc:
Sends forth a jagged crack in front of Elder Titan. After 3 seconds, the crack implodes, slowing movement while dealing damage to each enemy based on their maximum life. Half of the damage dealt is Magical damage, while the other half is Physical damage.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
earth_splitter.lore: That which he created, the titan tears asunder.

echo_stomp.affects: ABILITY: No Target, ChanneledDAMAGE TYPE: PhysicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
echo_stomp.attrib:
CAST TIME: 1.6
RADIUS: 500
SLEEP DURATION: 2 / 3 / 4 / 5
STOMP DAMAGE: 85 / 110 / 135 / 160
echo_stomp.desc: Elder Titan and his Astral Spirit both stomp the ground, damaging and knocking nearby enemy units unconscious around their locations.  The Elder Titan stomp deals physical damage, while the Spirit stomp deals magical damage.
echo_stomp.lore: The force of creation still echoes in the stomp of the Titan.

natural_order.affects: ABILITY: Passive, AuraAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
natural_order.attrib:
RADIUS: 275 / 275 / 275 / 275
BASE ARMOR REDUCTION: 40% / 60% / 80% / 100%
BASE RESIST REDUCTION: 12% / 19% / 26% / 33%
natural_order.desc: Reduces all elements to their basic levels, removing base armor and magic damage resistance from nearby enemy units.
natural_order.lore: As it was at the beginning, Elder Titan makes it so again.

return_spirit.desc: Returns the Astral Spirit to Elder Titan.

activate_fire_remnant.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
activate_fire_remnant.desc: Select the Fire Remnant to arrive at.
activate_fire_remnant.lore: With blazing speed does a spirit fly!

fire_remnant.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
fire_remnant.attrib:
MAX CHARGES: 3
CHARGE RESTORE TIME: 35
DAMAGE: 100 / 150 / 200
RADIUS: 450
DURATION: 45
fire_remnant.desc: Ember Spirit generates Fire Remnant charges every 35 seconds, with a max of 3 charges.  Releasing a charge sends a Fire Remnant that runs to the target location at 2.5x Ember Spirit's speed.  Using Activate Fire Remnant, Ember Spirit can dash out to his Remnants, exploding them for area of effect damage.  The targeted Remnant will be arrived at last.
fire_remnant.lore: By the spirit's power are Xin's teachings spread anew.
fire_remnant.notes: Starts with 3 charges (maximum).Fire Remnants move to where you targeted them at 2.5x your speed.

flame_guard.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
flame_guard.attrib:
DURATION: 8 / 12 / 16 / 20
RADIUS: 400
MAGIC ABSORB: 50 / 200 / 350 / 500
DAMAGE PER SECOND: 30 / 40 / 50 / 60
flame_guard.desc: Ember Spirit surrounds himself with a ring of fire that consumes incoming magic damage, leaving him unharmed.  Flame Guard deals damage per second in an area around Ember Spirit while Flame Guard is active.  If the shield is broken, the damage is also lost.
flame_guard.lore: An enemy should never be allowed to approach without difficulty.
flame_guard.notes: Magic damage reduction is calculated before any reductions.

searing_chains.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
searing_chains.attrib:
DURATION: 1 / 2 / 2 / 3
RADIUS: 400
DAMAGE PER SECOND: 80 / 60 / 120 / 100
TOTAL DAMAGE: 80 / 120 / 240 / 300
UNIT COUNT: 2
searing_chains.desc: Ember Spirit unleashes fiery bolas that wrap around nearby enemies, anchoring them in place and dealing damage each second.
searing_chains.lore: Xin's harshest lessons often employed the use of red-hot chains.
searing_chains.notes: Targets are chosen randomly around Xin.Does not affect Spell Immune or invisible units.Interrupts channeling spells.

sleight_of_fist.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: PhysicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
sleight_of_fist.attrib:
RADIUS: 250 / 350 / 450 / 550
BONUS HERO DAMAGE: 20 / 40 / 60 / 80
ATTACK INTERVAL: 0.2
CREEP DAMAGE PENALTY: 50%
sleight_of_fist.desc: Ember Spirit dashes around with blazing speed, attacking all enemies in the targeted area of effect, then returning to his start location.  Deals bonus damage to heroes, and less damage to creeps.
sleight_of_fist.lore: The studied warrior must whip and weave through its enemies, burning each without pause.
sleight_of_fist.notes: Targets are determined when the spell is cast.A regular attack is done to each target every 0.2 seconds.Any attack modifier that Xin has (such as Critical Strike, Bash, Cleave, or Orb effects) will be applied normally on these attacks.Abilities and items can be used while Sleight of Fist is active.

enchant.attrib:
CREEP ENCHANT DURATION: 80
HERO MOVE SLOW: 20% / 30% / 40% / 50%
HERO SLOW DURATION: 5.5 / 5.5 / 5.5 / 5.5
enchant.desc: Enchantress charms an enemy. If the enemy is a hero, they are slowed. If the enemy is a creep, she brings it under her control. If cast on a creep already under her control, she refreshes its enchant duration.
enchant.lore: A true steward of the forest, Aiushtha befriends all within it - from lowly trolls to powerful centaurs.

impetus.affects: ABILITY: Auto-Cast, Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: PurePIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
impetus.desc:
Places an enchantment on each attack while activated, causing it to deal additional damage based on how far away the target is.  The farther the target, the greater the damage dealt.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
impetus.lore: While Aiushtha favors peaceful means, she is capable of a magical onslaught from a distance, her spears gaining energy from the natural life around her.
impetus.notes: The damage is capped at 1750 distance.Distance to target is measured when the projectile hits.

natures_attendants.desc: A cloud of wisps heals Enchantress and any friendly units nearby.  Lasts 10 seconds.
natures_attendants.lore: Whimsical spirits of the woods possess a healing power that is quite subtle, but gains strength in numbers.
natures_attendants.notes: Units with full HP will not be selected for the heal.Can heal units with spell immunity.

untouchable.desc: Enchantress beguiles her enemies, slowing their attacks when she is attacked.
untouchable.lore: After attacking Aiushtha, most opponents are overwhelmed with guilt having attacked such a natural beauty.
untouchable.notes: All units who directly attack or cast spells on Enchantress will get slowed.The slow is applied on the attacking unit when the attack starts, not when damage is applied.

black_hole.affects: ABILITY: Channeled, Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
black_hole.desc:
CHANNELED - Summons a vortex that sucks in nearby enemy units.  Enemies affected by Black Hole cannot move, attack, or cast spells.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
black_hole.lore: The ground trembles as Enigma channels his ultimate vortex of destruction, a singularity with the power to end worlds.

demonic_conversion.attrib:
ATTACKS TO MULTIPLY: 6 / 6 / 6 / 6
EIDOLON HP: 180 / 200 / 220 / 240
EIDOLON DAMAGE: 20 / 28 / 38 / 47
DURATION: 35
demonic_conversion.desc: Transforms a creep into three fragments of Enigma himself.  These eidolons are all under Enigma's control, and repeated successful attacks cause them to multiply.  When this happens, the eidolons have their health restored.
demonic_conversion.lore: Enigma is capable of drawing aspects of himself from other dimensions - the result is a trio of dark eidolons that hunt the corporeal plane.
demonic_conversion.notes: Converted enemy units will give gold bounty and experience.

malefice.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
malefice.attrib:
STUN DURATION: 0.25 / 0.5 / 0.75 / 1
DAMAGE PER HIT: 30 / 50 / 70 / 90
INSTANCES: 3 / 3 / 3 / 3
malefice.desc: Focuses Enigma's power on a target, causing it to take damage and become repeatedly stunned for multiple instances.  An instance strikes every 2 seconds.
malefice.lore: Strange gravities pull at the core of those who would oppose you, holding them in place.

midnight_pulse.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: PurePIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
midnight_pulse.desc: Steeps an area in dark resonance, damaging enemy units based on their max HP.
midnight_pulse.lore: A section of the world slowly descends into the void.
midnight_pulse.notes: Damage goes through spell immunity.This ability destroys trees in its area.

chronosphere.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
chronosphere.desc:
Creates a blister in spacetime, trapping all units caught in its sphere of influence and causes you to move very quickly inside it.  Only Faceless Void and any units he controls are unaffected.  Invisible units in the sphere will be revealed.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
chronosphere.lore: When a rift opens to Claszureme, all poor souls caught within will likely never return.
chronosphere.notes: Pauses all units and buildings, friendly or enemy, except those owned by Faceless Void.Faceless Void is never affected by Chronospheres with any owner.

time_dilation.desc: Faceless Void traps all nearby enemies in a time dilation field for 6 seconds, freezing their cooldowns and slowing their movement and attack speed by 8% for each cooldown frozen.

time_lock.affects: ABILITY: PassiveDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
time_lock.desc: Adds the chance for an attack to lock an enemy unit in time, stunning it and dealing bonus damage.
time_lock.lore: The strike of the Faceless Void lands with dimension shifting force.
time_lock.notes: Stun works on Spell Immune units.Does not stack with Skull Basher.

time_walk.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
time_walk.desc: Rushes to a target location while backtracking any damage taken the last 2 seconds.
time_walk.lore: Darkterror tears a hole in time, passing through Claszureme, and appearing back in an instant.
time_walk.notes: Faceless Void is invulnerable while using Time Walk.

force_of_nature.desc: Converts an area of trees into Treants. Treants have 550 health and deal 30-34 damage.
force_of_nature.lore: Verodicia bestowed the Prophet with the ability to summon the Treant Guard, a mythical sentient army of the wild.
force_of_nature.notes: Nature's Call can only create as many treants as there are trees in the target area.

sprout.affects: ABILITY: Unit Target, Point TargetAFFECTS: Heroes
sprout.desc: Sprouts a ring of trees around a unit, trapping it in place.
sprout.lore: Verdant overgrowth is a common ailment reported by Nature's Prophet's attackers.
sprout.notes: Sprout can be cast on any unit, or the ground.Trees created by Sprout have the same interactions with abilities as regular trees.

teleportation.desc: Teleports to any point on the map.
teleportation.lore: The Prophet keeps his sentinel over the forest, protecting it when in need.
teleportation.notes: Teleport takes 3 seconds to cast.Mana and cooldown take effect when the cast is completed.  Nature's Prophet will not use any mana or waste the cooldown if the spell is interrupted while casting.When the cast begins, an effect is created at the target location, which is visible to allies and enemies.

wrath_of_nature.affects: ABILITY: Unit Target, Point TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
wrath_of_nature.attrib:
MAX TARGETS: 16 / 16 / 16
DAMAGE: 140 / 180 / 225
ADDED DAMAGE PER BOUNCE: 7%
SCEPTER MAX TARGETS: 18 / 18 / 18
SCEPTER DAMAGE: 155 / 210 / 275
SCEPTER TREANT SPAWN TIMER: 4
wrath_of_nature.desc:
Damaging energy bounces around the map, striking enemies close to the cast point that are in vision. Each enemy hit beyond the first adds damage.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
wrath_of_nature.lore: Nature's Prophet calls Verodicia's fury to strike down those who might ravage the wilderness.
wrath_of_nature.notes: Wrath of Nature will not hit units out of vision.Can be cast through the minimap; the nearest valid target will be selected.

call_down.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
call_down.attrib:
MISSILE ONE DAMAGE: 200 / 275 / 350
MISSILE TWO DAMAGE: 100 / 150 / 200
MISSILE ONE SLOW: 30%
MISSILE TWO SLOW: 60%
RADIUS: 600
call_down.desc:
Call down an aerial missile strike on enemy units in a target area.  Two missiles arrive in succession, the first dealing major damage and minor slow for 2 seconds; the second dealing minor damage and major slow for 4 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
call_down.notes: The visual indicator is visible to allies only.

flak_cannon.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: PhysicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
flak_cannon.desc: Gyrocopter's attacks hit all enemy units in an area around it for a limited number of attacks.  Only the main target of attacks will receive attack bonuses such as Critical Strike.  Lasts 15 seconds or until the attacks are used.
flak_cannon.lore: This newly revamped Gyrocopter has attached enough armaments to assault in a 360 degree radius.
flak_cannon.notes: Attack range for the primary attack is unchanged.

homing_missile.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
homing_missile.attrib:
HITS TO DESTROY: 3 / 3 / 4 / 5
TOWER HITS TO DESTROY: 6 / 6 / 8 / 10
STUN DURATION: 2.2 / 2.4 / 2.6 / 2.8
MINIMUM DAMAGE: 50
homing_missile.desc: Fires a homing missile to seek the targeted enemy unit. The missile gains speed over time, dealing damage and stunning when it impacts the target.  Homing Missile deals greater damage the further it has traveled.  Enemy units can destroy the missile before it reaches its target.
homing_missile.lore: The biggest missile Aurel could possibly attach to his craft, The Bomb™ has carefully calculated aerodynamics and explosives for maximum impact.
