homing_missile.notes: Towers do half damage to the missile.The crosshair effect is visible to allies only.Maximum damage is reached when the missile is 1500 units away.The missile will follow and hit invisible units.

rocket_barrage.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
rocket_barrage.desc: Launches a salvo of rockets at nearby enemy units in a radius around the Gyrocopter.  Lasts 3 seconds.
rocket_barrage.lore: Aurel's new craft has an increased payload for rockets, enhancing their rapid-fire capabilities.
rocket_barrage.notes: Rocket Barrage can't hit units Gyrocopter has no vision over.

berserkers_blood.attrib:
MAX ATTACK SPEED: 220 / 260 / 300 / 340
MAX MAGIC RESISTANCE: 20% / 30% / 40% / 50%
HP FOR MAX BONUS: 10%
berserkers_blood.desc: Huskar's injuries feed his power, giving increased attack speed and magic damage resistance based on missing health.
berserkers_blood.lore: After losing his birthright, Huskar gained a lethality in physical combat that is only heightened as his own blood is spilled.
berserkers_blood.notes: Maximum bonus is achieved when Huskar has strictly less than 10% of his maximum HP.Bonuses are provided linearly, no bonus at 100% HP and full bonus at 10% HP.

burning_spear.affects: ABILITY: Auto-Cast, Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
burning_spear.desc: Huskar sets his spears aflame, dealing damage over time with his regular attack.  Multiple attacks will stack additional damage.  Each attack drains some of Huskar's health.  Lasts 8 seconds.
burning_spear.lore: The Sacred Warrior ignites his weaponry after marking it with his own blood - causing far greater pain than he himself feels.
burning_spear.notes: Burning Spears stacks additively when used multiple times on one target.  There is no cap.Huskar cannot kill himself with this skill.

inner_vitality.attrib:
HEALTH REGEN: 10
BONUS FROM ATTRIBUTE: 5% / 10% / 15% / 20%
BONUS WHEN HURT: 20% / 40% / 60% / 80%
inner_vitality.desc: Unlocks the regenerative power of a friendly unit, with healing based upon its primary attribute. If the target is below 40%, it will heal faster.  Lasts 16 seconds.
inner_vitality.lore: While Huskar has little use for magic, this minor enchantment was learned from the Dazzle and the Dezun priests, to be used in times of great injury.
inner_vitality.notes: The HP percentage is checked every second and the regeneration adjusted accordingly.Can be cast on Spell Immune units.

life_break.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
life_break.attrib:
DAMAGE DEALT: 35%
DAMAGE TAKEN: 35%
MOVEMENT SLOW: 40% / 50% / 60%
SLOW DURATION: 4 / 5 / 6
SCEPTER DAMAGE DEALT: 65%
SCEPTER COOLDOWN: 4
life_break.desc:
Huskar draws upon his health to break an enemy's life, leaping at a target within attack range to shatter a percentage of that hero's current health, and slowing them.  While leaping, Huskar is Spell Immune.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
life_break.lore: No matter the danger, Huskar thrusts himself into melees that only he can survive.
life_break.notes: If Huskar is disabled during the charge or the target moves more than 1400 units in 0.015 seconds, the charge stops.Slow works on Spell Immune units.Life Break cannot be disjointed.

alacrity.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Allied UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
alacrity.desc: Invoker infuses an ally with an immense surge of energy, increasing their attack speed based on the level of Wex and their damage based on the level of Exort.

chaos_meteor.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
chaos_meteor.attrib:
IMPACT DELAY: 1.3
RADIUS: 275
CONTACT DAMAGE TICK: 0.5
BURN DURATION: 3
chaos_meteor.desc: Invoker pulls a flaming meteor from space onto the targeted location. Upon landing, the meteor rolls forward, constantly dealing damage based on the level of Exort, and rolling further based on the level of Wex. Units hit by the meteor will also be set on fire for a short time, receiving additional damage based on the level of Exort.
chaos_meteor.notes: Deals main damage to enemy units under meteor every 0.5 seconds and burns enemies for smaller damage over 3 seconds.The meteor moves at a speed of 300.

cold_snap.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
cold_snap.desc: Invoker draws the heat from an enemy, chilling them to their very core for a duration based on the level of Quas. The enemy will take damage and be briefly frozen. Further damage taken in this state will freeze the enemy again, dealing bonus damage. The enemy can only be frozen so often, but the freeze cooldown decreases based on the level of Quas.
cold_snap.notes: The freeze stun only triggers on damage greater than 10 after reductions.

deafening_blast.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
deafening_blast.desc:
Invoker unleashes a mighty sonic wave in front of him, dealing damage to any enemy unit it collides with based on the level of Exort. The sheer impact from the blast is enough to knock those enemy units back for a duration based on the level of Quas, then disarm their attacks for a duration based on the level of Wex.

If Quas, Wex, and Exort are all at max level, Deafening Blast becomes a non-targetable circular wave released in every direction around Invoker.

emp.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: PurePIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
emp.desc: Invoker builds up a charge of electromagnetic energy at a targeted location which automatically detonates after %delay% seconds. The detonation covers an area, draining mana based on the level of Wex. Deals damage for each point of mana drained.  If EMP drains mana from an enemy hero, Invoker gains 50% of the mana drained.
emp.notes: Will not affect cycloned units (Tornado or Eul's Scepter of Divinity).

exort.desc: Allows manipulation of fire elements and grants a permanent intelligence bonus. Each Exort instance provides increased attack damage.
exort.notes: Invoker can only have 3 of any instance.

forge_spirit.affects: ABILITY: No TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
forge_spirit.desc: Invoker forges a spirit embodying the strength of fire and fortitude of ice. Damage, mana, and armor are based on the level of Exort while attack range, health, and duration are based on the level of Quas. The elemental's scorching attack is capable of melting the armor of enemy heroes. If both Quas and Exort are level 4 or higher, Invoker will create two spirits instead of one.
forge_spirit.notes: Casting this abiliy will replace currently summoned Forged Spirits.

ghost_walk.affects: ABILITY: No TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
ghost_walk.desc: Invoker manipulates the ice and electrical energies around him, rendering his body invisible. The elemental imbalance created as a consequence slows nearby enemies based on the level of Quas, and slows Invoker as well based on the level of Wex.
ghost_walk.notes: The slow effect does not work on Spell Immune enemies.

ice_wall.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
ice_wall.desc: Generates a wall of solid ice directly in front of Invoker for a duration based on the level of Quas. The bitter cold emanating from it greatly slows nearby enemies based on the level of Quas and deals damage each second based on the level of Exort.
ice_wall.notes: The slow will still affect Spell Immune enemies if their spell immunity was created after being affected by Ice Wall.

invoke.attrib:
MAX SPELLS: 2 / 2 / 2 / 2
SCEPTER COOLDOWN: 16 / 8 / 4 / 2
SCEPTER MANA COST: 0
invoke.desc:
Combines the properties of the elements currently being manipulated to create a new spell for Invoker to use.  Click the help button to see the list of possible spells.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
invoke.lore: So begins a new age of knowledge.
invoke.notes: The arrangement of instances does not matter.Invoke's cooldown is not triggered if the only effect is to swap the positions of existing spells.

quas.attrib:
HP REGEN PER INSTANCE: 1 / 2 / 3 / 4 / 5 / 6 / 7
BONUS STRENGTH: 2 / 4 / 6 / 8 / 10 / 12 / 14
quas.desc: Allows manipulation of ice elements and grants a permanent strength bonus. Each Quas instance provides increased health regeneration.
quas.notes: Invoker can only have 3 of any instance.

sun_strike.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: PurePIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
sun_strike.desc: Sends a catastrophic ray of fierce energy from the sun at any targeted location, incinerating all enemies standing beneath it once it reaches the earth. Deals damage based on the level of Exort, however this damage is spread evenly over all enemies hit.
sun_strike.notes: Gives vision of the target area before the strike.Invoker gains experience with kills made from Sun Strike, even if made from outside of experience range.

tornado.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
tornado.desc: Unleashes a fast moving tornado that picks up enemy units in its path, suspending them helplessly in the air shortly before allowing them to plummet to their doom. Travels further based on the level of Wex. Holds enemies in the air for a duration based on the level of Quas. Deals base damage plus added damage based on levels in Wex.
tornado.notes: Units are invulnerable while affected by Tornado, and the damage is dealt when landing.

wex.attrib:
ATTACK SPEED PER INSTANCE: 2 / 4 / 6 / 8 / 10 / 12 / 14
MOVE SPEED PER INSTANCE: 1% / 2% / 3% / 4% / 5% / 6% / 7%
BONUS AGILITY: 2 / 4 / 6 / 8 / 10 / 12 / 14
wex.desc: Allows manipulation of storm elements and grants a permanent agility bonus. Each Wex instance provides increased attack speed and movement speed.
wex.notes: Invoker can only have 3 of any instance.

dual_breath.affects: ABILITY: Unit Target, Point TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
dual_breath.attrib:
START RADIUS: 200 / 200 / 200 / 200
END RADIUS: 250 / 250 / 250 / 250
BURN DAMAGE: 20 / 40 / 60 / 80
MOVE SLOW: 28% / 32% / 36% / 40%
ATTACK SLOW: 28 / 32 / 36 / 40
DURATION: 5
dual_breath.desc: An icy blast followed by a wave of fire launches out in a path in front of Jakiro. The ice slows enemies, while the fire delivers damage over time.
dual_breath.lore: Pyrexae dragons have tremendously dangerous breath for each branch of the species; combining them is unimaginable.
dual_breath.notes: Can hit units up to 1000 range away.Has a 0.3 second interval between each breath.

ice_path.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
ice_path.desc: Creates a path of ice that stuns and damages enemies that touch it.
ice_path.lore: Jakiro's cunning right head calls upon its frozen heritage, glazing the earth with blistering cold.
ice_path.notes: It takes 0.5 seconds for the path to reach its full extent.

liquid_fire.affects: ABILITY: Auto-Cast, Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
liquid_fire.attrib:
ATTACK SLOW: 20 / 30 / 40 / 50
RADIUS: 300
BURN DAMAGE: 12 / 16 / 20 / 24
DURATION: 5 / 5 / 5 / 5
liquid_fire.desc:
Jakiro burns his enemies in an area of effect with fire added to his attack, while slowing their attacks.

Liquid Fire is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
liquid_fire.lore: The left maw of Jakiro opens, laying waste to any in its path.
liquid_fire.notes: Works on both units and buildings.

macropyre.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
macropyre.attrib:
DAMAGE PER SECOND: 100 / 140 / 180
FLAME LENGTH: 1400
FLAME WIDTH: 240
DURATION: 10
SCEPTER DAMAGE PER SECOND: 125 / 175 / 225
SCEPTER FLAME LENGTH: 1800
SCEPTER DURATION: 30
macropyre.desc:
Jakiro exhales a wide line of lasting flames, which deals damage per second to any enemy units caught in the fire.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
macropyre.lore: Ice and fire combine to rip the battlefield to shreds with extreme temperatures.
macropyre.notes: Macropyre destroys trees in its path.

blade_dance.desc: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal double damage on each attack.
blade_dance.lore: The last remnant of his heritage's commitment to bladework, Yurnero ensures that the style is remembered.

blade_fury.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
blade_fury.desc: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.  Lasts 5 seconds.
blade_fury.lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.
blade_fury.notes: This skill doesn't affect mechanical units.You can use items during Blade Fury.Juggernaut can still perform attacks while in Blade Fury. However, only units that are not affected by Blade Fury, such as wards or structures, will take damage from these attacks.Deals a total of 400/525/650/775 damage.

healing_ward.desc: Summons a Healing Ward which heals all nearby allied units, based on their max health.  The Healing Ward moves at 420 movement speed after being summoned.  Lasts 25 seconds.
healing_ward.lore: Of the rituals learned at the Isle of Masks, tending wounds with a bit of voodoo magic has proven to be quite useful.
healing_ward.notes: The healing ward can be controlled.Multiple healing wards don't stack.

icenter.affects: ABILITY: No Target, ChanneledDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
icenter.attrib:
PULSES: 6 / 8 / 10
DAMAGE PER PULSE: 110 / 110 / 110
MOVEMENT SLOW: 30% / 30% / 30%
ATTACK SLOW: 30
SLOW DURATION: 3
icenter.desc: CHANNELED - After channeling for 2 seconds, Sand King sends a disturbance into the earth, causing it to shudder violently. All enemies caught within range will take damage and become slowed. Each subsequent pulse increases the radius of damage dealt.
icenter.lore: Many an explorer was lost to the quicksands of the Scintillant Waste.
icenter.notes: The pulses are centered on Sand King, not where he first casted the spell.The pulses have gradually inreasing radius: 275 / 325 / 375 / 425 / 475 / 525 / 575 / 650 / 675 / 700.

omni_slash.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: PhysicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
omni_slash.attrib:
SLASHES: 3 / 6 / 9
SLASH JUMP RADIUS: 425
SCEPTER SLASHES: 6 / 9 / 12
SCEPTER COOLDOWN: 70
omni_slash.desc:
Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy unit with a damaging attack, and then slashes other nearby enemy units, dealing between 200-225 damage per slash.  Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
omni_slash.lore: 'The fruits of discipline; with practice comes strength.'
omni_slash.notes: You can use items during Omnislash.Can target Spell Immune units.Slashes happen on an interval of 0.4 seconds.Creeps are killed in one hit of omnislash.

blinding_light.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
blinding_light.attrib:
RADIUS: 675 / 675 / 675
DURATION: 4 / 5 / 6
MISS CHANCE: 80% / 80% / 80%
KNOCKBACK DISTANCE: 400
blinding_light.desc: A blinding light flashes over the targeted area, knocking back and blinding the units in the area, causing them to miss attacks.
blinding_light.lore: The Primordial light turns the tides of battle in favor of Ezalor and his allies.
blinding_light.notes: Causes knockback of 250 range over 0.4 seconds, centered on the middle of the target area. Upon landing, units will destroy trees in a 150 radius.Does not interrupt channeling.

chakra_magic.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Allied UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
chakra_magic.attrib:
MANA RESTORE: 75 / 150 / 225 / 300
ALLY COOLDOWN REDUCTION: 3 / 4 / 5 / 6
COOLDOWN REDUCTION DURATION: 15
chakra_magic.desc: Restores mana to the target unit, increases its mana capacity, and reduces the cooldown of the next spell they cast.
chakra_magic.lore: In the same vein, Ezalor bestows his harmony among others.

illuminate.affects: ABILITY: Channeled, Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
illuminate.attrib:
DAMAGE PER SECOND CHANNELED: 100 / 100 / 100 / 100
MAX CHANNEL TIME: 2 / 3 / 4 / 5
WIDTH: 350 / 350 / 350 / 350
RANGE: 1550
illuminate.desc:
Channels light energy, building power the longer it's channeled.  Once released, a wave is sent forth that deals damage and gives vision in its path.  The longer it is channeled, the more damage is dealt.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
illuminate.lore: Ezalor's hidden light reveals itself in marvelous fashion.
illuminate.notes: Gives increasing vision over the channeling time.Damages mechanical units.

mana_leak.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
mana_leak.attrib:
LEAK DURATION: 5 / 6 / 7 / 8
MANA LEAK PERCENT: 5%
STUN DURATION: 1.5 / 2 / 2.5 / 3
CAST RANGE: 550 / 700 / 850 / 1000
mana_leak.desc: Weakens an enemy's magical essence, causing them to lose mana as they move.  If the enemy loses all of its mana, it will be stunned.
mana_leak.lore: Ezalor disrupts Primordial harmony, draining magical energy from those with poor constitution.
mana_leak.notes: If the target travels over 300 distance in less than 0.1 second (by using blink skills, for example), Mana Leak will not decrease its mana for that distance.

recall.affects: ABILITY: No Target, Channeled, Unit Target, Point TargetAFFECTS: AlliesPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
recall.desc: After a short delay, teleports the targeted friendly hero to your location.  If the targeted friendly hero takes player based damage during this time, the ability is interrupted.
recall.notes: If Keeper of the Light dies, the spell effect is interrupted.Recall will interrupt channeling spells.You can disable help to prevent Keeper from casting this spell on you.Can be cast through the minimap, choosing the nearest friendly hero.

spirit_form.desc:
Ezalor temporarily turns his body luminescent, gaining various abilities.  Illuminate is now channeled by a separate spirit, and gains the Blinding Light and Recall abilities.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
spirit_form.lore: In a flash of light, Ezalor reveals his true nature.

spirit_form_illuminate.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
spirit_form_illuminate.attrib:
DAMAGE PER SECOND CHANNELED: 100 / 100 / 100 / 100
MAX CHANNEL TIME: 2 / 3 / 4 / 5
WIDTH: 350 / 350 / 350 / 350
RANGE: 1550
spirit_form_illuminate.desc:
Channels light energy, building power the longer it's channeled.  Once released, a wave is sent forth that deals damage and gives vision in its path.  The longer it is channeled, the more damage is dealt.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
spirit_form_illuminate.lore: Ezalor's hidden light reveals itself in marvelous fashion.
spirit_form_illuminate.notes: Gives increasing vision over the channeling time.Damages mechanical units.

ghostship.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
ghostship.attrib:
IMPACT DELAY: 2.7
RANGE: 1000 / 1000 / 1000
WIDTH: 425 / 425 / 425
RUM BONUS SPEED: 10% / 10% / 10%
RUM DURATION: 10
STUN DURATION: 1.4 / 1.4 / 1.4
ghostship.desc:
Summons a ghostly ship that sails through the battle before smashing apart, damaging and stunning all enemies caught near the wreckage. Allied heroes touched by the Ghostship are given a swig of The Admiral's Rum, receiving bonus movement speed and a delayed reaction to 50% of all incoming damage.

Upgradeable by Aghanim's Scepter.
ghostship.lore: The final ship of the Claddish Navy is nothing but a phantom, but it is all too real to the enemies of the Admiral.
ghostship.notes: Damage dealt after Rum wears off is non-lethal and can never kill a hero.Actual area of effect of ship's collision is larger than the boat itself.The boat has a movement speed of 650.

return.affects: ABILITY: No TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
return.desc: Returns the marked hero to the X.

tidebringer.affects: ABILITY: Auto-Cast, Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: PhysicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
tidebringer.desc: Kunkka's legendary sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.
tidebringer.lore: A lost Claddish soul inhabits Kunkka's trusty Tidebringer, empowering it to destroy demons of the Cataract.
tidebringer.notes: Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value.Cleave damage goes through spell immunity.

torrent.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
torrent.attrib:
RADIUS: 225
MOVE SLOW: 35%
SLOW DURATION: 1 / 2 / 3 / 4
STUN DURATION: 1.6
DELAY: 1.6 / 1.6 / 1.6 / 1.6
torrent.desc: Summons a rising torrent that, after a short delay, hurls enemy units into the sky, stunning, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.
torrent.lore: An ancestral rush of water explodes from the center of the world, called upon by the Admiral.
torrent.notes: The initial bubble effect is only visible to allies.Units tossed in the air will be stunned and still able to be attacked.

x_marks_the_spot.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: HeroesPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
x_marks_the_spot.desc: Targets a friendly or enemy Hero, marks their position with an X, and returns them to it after several seconds.  Kunkka can trigger the return at any time during the duration. Lasts twice as long on allied heroes.
x_marks_the_spot.lore: The Admiral's set of arcane abilities includes some that can be used for battle as well as entertainment.
x_marks_the_spot.notes: If the target becomes Spell Immune after the cast, the target will not return to the X after the duration.Interrupts channeling spells.

duel.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy HeroesPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
duel.desc:
Legion Commander and the target enemy hero are forced to attack each other for a short duration.  Neither hero can use items or abilities.  If either hero dies during the duration, the hero winning the Duel gains permanent bonus damage.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
duel.lore: To face a soldier of Stonehall in single combat is a challenge few can resist.
duel.notes: Duels will end if the units are pushed 2000 units apart.

moment_of_courage.desc: When attacked, Legion Commander has a chance to immediately counterattack with bonus lifesteal.
moment_of_courage.lore: Tresdin knows that an enemy's most vulnerable moment often follows their fiercest stroke.

overwhelming_odds.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
overwhelming_odds.attrib:
BASE DAMAGE: 40 / 80 / 120 / 160
DAMAGE PER CREEP: 14 / 16 / 18 / 20
DAMAGE PER HERO: 20 / 35 / 50 / 65
ILLUSION DAMAGE: 25%
BONUS SPEED (CREEPS): 3%
BONUS SPEED (HEROES): 9%
SPEED DURATION: 7
RADIUS: 330
overwhelming_odds.desc: Turns the enemies' numbers against them, dealing damage and granting you bonus movement speed per unit or per hero.  Deals bonus damage to illusions and summoned units as a percent of their current health.
overwhelming_odds.lore: The archers of Stonehall are ready at Tresdin's command.

press_the_attack.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Allied UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
press_the_attack.attrib:
DURATION: 5
BONUS ATTACK SPEED: 60 / 80 / 100 / 120
HP REGEN: 30 / 40 / 50 / 60
press_the_attack.desc: Removes debuffs and disables from the target friendly unit, and grants bonus attack speed and health regen for a short time.
press_the_attack.lore: The rallying horn of the Bronze Legion is able to inspire any heart.

diabolic_edict.affects: ABILITY: No TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: PhysicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
diabolic_edict.desc: Saturates the area around Leshrac with magical explosions that deal physical damage to enemy units and structures.  The fewer units available to attack, the more damage those units will take.  Deals 40% more damage to towers.  Lasts 10 seconds.
diabolic_edict.lore: Chronoptic energy bursts from one plane to the other, evaporating anything it touches.
diabolic_edict.notes: Damage is not reduced by damage block.The explosions will continue even if Leshrac is killed.Can damage buildings, Spell Immune units, and invisible units.

lightning_storm.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
lightning_storm.attrib:
LIGHTNING STRIKES: 4 / 5 / 6 / 7
LIGHTNING JUMP RADIUS: 475
MOVEMENT SLOW: 75%
SLOW DURATION: 0.7 / 0.8 / 0.9 / 1
lightning_storm.desc: Summons a lightning storm that blasts the target enemy unit, then strikes any nearby enemy units. Struck enemies are slowed.
lightning_storm.lore: The Tormented Soul's mastery of the elements is evident in the massive storms that strike down armies before him.

pulse_nova.affects: ABILITY: No Target, ToggleAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
pulse_nova.desc:
Creates waves of damaging energy around Leshrac, one per second, to damage nearby enemy units.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
pulse_nova.lore: If necessary, the Tormented Soul can manipulate space time itself, ravaging lesser beings.

split_earth.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
split_earth.desc: Splits the earth under enemies. Deals damage and stuns for a short duration.
split_earth.lore: Twisting nature to his vile will, the shifting earth consumes those unlucky enough to cross Leshrac's path.
split_earth.notes: Split Earth will destroy trees in its area of effect.There is a 0.35 second delay before the effect is applied.

chain_frost.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
chain_frost.attrib:
DAMAGE EACH BOUNCE: 280 / 370 / 460
BOUNCES: 10 / 10 / 10
BOUNCE RANGE: 575 / 575 / 575
MOVEMENT SLOW: 30%
ATTACK SLOW: 30
SLOW DURATION: 4 / 4 / 4
SCEPTER DAMAGE: 370 / 460 / 550
SCEPTER CAST RANGE: 850 / 850 / 850
chain_frost.desc:
Releases an orb of frost that bounces between nearby enemy units up to 10 times, slowing and damaging each time it hits.  The first target is mini-stunned.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
chain_frost.lore: Almost universally considered the ultimate in frost magic, Ethreain's orb of frozen death strikes fear into those who dare stand against him.
chain_frost.notes: The first target will be immediately interrupted.  This stun goes through spell immunity.Chain Frost cannot be disjointed.Chain Frost has a movement speed of 850.Chain Frost doesn't bounce to Zombies.

dark_ritual.desc: Sacrifices a friendly creep and converts its current hit points into mana for Lich.
dark_ritual.lore: It was not unheard of Ethreain to make examples out of those who contested his rule during his human life.

frost_armor.affects: ABILITY: Auto-Cast, Unit TargetAFFECTS: Allied UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
frost_armor.attrib:
ALLY ARMOR BONUS: 3 / 5 / 7 / 9
ENEMY MOVE SLOW: 30% / 30% / 30% / 30%
ENEMY ATTACK SLOW: 20 / 20 / 20 / 20
SLOW DURATION: 2 / 2 / 2 / 2
frost_armor.desc: Creates a shield around the target friendly unit or building, which adds armor and slows attacking units. Lasts 40 seconds.
frost_armor.lore: Originally crafted during his ambush for self-defense, the Lich is capable of enchanting others with a formidable defense of frost magic.
frost_armor.notes: If autocast is activated, Lich will cast this spell on nearby allies who are attacked.

frost_nova.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
frost_nova.desc: Blasts the target enemy unit with damaging frost, dealing area damage and slowing movement and attack rates for 4 seconds.  The primary target takes the most damage.
frost_nova.lore: Frost-mage Ethreain has not forgotten even the simplest of ice manipulation.

assimilate.desc: Lifestealer swallows an allied hero, allowing them to hide within him. Any healing Lifestealer receives is shared with the hero within. When an assimilated hero leaves Lifestealer, they erupt outward, damaging nearby enemies.
assimilate.lore: How can Lifestealer resist the chance to sample an ally?

assimilate_eject.desc: Ejects an Assimilated hero, damaging nearby enemies.

consume.desc: Lifestealer eats the host body from the inside out, exploding from within.

control.desc: Lifestealer seizes control of the host body's nervous system, allowing him to issue movement and attack orders from within.  Controlled units share Lifestealer's movement speed.  Cannot be used on heroes.

feast.desc: Lifestealer's attacks damage enemies and heal himself for a percentage of his target's current health.
feast.lore: After escaping from his cell in Devarque, N'aix subsisted on flesh and bones of those unfortunate to cross his path.
feast.notes: Does not affect Roshan.Affects Spell Immune units.The heal is independent of the damage.Stacks additively with other sources of Lifesteal.

infest.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
infest.desc: Lifestealer infests the body of a target unit, becoming undetectable inside. He can then explode from the host body, dealing damage to nearby enemies. If the infested unit is an enemy creep or a neutral creep, he can take control of the unit's ability to move and attack, and when consumed the creep will heal Lifestealer's health equal to the creep's current health.  Does not work on enemy heroes.
infest.lore: With this infestation, N'aix consumes the life blood of the host, restoring him back to full unholy power.
infest.notes: If the infested unit dies before Lifestealer consumes it, no health is gained.Lifestealer gains experience while under the effects of Infest.Creeps that are controlled while Infested share Lifestealer's movement speed.Infest Level 2 and 3 can be used on Ancient creeps.

open_wounds.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
open_wounds.attrib:
LIFE LEECH: 50%
MAX SLOW: 70%
DURATION: 8
CAST RANGE: 200 / 300 / 400 / 500
open_wounds.desc: Lifestealer rends an enemy unit, slowing the victim's movement speed and allowing all allies to regain health for a percentage of the damage they deal to that unit. All damage dealt will steal life, including damage from spells. The victim recovers movement speed over the duration.
open_wounds.lore: Fresh wounds and the scent of blood often draw out the scavengers to finish the job.
open_wounds.notes: Open Wounds slows over 8 different steps: 70% / 70% / 60% / 50% / 30% / 10% / 10% / 10%, with the slow decreasing one step per second.Stacks additively with other sources of Lifesteal.

rage.desc: Launch into a maddened rage, becoming Spell Immune, 100% resistant to magic damage, and gaining increased attack speed.
rage.lore: The madness and brutality of N'aix makes him a vicious and unrelenting foe in combat.
rage.notes: Upon casting, many buffs and debuffs will be removed.

dragon_slave.affects: ABILITY: Unit Target, Point TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
dragon_slave.desc: Lina channels the breath of a dragon, sending out a wave of fire that scorches every enemy in its path.
dragon_slave.lore: In the scorched barren of Misrule, Lina learned to manipulate the fiery breath of the Desert Wyrm as a form of entertainment.
dragon_slave.notes: Dragon Slave can hit units up to 1225 units away.

fiery_soul.attrib:
ATTACK SPEED BONUS: 40 / 55 / 70 / 85
MOVE SPEED BONUS: 5% / 6% / 7% / 8%
MAX STACKS: 3
DURATION: 10
fiery_soul.desc: Grants bonus attack and movement speed each time Lina casts a spell. Stacks with itself. Lasts 10 seconds.
fiery_soul.lore: Dancing flames embody Lina's playful nature, bringing out her true blazing self.
fiery_soul.notes: Duration refreshes each time a new spell is cast.Using items does not trigger Fiery Soul.

laguna_blade.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
laguna_blade.desc:
Fires off a bolt of lightning at a single enemy unit, dealing massive damage.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
laguna_blade.lore: The air around Lina becomes so intensely torrid that it scorches a foe that comes too close with white-hot lightning.
laguna_blade.notes: Laguna Blade has a 0.25 delay before the damage is applied after the spell is cast, allowing certain abilities to avoid the damage.

light_strike_array.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
light_strike_array.desc: Summons a column of flames that damages and stuns enemies.
light_strike_array.lore: Lina's essence allows her to focus the sun's energies, causing air to combust at will.
light_strike_array.notes: Light Strike Array will destroy trees in its area of effect.

finger_of_death.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
finger_of_death.attrib:
DAMAGE: 600 / 725 / 850
SCEPTER DAMAGE: 725 / 875 / 1025
SCEPTER MANA COST: 200 / 420 / 625
SCEPTER COOLDOWN: 100 / 60 / 20
SCEPTER AREA OF EFFECT: 300
finger_of_death.desc:
Rips at an enemy unit, trying to turn it inside-out. Deals massive damage.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
finger_of_death.lore: Lion's disfigured hand is also the source of his greatest power, capable of flooding victims with malefic force.
finger_of_death.notes: Finger of Death has a 0.25 delay before the damage is applied after the spell is cast, allowing certain abilities to avoid the damage.

impale.affects: ABILITY: Unit Target, Point TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
impale.desc: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
impale.lore: The Demon Witch exercises his demonic covenant, opening a fissure from hell.
impale.notes: The spikes move at 1600 units per second.

mana_drain.affects: ABILITY: Channeled, Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
mana_drain.attrib:
CHANNEL TIME: 5
MANA PER SECOND: 20 / 40 / 60 / 120
BREAK DISTANCE: 1200
mana_drain.desc: CHANNELED - Absorbs the magical energies of a target enemy unit by taking mana from it every second.
mana_drain.lore: Lesser magi are nothing more than a source of magical restoration for the Demon Witch.

voodoo.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
voodoo.desc: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless beast, with all special abilities disabled.
voodoo.lore: Lion is compelled to share his transfiguration, twisting the essence of those who oppose him.
voodoo.notes: Instantly destroys illusions.The target will have a base movement speed of 100, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.Hex disables damage block.

rabid.desc: Increases the attack and movement speed of Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear.
rabid.lore: Bears are not commonly seen as being agile creatures, but can actually move rather quickly, especially when enraged.

savage_roar.affects: ABILITY: No TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
savage_roar.attrib:
RANGE: 325
ENEMY MOVEMENT SPEED BONUS: 20%
DURATION: 1.2 / 1.6 / 2 / 2.4
savage_roar.desc: Lone Druid roars fiercely causing nearby enemies to flee towards their base in terror. Their movement speed is increased by 20%.
savage_roar.lore: Sylla studies and masters the arts of the lost Bear Clan, enhancing his attunement with the wild.
savage_roar.notes: An entangled hero will not be able to move.Cooldown is shared with Spirit Bear.

spirit_bear.attrib:
BEAR HP: 1400 / 1800 / 2300 / 2700
BEAR HP REGEN: 2 / 3 / 4 / 5
BEAR BASE ATTACK TIME: 1.75 / 1.65 / 1.55 / 1.45
BEAR ARMOR: 3 / 4 / 5 / 6
BACKLASH PURE DAMAGE: 10%
spirit_bear.desc:
Summons a powerful Spirit Bear companion that can equip items.  If the bear moves 1100 distance away from the Lone Druid, it cannot attack.  Lone Druid suffers 10% of his max health as backlash damage if the Spirit Bear dies.  As the bear increases in levels, it can learn the Return, Entangling Claws, and Demolish abilities.  Spirit Bear does not benefit from attributes.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
spirit_bear.lore: Sylla's lifelong companion is symbiotic with his spirit and heart, coming to aid him in any time of need.
spirit_bear.notes: Most spells interact with the Spirit Bear in the same way as they do with heroes.You can't resummon the bear if it has taken damage in the past 3 seconds.Using Hand of Midas from Spirit Bear grants the earned XP to Lone Druid.

true_form.attrib:
BASE ATTACK TIME: 1.5 / 1.5 / 1.5
BONUS ARMOR: 4 / 6 / 8
BONUS HP: 300 / 600 / 900
BASE SPEED LOSS: 45
TRANSFORM TIME: 1.933
true_form.desc:
Lone Druid learns to morph himself into a raging bear, losing his ranged advantage and some base movement speed, but gaining melee power as well as the Battle Cry ability.  He can morph freely between druid and bear form.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
true_form.lore: The mighty bear is the king of the forest, possessing the throne through raw power.
true_form.notes: You can dodge stuns during the 2 second duration of transforming.Manta Style's cooldown time will be based on whether Lone Druid was in his ranged or melee form when the item was used.

true_form_battle_cry.attrib:
BONUS DAMAGE: 70 / 100 / 130
BONUS ARMOR: 10 / 15 / 20
DURATION: 6
RADIUS: 1000
true_form_battle_cry.desc: Adds attack damage and armor to the Lone Druid as well as any nearby units under his control.
true_form_battle_cry.lore: When Sylla cries in the forest, the reverberations are felt for a great distance.

true_form_druid.desc:
Return to Druid form.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

eclipse.affects: ABILITY: No TargetAFFECTS: Allied UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
eclipse.attrib:
TOTAL BEAMS: 5 / 8 / 11
MAX BEAMS PER UNIT: 5
ECLIPSE DURATION: 2.4 / 4.2 / 6
RADIUS: 675 / 675 / 675
SCEPTER TOTAL BEAMS: 6 / 12 / 18
SCEPTER DURATION: 1.8 / 3.6 / 5.4
SCEPTER CAST RANGE: 2500
eclipse.desc:
Showers random nearby enemies with strikes from Luna's current level of Lucent Beam. These beams do not stun their targets, and there is a maximum number of times that a single target can be struck. Also turns day into night for 10 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
eclipse.lore: In times of great need, Selemene herself descends into the world, blocking out the light and hope of the opposed.
eclipse.notes: Eclipse doesn't work if Luna doesn't have any points in Lucent Beam.Beams will stop if Luna is killed.Eclipse Lucent Beams do not stun.Will not hit invisible units.There is a .6 seconds gap between beams, .3 seconds with scepter.

lucent_beam.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
lucent_beam.desc: Calls a beam of lunar energy down upon an enemy, damaging and briefly stunning them.
lucent_beam.lore: Selemene smites those who encroach upon the Nightsilver Woods.

lunar_blessing.attrib:
BLESSING RADIUS: 900 / 900 / 900 / 900
BONUS DAMAGE: 14 / 22 / 30 / 38
BONUS NIGHT VISION: 1000 / 1000 / 1000 / 1000
lunar_blessing.desc: Increases the damage dealt by attacks from Luna and nearby allied heroes. Luna is also blessed with increased vision range at night.
lunar_blessing.lore: The Goddess of the Moon smiles upon her kin.

moon_glaive.attrib:
BOUNCE RADIUS: 500
BOUNCES: 1 / 2 / 3 / 6
DAMAGE REDUCTION PER BOUNCE: 35%
moon_glaive.desc: Empowers Luna's glaive, causing her attacks to bounce between enemy units. Deals less damage with each bounce.
moon_glaive.lore: Carefully sharpened, Luna's boomerang-like weapon cuts a wide swath through enemy numbers.

feral_impulse.attrib:
RADIUS: 900 / 900 / 900 / 900
BONUS ATTACK SPEED: 15 / 20 / 25 / 30
BONUS DAMAGE: 15% / 20% / 25% / 30%
feral_impulse.desc: Increases the damage and attack speed of Lycan and all units under his control.
feral_impulse.lore: His animalistic symbiosis with canine kind gives Banehallow enhanced reflexes and hunting capabilities.

howl.attrib:
DURATION: 10
HERO BONUS DAMAGE: 14 / 26 / 38 / 50
MINION BONUS DAMAGE: 5 / 10 / 15 / 20
howl.desc: Grants bonus damage to Lycan, all allied heroes and all units under their control.
howl.lore: Blood-curdling wolf cries signal to opponents that Banehallow is among them.

shapeshift.attrib:
DURATION: 18
SHAPESHIFT MOVE SPEED: 650
BONUS NIGHT VISION: 1000
TRANSFORM TIME: 1.5
CRITICAL CHANCE: 40%
CRITICAL DAMAGE: 140% / 160% / 180%
shapeshift.desc: Lycan assumes his lupine form, granting him and his units critical strikes and added vision at night. During Shapeshift, Lycan and all units under his control move at increased speed, cannot be slowed and have a 40% chance to deal a critical strike doing 140% damage.
shapeshift.lore: Forever a slave to his lycanthropy, Banehallow has come to accept his curse, and embrace his own savagery.
shapeshift.notes: Hex doesn't remove Lycan's movement speed.Lycan has a smaller collision size in this state.

summon_wolves.desc: Summons two wolves to fight for Lycan.  Level 2-4 wolves have Cripple, level 3-4 wolves have permanent invisibility, and level 4 wolves have 15 HP regen.
summon_wolves.lore: The very enchantment that twisted his being also summons canine familiars.
summon_wolves.notes: If wolves are summoned during the duration of Howl, they will receive the buff until the end of its duration.Spirit Wolves have 80% magic damage resistance.Using this spell will replace currently active Spirit Wolves.

and_storm.affects: ABILITY: No Target, ChanneledDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
and_storm.desc: CHANNELED - Sand King creates a fearsome sandstorm that damages enemy units while hiding him from vision.  The invisibility remains for a short duration after the sandstorm ends.
and_storm.lore: Some say Crixalis is a mirage; his carapace appearing then vanishing between the whirling sands of the Scintillant Waste.
and_storm.notes: Sand Storm can be used to dodge projectiles.

empower.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Allied UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
empower.attrib:
DURATION: 40 / 40 / 40 / 40
BONUS DAMAGE: 20% / 30% / 40% / 50%
CLEAVE DAMAGE: 20% / 30% / 40% / 50%
CLEAVE RADIUS: 200
empower.desc:
Gives an allied unit bonus damage and cleave on attack.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
empower.lore: With a deep bellow, Magnus displays his true power.
empower.notes: The bonus damage is based only on base damage and damage from primary attributes.Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value.Cleave damage goes through spell immunity.Ranged units cannot Cleave.

reverse_polarity.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
reverse_polarity.attrib:
PULL RADIUS: 410
DAMAGE: 50 / 125 / 200
HERO STUN DURATION: 2.25 / 3 / 3.75
CREEP STUN DURATION: 3 / 4 / 5
reverse_polarity.desc: Magnus changes properties of matter, sucking all nearby enemies in front of him and stunning them with a powerful slam and dealing damage.
reverse_polarity.lore: Magnus fights with the fury of the erupting Mt. Joerlak.
reverse_polarity.notes: Disable and pull work through spell immunity.

shockwave.affects: ABILITY: Unit Target, Point TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
shockwave.desc: Magnus sends out a wave of force, damaging enemy units in a line.
shockwave.lore: Mt. Joerlak was a somewhat unstable mass, and Magnus has learned to channel its reverberations.

skewer.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
skewer.desc: Magnus rushes forward, goring enemy units on his massive tusk.  Heroes hit on the way will be dragged to the destination, then damaged and slowed.
skewer.lore: Magnoceros horns are valuable in direct proportion to their danger to prospective merchants.

g_burrowstrike.affects: ABILITY: Unit Target, Point TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
g_burrowstrike.desc:
Sand King burrows into the ground and tunnels forward, damaging and stunning enemy units above him as he resurfaces.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
g_burrowstrike.lore: Crixalis often lies in wait, burrowing under the surface to ambush his adversaries.

mana_shield.desc: Creates a shield that absorbs 60% of the incoming damage in exchange for Medusa's mana.
mana_shield.lore: While Medusa was not gifted with eternal life upon birth, her curse bestowed her with impressive defensive powers.
mana_shield.notes: Absorbs damage before any damage reduction takes place, meaning that armor will not reduce the amount of mana needed to absorb damage.

mystic_snake.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
mystic_snake.attrib:
JUMP RADIUS: 475 / 475 / 475 / 475
JUMPS: 3 / 4 / 5 / 6
DAMAGE: 80 / 120 / 160 / 200
MANA STEAL: 11% / 14% / 17% / 20%
DAMAGE INCREASE PER JUMP: 35%
mystic_snake.desc: A mystic snake made of energy jumps from target to target dealing damage and stealing mana. After it reaches its last target, it returns to Medusa to replenish her with mana. The snake deals more damage per jump and steals 11% of the targets' total mana. Deals Pure damage to units petrified by Stone Gaze.
mystic_snake.lore: The Gorgon's curse is her greatest strength.

split_shot.affects: ABILITY: No Target, TogglePIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
split_shot.desc:
Medusa magically splits her shot into several arrows. These arrows deal a lower percent of her normal damage.

The extra targets will not receive other attack effects (such as critical strike) and Unique Attack Modifiers.
split_shot.lore: All who encounter the cursed Gorgon will feel her rage.
split_shot.notes: Secondary targets will be the closest enemy units excluding the primary target.If illusions of Medusa are created while Split Shot is active, they will also have this ability.

stone_gaze.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
stone_gaze.attrib:
RADIUS: 1000 / 1000 / 1000
DURATION: 5 / 6 / 7
SLOW: 35%
STONE DURATION: 3
BONUS PHYSICAL DAMAGE: 50%
stone_gaze.desc: Any enemy units looking at Medusa will have their movement and attack speed slowed.  If 2 seconds of total time is accumulated looking at Medusa while Stone Gaze is active, that unit will turn to stone.  Petrified units are stunned, have 100% magic damage resistance, and take bonus physical damage.  If the petrified unit is an illusion, it is immediately killed.
stone_gaze.lore: The beauty of Medusa is legendary.
stone_gaze.notes: Affects Spell Immune units.Regardless of when a unit receives the Stone Gaze buff while the ability is active on Medusa, it will still receive the full debuff duration.

divided_we_stand.desc:
Meepo summons an imperfect, semi-autonomous duplicate of himself, which can gain gold and experience as he does and shares his experience and abilities. However, the clones cannot wield any items but the boots that Meepo himself wears.  If any of the clones die, they all die.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
divided_we_stand.notes: Clones can't use Arcane Boots or pick up runes.

earthbind.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
earthbind.desc: Tosses a net at the target point, pinning down all enemy units.  Earthbind prevents invisibility, blink, and interrupts channeling.
earthbind.lore: Catching dinner in the Riftshadow Ruins can be quite the task.
earthbind.notes: While preventing units from going invisible, Earthbind won't hit units that are already invisible.Does not work on Spell Immune units or Roshan.

geostrike.desc: Meepo enchants his weapon to deal damage per second, as well as slow the movement speed of the attacked unit.  Geostrikes from multiple Meepos stack.
geostrike.lore: Keeping your pack light and having few but versatile tools is the best bet for survival.

poof.affects: ABILITY: Unit Target, Point TargetAFFECTS: Allied HeroesPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
poof.desc: Drawing mystical energies from the earth, a Meepo can teleport to another Meepo or itself after channeling for 1.5 seconds, dealing damage in both the departure and arrival locations.
poof.lore: Sometimes breaking one of the Riftshadow Crystals can be just the trick for getting yourself out of a bind.  Or your other self.
poof.notes: Can be cast through the minimap.Can teleport to Meepo illusions.

meepo.droles: Carry - Escape - Nuker - Disabler - Initiator - Pusher

arrow.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
arrow.attrib:
RANGE: 3000
MINIMUM STUN: 0.01
MAXIMUM STUN: 5
MAXIMUM BONUS DAMAGE: 140
arrow.desc: Fires a long-range arrow with deadly precision, which stuns and damages the first enemy unit it strikes. The stun duration ranges from 0.01 to 5 seconds, with bonus damage up to 140 added, based on the distance the arrow travels to its target. Instantly kills the first non-ancient creep it hits.
arrow.lore: Lunar energies make the Princess of the Moon's arrows more deadly than most.
arrow.notes: For every 150 distance the arrow travels, the stun duration upon impact increases by 0.5 seconds, and the bonus damage added increases by 14.Sacred Arrow can hit invisible units.

invis.desc: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible. If a hero is revealed, invisibility will restore after the fade delay as long as Moonlight Shadow's duration has not expired.
invis.lore: Her tenure with Selemene allows Mirana to eclipse the ground, wrapping her allies in a cloak of shadows.
invis.notes: Units affected will not auto attack enemies.Spell Immune allies will be affected.

leap.attrib:
DISTANCE: 600 / 700 / 800 / 900
MOVEMENT BONUS: 4% / 8% / 12% / 16%
ATTACK SPEED BONUS: 8 / 16 / 24 / 32
leap.desc: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering allied units with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts 10 seconds.
leap.lore: Both friend and foe alike recognize Mirana's iconic white beast in the heat of battle.
leap.notes: You can use Leap to dodge incoming projectiles.

starfall.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
starfall.desc:
Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. The closest enemy unit to Mirana in a 425 radius will be struck a second time for 75% of the damage.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
starfall.lore: The Goddess breaks the strata to empower her Princess in the time of need.
starfall.notes: Starstorm is not blocked by Linken's Sphere.Starstorm cannot hit invisible units.Starstorm will choose a new target for the second star if the first died before impact.

adaptive_strike.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
adaptive_strike.attrib:
BASE DAMAGE: 100
DAMAGE MIN AGI MULTIPLIER: 0.25 / 0.25 / 0.25 / 0.25
DAMAGE MAX AGI MULTIPLIER: 0.5 / 1 / 1.5 / 2
STUN MIN: 0.25 / 0.25 / 0.25 / 0.25
STUN MAX: 1.25 / 2.25 / 3.25 / 4.25
CAST RANGE: 600 / 700 / 800 / 900
adaptive_strike.desc: Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, stunning the target while dealing base damage plus additional damage based on Morphling's agility times a multiplier.  If Morphling's agility is 50% higher than strength, the maximum damage and the minimum stun is dealt. If his strength is 50% higher than his agility, the maximum stun and minimum damage are dealt.
adaptive_strike.lore: The Morphling calls upon his elements to crush his opponents with waves.
adaptive_strike.notes: Knocks the target back 100 - 300 units.Projectile moves at 1150 speed.

hybrid.desc: Morphling creates a hybrid replication of a target allied hero, which can cast all of that hero's current, non-ultimate abilities. Enemies are able to see which unit is a hybrid.

morph_agi.attrib:
MANA PER SECOND: 30 / 30 / 30 / 30
POINTS PER SHIFT: 1
SHIFT RATE: 0.5 / 0.25 / 0.125 / 0.0625
BONUS AGILITY: 3 / 4 / 5 / 6
morph_agi.desc: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Strength and pouring them into Agility. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Morph increase the rate of stat change.  Passively grants bonus Agility.
morph_agi.lore: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.
morph_agi.notes: Morph can be activated or deactivated while Morphling is disabled, but not while silenced.Morph can't convert stats from items.

morph_replicate.desc: Morphling switches into his replication, instantly taking its position.

morph_str.attrib:
MANA PER SECOND: 30 / 30 / 30 / 30
POINTS PER SHIFT: 1
SHIFT RATE: 0.5 / 0.25 / 0.125 / 0.0625
BONUS STRENGTH: 3 / 4 / 5 / 6
morph_str.desc: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Agility and pouring them into Strength. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Morph increase the rate of stat change.  Passively grants bonus Strength.
morph_str.lore: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.
morph_str.notes: Morph works while Morphling is disabled, but not when silenced.Morph can't convert stats from items.

replicate.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
replicate.attrib:
DURATION: 30 / 45 / 60
REPLICATE DAMAGE: 80%
REPLICATE DAMAGE TAKEN: 100% / 100% / 100%
CAST RANGE: 700 / 1100 / 1500
replicate.desc: Morphling replicates any hero, friend or foe, dealing 80% of the original Hero's outgoing damage while taking 100% of any incoming damage.  At any time, Morphling can instantly take the position of the Replicate for 150 mana. If Morphling dies, the Replicate will expire.
replicate.lore: Staring into Morphling produces a reflection that mimics the beholder.
replicate.notes: You can't target yourself with Replicate.

waveform.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
waveform.desc: Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path.  Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.
waveform.lore: A torrential flood takes enemies by force.

ensnare.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
ensnare.desc: Interrupts the target and traps them in place, preventing movement or blinking.
ensnare.lore: The only way to escape the onslaught of a Slithereen is to never oppose one in the first place.

mirror_image.attrib:
IMAGE DURATION: 30 / 30 / 30 / 30
IMAGE DAMAGE: 25% / 30% / 35% / 40%
IMAGE DAMAGE TAKEN: 600% / 500% / 400% / 300%
mirror_image.desc: Creates three images of Naga Siren under her control.
mirror_image.lore: Slithice, while being strong in her own right, is notoriously hard to track down.
mirror_image.notes: Naga Siren is invulnerable for 0.3 seconds when casting, allowing her to dodge stuns and damage.Upon casting, most effects are removed from Naga Siren.

rip_tide.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
rip_tide.desc: The Naga Siren and her images hit all nearby units with a damaging wave of water that lowers armor for 8 seconds.
rip_tide.lore: A torrent from the Deep Ones crushes the defenses of the Siren's enemies.
rip_tide.notes: Naga's illusions will also cast Rip Tide, but enemies in multiple areas of effect will only be hit once.

song_of_the_siren.affects: ABILITY: No TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
song_of_the_siren.desc:
All enemies in range of the Naga Siren are put into a magical stasis where they cannot act or be attacked. Using Song of the Siren again will end the duration early.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
song_of_the_siren.lore: Slithice's powerful voice enchants leagues of opponents, while calling her Slithereen kin in a time of need.
song_of_the_siren.notes: Units affected by Song of the Siren are invulnerable and cannot take damage from any source.Doesn't affect Spell Immune units.The area of the song follows Naga, so if she moves far enough away from affected units, they will wake up.

song_of_the_siren_cancel.desc: Release enemy units from your song so they can be targeted again.

naga_siren.droles: Carry - Support - Pusher - Disabler - Initiator - Escape

death_pulse.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
death_pulse.desc: Necrophos releases a wave of death around him, dealing damage to enemy units and healing allied units.
death_pulse.lore: Combining his monk heritage with his newfound affinity for plague has a menacing result.
death_pulse.notes: Death Pulse can't be disjointed.Can heal Spell Immune units.

heartstopper_aura.affects: ABILITY: Passive, AuraAFFECTS: EnemiesPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
heartstopper_aura.desc: Necrophos stills the hearts of his opponents, causing nearby enemy units to lose a percentage of their max health over time.
heartstopper_aura.lore: Those who come within a short distance of Necrophos can feel pestilence and plague in the air.
heartstopper_aura.notes: Damage won't disable items like Blink Dagger.Does not affect ancient creeps.

reapers_scythe.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy HeroesDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
reapers_scythe.attrib:
DAMAGE PER MISSING HP: 0.6 / 0.75 / 0.9
STUN DURATION: 1.5 / 1.5 / 1.5
SCEPTER MANA COST: 150 / 340 / 500
SCEPTER COOLDOWN: 70
SCEPTER DAMAGE PER MISSING HP: 0.6 / 0.9 / 1.2
ADDED RESPAWN TIME: 10 / 20 / 30
reapers_scythe.desc:
Stuns the target enemy hero, then deals damage based on how much life it is missing. Heroes killed by Reaper's Scythe will have 10 seconds added to their respawn timer. Any kill under this effect is credited to Necrophos.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
reapers_scythe.lore: The amount of death and suffering in the air increases the power of Necrophos's plague magic.
reapers_scythe.notes: Damage is dealt at the end of the stun.The stun goes through spell immunity, but not the damage.

sadist.desc: Necrophos gains health and mana regeneration for every unit he kills. Hero kills grant 10 times the regen bonus.
sadist.lore: Poor souls who succumb to Rotund'jere's plagues are recycled for future use.
sadist.notes: Sadist is also triggered by denies.Stacks independently with itself.

dark_lord.affects: ABILITY: Passive, AuraAFFECTS: EnemiesPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
dark_lord.desc: Shadow Fiend's presence reduces the armor of nearby enemies.
dark_lord.lore: Even being near Nevermore eats away at one's soul.
dark_lord.notes: Stacks fully with other armor reduction abilities and aura.

necromastery.attrib:
DAMAGE PER SOUL: 2
MAX SOULS: 15 / 22 / 29 / 36
SCEPTER MAX SOULS: 22 / 30 / 38 / 46
necromastery.desc:
Shadow Fiend steals the soul from units he kills, gaining bonus damage. If the killed unit is a hero, he gains 12 souls.  On death, he releases half of them from bondage.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
necromastery.lore: Harvested souls swirl in and out of the Abysm, empowering the Shadow Fiend to increase the size of his collection.
necromastery.notes: Denies and neutral creeps also provide bonus damage through Necromastery.

requiem.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
requiem.attrib:
CAST DELAY: 1.67
MOVEMENT REDUCTION: 25%
DAMAGE REDUCTION: 50%
REDUCTION DURATION: 5.000000
SCEPTER HEAL ON RETURN: 100%
SCEPTER DAMAGE ON RETURN: 40%
requiem.desc:
Shadow Fiend gathers his captured souls to release them as lines of demonic energy. Units near Shadow Fiend when the souls are released can be damaged by several lines of energy. Any unit damaged by Requiem of Souls will have its movement speed and attack damage reduced. Lines of energy are created for every 2 souls captured through Necromastery. Requiem of Souls is automatically cast whenever Shadow Fiend dies, regardless of its cooldown.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
requiem.lore: The captured souls of those past slain are released to ravage their former allies.
requiem.notes: One line is generated from Shadow Fiend for every 2 souls in his possession, for a maximum of 18 lines (23 lines with Scepter).The movement and attack damage reductions from Requiem of Souls go through spell immunity.

shadowraze1.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
shadowraze1.desc: Shadow Fiend razes the area in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in an area.

crippling_fear.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
crippling_fear.attrib:
DAY DURATION: 3 / 3 / 3 / 3
NIGHT DURATION: 5 / 6 / 7 / 8
DAY CHANCE TO MISS: 10% / 10% / 10% / 10%
NIGHT CHANCE TO MISS: 50%
crippling_fear.desc: Night Stalker horrifies the target enemy Hero, causing it to miss attacks and become silenced.  The effect lasts longer at night.
crippling_fear.lore: A vision of the twisted maw of Balanar etches itself into the minds of the poor souls unlucky enough to cross his path.

darkness.desc:
Night Stalker smothers the sun and summons instant darkness, so that he might use his powers at their fullest. While Darkness is in effect, enemy heroes, units, wards and buildings have their vision range reduced to 675. 

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
darkness.lore: It is a humbling sight to see when the mightiest of warriors become afraid of the dark.

hunter_in_the_night.desc: Night Stalker is in his element at night, attacking and moving with great swiftness.
hunter_in_the_night.lore: The hunting prowess of Balanar improves as the night beckons.

void.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
void.attrib:
DAY DURATION: 2 / 2 / 2 / 2
NIGHT DURATION: 2.5 / 3 / 3.5 / 4
MOVE SLOW: 50% / 50% / 50% / 50%
ATTACK SLOW: 50 / 50 / 50 / 50
void.desc: Creates a damaging void that slows an enemy unit and deals damage.  Void also mini-stuns, interrupting channeling abilities. The slowing effect lasts longer at night.
void.lore: Balanar creates a vortex of infinite night, tearing opponents violently into the eternal darkness that once was.

burrow.attrib:
BURROW HEALTH/MANA REGEN: 1.5%
BURROW DAMAGE REDUCTION: 40%
BURROW MANA BURN RANGE: 1050
BURROW IMPALE RANGE: 1225
BURROW IMPALE COOLDOWN: 7
BURROW SPIKED CARAPACE RANGE: 300
burrow.desc: Nyx Assassin buries himself beneath the battlefield over a short duration. Once burrowed, Spiked Carapace instantly stuns nearby enemies when cast, the range of Mana Burn and Impale is increased, and Impale's cooldown is decreased. While burrowed, Nyx Assassin is stationary, unable to attack, and invisible. His health and mana regeneration are also increased, and he gains damage reduction from all damage sources.
burrow.lore: Some castes of zealot scarab are known to create small burrows to lie in wait, ready to ambush their prey.

impale.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
impale.desc: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
impale.lore: All zealot scarabs possess intimate knowledge of underground pathways, using them to their advantage.
impale.notes: The spikes move at 1600 units per second, over 700 range.Impale cannot be blocked by Linken's Sphere.

mana_burn.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy HeroesDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
mana_burn.desc: Destroys the target hero's mana equal to a multiplier of its Intelligence, and deals damage equal to the mana burned.
mana_burn.lore: The tome in Ultimyr describes one scarab with the ability eat away at the mind of lesser beings.

spiked_carapace.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: PurePIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
spiked_carapace.desc:
When activated while above ground, Spiked Carapace reflects and negates damage dealt to Nyx Assassin (max once from each source), as well as stunning the source of the damage. Activating Spiked Carapace will not break Vendetta invisibility.

While Burrowed, Spiked Carapace instantly stuns nearby enemies when cast.
spiked_carapace.lore: While their carapace is relatively thin, it's guarded by a retractable field of razor-sharp spikes.
spiked_carapace.notes: The damage is calculated after all reductions.Spiked Carapace will only trigger on damage from other player controlled units.

unburrow.lore: Some castes of zealot scarab are known to create small burrows to lie in wait, ready to ambush their prey.

vendetta.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: PhysicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
vendetta.desc: Allows Nyx Assassin to become invisible and gain a speed bonus.  If Nyx Assassin attacks to break the invisibility, massive bonus damage is dealt with the attack.
vendetta.lore: The scarab kills for the glory of his queen.
vendetta.notes: Has a 0 second fadetime.If a spell is used to break the invisibility, or the invisibility expires, the bonus damage is lost.

arcane_orb.affects: ABILITY: Auto-Cast, Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: PurePIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
arcane_orb.attrib:
MANA POOL TO DAMAGE: 6% / 7% / 8% / 9%
ILLUSION DAMAGE: 100 / 200 / 300 / 400
INTELLIGENCE STEAL: 1 / 2 / 3 / 4
STEAL DURATION: 50
arcane_orb.desc:
Adds extra pure damage to Outworld Devourer's attacks, based on his remaining mana pool. Steals 1 intelligence for 50 seconds per hit when attacking an enemy hero. Arcane Orb also does bonus damage to summoned units and illusions.

Arcane Orb is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
arcane_orb.lore: Harbinger's outworldly knowledge allows it to tap into the ebb and flow of all spiritual energy, infusing it into his being.
arcane_orb.notes: The damage is calculated after the mana cost is spent.

astral_imprisonment.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
astral_imprisonment.desc: Places a target unit into an astral prison. The hidden unit is invulnerable and disabled. When the astral prison implodes, it deals 75 damage to enemies in a 400 radius around the target.
astral_imprisonment.lore: Locked away in the pocket between this world and the Outworld, victims realize their infantile knowledge and mortality.
astral_imprisonment.notes: Imprisoned units are hidden and invulnerable.Imprisoned units can still be hit by Sanity's Eclipse.

essence_aura.attrib:
RADIUS: 900
BASE MANA: 75 / 150 / 225 / 300
RESTORED MANA: 10% / 15% / 20% / 25%
RESTORE CHANCE: 40%
essence_aura.desc: Whenever nearby allied Heroes or Outworld Devourer itself casts a spell, it gains a chance to restore a percentage of its mana pool.  Outworld Devourer also passively gains a bonus to its base mana pool.  Several skills with no cooldown and toggled spells cannot trigger Essence Aura.
essence_aura.lore: The crystals of the Outworld produce arcane power, and the Harbinger channels it into the world of mortals.
essence_aura.notes: Other than Arcane Orb, most skills without cooldowns cannot trigger Essence Aura.

sanity_eclipse.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
sanity_eclipse.attrib:
INT DIFF DAMAGE MULTIPLIER: 8 / 9 / 10
RADIUS: 375 / 475 / 575
CAST RANGE: 700
sanity_eclipse.desc:
Unleashes a psychic blast that removes 40% of the mana from affected heroes, while also damaging them based on the difference between the affected hero's Intelligence and Outworld Devourer's. If an enemy hero has the same or higher Intelligence than Outworld Devourer, Sanity's Eclipse will not cause damage. Sanity's Eclipse can hit units trapped by Astral Imprisonment.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
sanity_eclipse.lore: When an Outworld crystal ruptures, cataclysmic energies are released, and the reverberations of this power are felt interdimensionally.

bloodlust.affects: ABILITY: Auto-Cast, Unit TargetAFFECTS: Allied UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
bloodlust.attrib:
BONUS MOVE SPEED: 10% / 12% / 14% / 16%
BONUS ATTACK SPEED: 30 / 40 / 50 / 60
DURATION: 30
bloodlust.desc: Incites a frenzy in a friendly unit, increasing its movement speed and attack speed. Can be cast on towers.
bloodlust.lore: 'Running's not as fun as hitting... Not one bit fun.'
bloodlust.notes: When multicast, nearby allies will be selected randomly in an 575 area of effect to receive Bloodlust.Can affect siege units.Can be cast on Spell Immune allies.

fireblast.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
fireblast.desc: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing damage and stunning the target.
fireblast.lore: The Ogre Magi is easily amused, entertained for hours by playing with fire.
fireblast.notes: When Multicast, Fireblast hits the same target each time with a 0.3 seconds interval.Mana cost is increased by 20 / 40 / 60 when learning Multi Cast.

ignite.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
ignite.desc: Drenches a target in volatile chemicals, causing it to burst into flames. The target is in immense pain, taking damage and moving more slowly.
ignite.notes: Multicast makes this spell have an area of effect (150/300/450 based on Multicast level).Multicast makes this spell have 150 additional cast range for every Multicast level.Multicast makes this spell have a chance to cast multiple times at random enemy units with 1400 area of effect.

multicast.attrib:
FIREBLAST MANA INCREASE: 20 / 40 / 60
FIREBLAST COOLDOWN REDUCTION: 2 / 4 / 6
IGNITE RADIUS: 150 / 300 / 450
IGNITE CAST RANGE INCREASE: 150 / 300 / 450
BLOODLUST RADIUS: 575
BLOODLUST COOLDOWN REDUCTION: 5 / 10 / 15
2X CAST CHANCE: 40% / 50% / 60%
3X CAST CHANCE: 0% / 20% / 25%
4X CAST CHANCE: 0% / 0% / 12.5%
multicast.desc:
Enables Ogre Magi to cast his spells multiple times with each use, while also granting his spells greater potency:
Fireblast has its cooldown decreased, its range increased, and its mana cost increased.
Ignite hits enemies in an area, its range is increased, and it may be cast onto random nearby enemies when used.
Bloodlust has its cooldown reduced, and may be cast on random nearby allies when used.
multicast.lore: Despite being largely incapacitated by his IQ, the Ogre Magi's success in battle is attributed to pure skill.

unrefined_fireblast.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
unrefined_fireblast.desc: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing damage and stunning the target. Its mana cost is 60% of Ogre Magi's current mana.
unrefined_fireblast.lore: The 'who-casts-spell-first' argument between himself is solved simply by both casting at once.

degen_aura.affects: ABILITY: Passive, AuraAFFECTS: EnemiesPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
degen_aura.desc: Greatly degenerates the movement and attack capabilities of enemy units that stray too near.
degen_aura.lore: The holy embodiment of Purist Thunderwrath is enough to weaken those of lesser faith.
degen_aura.notes: Does not affect Spell Immune units.

guardian_angel.affects: ABILITY: No TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
guardian_angel.desc:
Omniknight summons a Guardian Angel that grants immunity from physical damage.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter
guardian_angel.lore: The All Seeing One casts down his protection over those that Purist calls friend.
guardian_angel.notes: Affects allies with spell immunity.Can be purged.

purification.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Allied UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: PurePIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
purification.desc: Instantly heals a friendly unit and damages all nearby enemy units.
purification.lore: Priests of the Omniscience are adept at removing impurities from fellow warriors.

repel.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: HeroesPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
repel.desc: Creates a divine barrier around a target unit which grants them Spell Immunity and 100% resistance to Magic Damage.
repel.lore: When faced with the pit of sacrifice, Purist's resilience to magic was tested and affirmed.
repel.notes: Repel acts the same as other sources of spell immuniy, except it can be purged.

false_promise.desc: Temporarily alters an ally's destiny, delaying any healing or damage taken until False Promise ends. Any healing that is delayed by False Promise is doubled. Removes most negative status effects and disables on initial cast.
false_promise.lore: Foes and false prophets oft make lies of men's fates.
false_promise.notes: Delayed damage and healing will take armor and magic resistance reductions into account when received.The delayed damage and healing takes effect as soon as the target becomes vulnerable.

fates_edict.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
fates_edict.desc: Oracle enraptures a target, disarming them and granting them 100% magic damage resistance. Can be cast on allies and enemies.
fates_edict.lore: An unbreakable prophecy resounds: a chosen ally shall briefly suffer no magics.  Other kinds of suffering however...

fortunes_end.affects: ABILITY: Channeled, Unit TargetAFFECTS: HeroesDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
fortunes_end.attrib:
DAMAGE: 90 / 120 / 150 / 180
MIN STOP DURATION: 0.5
MAX STOP DURATION: 2.5
RADIUS: 300
fortunes_end.desc: CHANNELED - Gathers Oracle's power into a bolt of scouring energy that, when released, damages, stops movement, and purges enemies of buffs in an area around the target. If target is an ally it will only purge. Can be channeled for up to 2.5 seconds. The stop duration is equal to the time spent channeling.
fortunes_end.lore: The astral orb crackles with power while raw energy lances out, temporarily disrupting an enemy's connection to their own body.

purifying_flames.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
purifying_flames.attrib:
DAMAGE: 90 / 180 / 270 / 360
HEAL PER SECOND: 11 / 22 / 33 / 44
TOTAL HEAL: 99 / 198 / 297 / 396
DURATION: 9
SCEPTER COOLDOWN: 1
purifying_flames.desc:
Burns away impurities, dealing heavy magic damage to the target before causing them to regenerate health over time. The amount of health regenerated over its duration exceeds the amount of initial damage. Can be cast on enemies and allies.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
purifying_flames.lore: Like a hall of mirrors might amplify the light of a single candle, the shattered walls of the universe can transform the light of prophecy into a burning torch.
purifying_flames.notes: The healing from Purifying Flames can be stacked with itself.

blur.desc:
Phantom Assassin focuses inward, increasing her ability to evade enemy attacks, and allowing her to blur her body to disappear from the enemy team's minimap when far from enemy heroes.

Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
blur.lore: Meditation allows a Veiled Sister to carefully anticipate her opponents in combat.

coup_de_grace.desc: Phantom Assassin refines her combat abilities, gaining a chance of delivering a devastating critical strike to enemy units. Stifling Dagger shares the same critical strike chance.
coup_de_grace.lore: A divine strike, Mortred honors her opponent by choosing them for death.

phantom_strike.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
phantom_strike.attrib:
BONUS ATTACK SPEED: 130
MAX ATTACKS: 4
RANGE: 1000 / 1000 / 1000 / 1000
phantom_strike.desc: Teleports to a unit, friendly or enemy, and grants bonus attack speed while attacking if it's an enemy unit.
phantom_strike.lore: Mortred's silken veil is the last thing her unfortunate target sees.

stifling_dagger.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: PhysicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
stifling_dagger.attrib:
MOVE SLOW: 50%
SLOW DURATION: 1 / 2 / 3 / 4
BASE DAMAGE: 75
ATTACK DAMAGE: 25% / 40% / 55% / 70%
stifling_dagger.desc: Throws a dagger slowing the enemy unit's movement speed, dealing 75+25% of Phantom Assassin's attack damage as physical damage and applying attack effects from items and abilities.
stifling_dagger.lore: The first skill learned by the Sisters of the Veil often signals an incoming hit.
stifling_dagger.notes: If an attack effect is chance-based, the chance of its application will be the same as its chance to occur.

doppelwalk.attrib:
TARGET AREA SIZE: 325
ILLUSION GATHER RANGE: 900
REAPPEAR DELAY: 1
DOPPELGANGER DURATION: 8
doppelwalk.desc: Phantom Lancer briefly vanishes from the battlefield. After 1 second, Phantom Lancer and any of his nearby illusions reappear at a random position within the targeted location, along with two additional doppelgangers. The two added doppelgangers have different properties: one takes normal damage and deals none, while the other takes 600% damage and deals 20% damage.
doppelwalk.lore: Dread Magus Vorn's death imbued the Phantom Lancer with the ability to bend and fracture all spectrums of light.
doppelwalk.notes: This ability can be used to dodge projectiles, and dispell debuffs.Trees near a reappearing unit will be destroyed.Phantom Lancer and his allies can see which illusion is the 100% damage illusion.

juxtapose.attrib:
MAX ILLUSIONS: 5 / 7 / 9
HERO TRIGGER CHANCE: 40% / 45% / 50%
ILLUSION TRIGGER CHANCE: 8%
ILLUSION DAMAGE: 16%
ILLUSION DAMAGE TAKEN: 500%
juxtapose.desc: Phantom Lancer has a chance to fracture his presence, creating an illusion of himself. Illusions also have a chance to fracture further. Illusions created from Phantom Lancer last for 8 seconds, while illusions created from other illusions last 4 seconds.
juxtapose.lore: Each of Azwraith's lance attacks feels like two from a normal warrior; or three; or four...
juxtapose.notes: Illusions created by Juxtapose will attack the target that the ability was triggered upon.

phantom_edge.attrib:
MIN RUSH DISTANCE: 300
MAX RUSH DISTANCE: 600 / 700 / 800 / 900
phantom_edge.desc: When targetting an enemy for an attack, Phantom Lancer quickly charges into range. Phantom Lancer's illusions also have this ability.
phantom_edge.lore: Azwraith knows that on the field of battle, speed can mean everything.
phantom_edge.notes: If the attack order is cancelled, the movement speed bonus is lost.Rush movement speed is 800.

spirit_lance.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
spirit_lance.attrib:
SLOW DURATION: 3.25
MOVEMENT SLOW: 10% / 20% / 30% / 40%
ILLUSION DURATION: 2 / 4 / 6 / 8
ILLUSION DAMAGE: 20% / 20% / 20% / 20%
ILLUSION DAMAGE TAKEN: 400% / 400% / 400% / 400%
spirit_lance.desc: Sends a magical spirit lance to a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while summoning an illusory phantom to attack the unit.
spirit_lance.lore: Azwraith's proficiency at spearing his family's meal of fish is proving quite useful in the battlefield.
spirit_lance.notes: Nearby illusions will mimic the cast animation.

fire_spirits.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
fire_spirits.attrib:
HP COST: 20%
SPIRIT DURATION: 16 / 16 / 16 / 16
RADIUS: 175 / 175 / 175 / 175
BURN DURATION: 4
ATTACK SPEED SLOW: 80 / 100 / 120 / 140
DAMAGE PER SECOND: 10 / 30 / 50 / 70
fire_spirits.desc: Summons 4 fire spirits that circle around Phoenix. Each spirit can be launched independently at a targeted area of effect. Affected enemy units take damage over time and have their attack speed greatly reduced.
fire_spirits.lore: The ever-collapsing core of Phoenix often emits short-lived bursts of conscious light.
fire_spirits.notes: Fire Spirits reveal the area they strike for 1 second.

icarus_dive.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
icarus_dive.attrib:
HP COST: 15%
DIVE LENGTH: 1400
BURN DURATION: 4
DAMAGE PER SECOND: 10 / 30 / 50 / 70
MOVE SLOW: 25%
icarus_dive.desc: Phoenix dives forward in an arc with a fixed distance in the targeted direction, dealing damage over time and slowing the movement speed of any units it comes into contact with, and then orbiting back to its original position. If Phoenix casts Supernova, the dive ends.
icarus_dive.lore: Though no stranger to travelling the cosmic void, soaring within an atmosphere offers unique pleasures.
icarus_dive.notes: Icarus Dive has a 2 second travel duration, and can be cancelled by casting the ability again while in flight.

launch_fire_spirit.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
launch_fire_spirit.attrib:
HP COST: 20%
SPIRIT DURATION: 16 / 16 / 16 / 16
