RADIUS: 175 / 175 / 175 / 175
BURN DURATION: 4
ATTACK SPEED SLOW: 80 / 100 / 120 / 140
DAMAGE PER SECOND: 10 / 30 / 50 / 70
launch_fire_spirit.desc: Each fire spirit can be launched independently at a targeted area of effect. Affected enemy units take damage over time and have their attack speed greatly reduced. Reveals the area it strikes for 1 second.

sun_ray.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: PurePIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
sun_ray.attrib:
HEALTH COST PER SECOND: 6%
BASE DAMAGE PER SECOND: 15 / 20 / 25 / 30
MAX DAMAGE: 1.25% / 2.5% / 3.75% / 5%
BASE HEAL PER SECOND: 7 / 10 / 13 / 16
MAX HEAL: 0.625% / 1.25% / 1.875% / 2.5%
DURATION: 6
sun_ray.desc: Phoenix expels a beam of light at the cost of its own health. The beam damages enemies and heals allies for a base amount plus a percentage of their health. The percentage increases as the beam continues to fire.
sun_ray.lore: The vent through which such stellar energy flows is mere atoms wide.
sun_ray.notes: Sun Ray has a width of 130 units, and a length of 1300 units.

sun_ray_toggle_move.desc: Toggles slow forward movement during Sun Ray firing.

supernova.affects: ABILITY: No TargetAFFECTS: Allied HeroesDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
supernova.attrib:
RADIUS: 1000 / 1000 / 1000
DAMAGE PER SECOND: 60 / 90 / 120
STUN DURATION: 1.5 / 2 / 2.5
ATTACKS TO DESTROY: 5 / 8 / 11
SCEPTER ATTACKS TO DESTROY: 7 / 10 / 13
DURATION: 6
SCEPTER CAST RANGE: 500
supernova.desc:
The Phoenix willingly ends its current life for the chance to be reborn. Transforms into a burning sun that scorches enemies in a huge area. The sun can be destroyed by attacks from enemy Heroes. After 6 seconds the sun explodes, stunning all nearby enemies while restoring Phoenix to full health and mana with refreshed abilities.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
supernova.lore: The solar crucible of a Supernova may be fatal, yet from its flames arise new beacons to wander infinity.

dream_coil.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
dream_coil.attrib:
COIL DURATION: 6 / 6 / 6
INITIAL DAMAGE: 100 / 150 / 200
BREAK RADIUS: 600 / 600 / 600
BREAK STUN DURATION: 1.5 / 2.25 / 3
BREAK DAMAGE: 100 / 150 / 200
SCEPTER COIL DURATION: 8
SCEPTER BREAK DAMAGE: 200 / 250 / 300
SCEPTER BREAK STUN DURATION: 1.5 / 3 / 4.5
dream_coil.desc:
Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, stunning them for 0.5 seconds and damaging them.  If the enemy hero stretches the coil by moving too far away, it snaps, stunning and dealing additional damage.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
dream_coil.lore: The Faerie Dragon sows confusion by forcing its enemies to vividly dream about their own mortality.

ethereal_jaunt.desc: Teleports Puck to a flying Illusory Orb.

illusory_orb.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
illusory_orb.desc: Puck launches a magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.
illusory_orb.lore: The playful Faerie Dragon delights in confusing others, vanishing and reappearing where unexpected.
illusory_orb.notes: The Illusory Orb grants unobstructed vision around its location while it travels.Jaunting to the Orb will disjoint projectiles.

phase_shift.desc: Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm.
phase_shift.lore: With a quip and flash, Puck returns to the alien dimension from whence it came.
phase_shift.notes: Puck retains collision size while under the effects of Phase Shift.Issuing any action will cancel Phase Shift.Puck is invulnerable during Phase Shift.

waning_rift.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
waning_rift.desc: Puck releases a burst of faerie dust that deals damage and silences enemy units nearby.
waning_rift.lore: With a mischievous grin, Puck spreads its enchanted powder which disrupts magical flow.

dismember.affects: ABILITY: Channeled, Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
dismember.desc: CHANNELED - Pudge chows down on an enemy unit, disabling it and dealing damage over time. Pudge gets healed for the same amount he damages. Lasts 3 seconds on Heroes, 6 seconds on creeps.
dismember.lore: 'When I'm through with these vermin, they'll be fit for a pie!'
dismember.notes: Dismember will disable Spell Immune units, but not damage them.If a unit becomes invisible while Dismembered, it will still be under the effects of Dismember.

flesh_heap.desc: Gives Pudge resistance to magic damage, as well as bonus strength that increases each time Pudge kills an enemy Hero or it dies in his vicinity.  Flesh Heap is retroactive, meaning it can gain charges before it is skilled, which then become active.
flesh_heap.lore: The Butcher gives new meaning to the words 'meat shield.'
flesh_heap.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.

meat_hook.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: PurePIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
meat_hook.desc:
Launches a bloody hook toward a unit or location. The hook will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to Pudge and dealing damage if it is an enemy.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
meat_hook.lore: The Butcher's hook is a symbolic nightmare, its curved blade a frightening reminder of his slaughterous intent.
meat_hook.notes: Interrupts channeling spells of the primary target if it's an enemy.Meat Hook hits invisible units.Meat Hook can go through trees, cliffs, buildings, and mechanical units.Meat Hook can drag friendly units, but they won't be damaged.

rot.affects: ABILITY: No Target, ToggleDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
rot.desc: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement--harming not only enemy units but Pudge himself.
rot.lore: A foul odor precedes a toxic, choking gas, emanating from the Butcher's putrid, ever-swelling mass.
rot.notes: Using Rot doesn't interrupt channeling.Rot hits invisible units.If Pudge is silenced, he can't deactivate Rot if it's activated.Pudge can deny himself with this ability.

decrepify.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
decrepify.attrib:
ALLY INCREASED MAGIC DAMAGE: 25%
ENEMY INCREASED MAGIC DAMAGE: 30% / 40% / 50% / 60%
ENEMY MOVE SLOW: 30% / 40% / 50% / 60%
DURATION: 3.5
decrepify.desc: A powerful banishing spell that slows a unit and renders it unable to attack or be attacked. Afflicted units take extra magic damage.
decrepify.lore: A now-mastered relic from his childhood, Pugna delights in banishing others into the Nether Realm, whether for good, evil, or simple enjoyment.
decrepify.notes: Only magical and pure damage can affect a unit under the effects of Decrepify.Doesn't slow allied units.

life_drain.affects: ABILITY: Channeled, Unit TargetAFFECTS: HeroesDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
life_drain.attrib:
DRAIN PER SECOND: 150 / 200 / 250
CAST RANGE: 900 / 1050 / 1200
MAX DURATION: 10
SCEPTER DRAIN PER SECOND: 180 / 240 / 300
life_drain.desc:
CHANNELED - When cast on an enemy, Pugna drains health from the target enemy unit to heal himself. If Pugna has full HP, and the enemy target is a Hero, Life Drain will restore mana instead.

When cast on an ally, Pugna will drain his own health into his ally.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
life_drain.lore: Pugna has truly become more powerful than even the grandmaster of Oblivion.
life_drain.notes: HP drained depends on the actual damage dealt.Illusions are destroyed on the first tick of damage.

nether_blast.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
nether_blast.desc: An exploding pulse deals damage to enemies and structures in the area.  Deals half damage to structures.
nether_blast.lore: The Arts of Oblivion include a deafening blast of emerald flames from the Nether Reaches.

nether_ward.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
nether_ward.attrib:
WARD ATTACK RANGE: 1600
DAMAGE PER MANA: 1 / 1.25 / 1.5 / 1.75
MANA REGEN REDUCTION: 1.5 / 3 / 4.5 / 6
ATTACKS TO DESTROY: 4 / 4 / 4 / 4
WARD DURATION: 30
nether_ward.desc: Pugna places a Nether Ward at the target location. The ward reduces the mana regeneration of nearby enemy heroes, and will fire at any enemy hero who casts a spell. Nether Ward deals damage equal to the damage multiplier times the mana spent by the enemy hero.
nether_ward.lore: While at the lamasery for the Arts of Oblivion, Pugna learned to dominate his classmates with a simple ward charged with Nether magic.
nether_ward.notes: Nether Ward deals damage before the actual spell is cast, so if the caster dies the spell will have no effect.Nether Ward can be decrepified.Nether Ward has 4 HP. Heroes attack it for 1 damage, while illusions and non-hero units deal 0.25 damage.

blink.desc: Short distance teleportation that allows Queen of Pain to move in and out of combat.
blink.lore: The Secret Queen lives up to her title, making her pain impossible to escape.
blink.notes: You can use Blink to dodge incoming projectiles.

scream_of_pain.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
scream_of_pain.desc: The Queen of Pain lets loose a piercing scream around her, damaging nearby enemies.
scream_of_pain.lore: The sultry voice of Akasha beckons her opponents while stealing their souls.
scream_of_pain.notes: Scream Of Pain will hit invisible units.Scream Of Pain cannot be disjointed.

shadow_strike.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
shadow_strike.attrib:
INITIAL DAMAGE: 50 / 75 / 100 / 125
DAMAGE PER TICK: 30 / 40 / 50 / 60
MOVEMENT SLOW: 20% / 30% / 40% / 50%
CAST RANGE: 450 / 475 / 500 / 525
DURATION: 15
shadow_strike.desc: Hurls a poisoned dagger which deals large initial damage, and then deals damage over time. The poisoned unit has its movement speed slowed for 15 seconds.  An instance of damage is dealt every 3 seconds.
shadow_strike.lore: Akasha's envenomed dagger allows her to delight in the drawn out suffering of her victims.
shadow_strike.notes: The affected unit slowly regains its original movement speed every second during the duration.Units afflicted by Shadow Strike can be denied by their allies when their HP drops below 25% of their maximum health.

sonic_wave.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: PurePIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
sonic_wave.attrib:
WAVE MAX RADIUS: 450
DAMAGE: 290 / 380 / 470
SCEPTER COOLDOWN: 40
SCEPTER DAMAGE: 325 / 440 / 555
sonic_wave.desc:
Creates a gigantic wave of sound in front of Queen of Pain, dealing heavy damage to all enemy units in its wake.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
sonic_wave.lore: Her most exquisite of all of torments, Akasha's Sonic Wave puts her poor foes out of their misery.
sonic_wave.notes: Sonic Wave can hit units up to 1150 units away.

battery_assault.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
battery_assault.desc: Discharges high-powered shrapnel at random nearby enemy units, dealing minor magical damage and ministun.
battery_assault.lore: Some of Rattletrap's contraptions don't quite work correctly, so detonating them proves useful as an offensive maneuver.
battery_assault.notes: Deals damage every 0.7 seconds.Remains active if Clockwerk is disabled.Total damage: 320/640/960/1280

hookshot.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
hookshot.attrib:
STUN DURATION: 1 / 1.5 / 2
RANGE: 2000 / 2500 / 3000
DAMAGE: 100 / 200 / 300
SCEPTER COOLDOWN: 12 / 12 / 12
hookshot.desc:
Fires a grappling device rapidly at the target location.  If the hook hits a unit, Clockwerk launches himself into the target, stunning and dealing damage.  Any enemies Clockwerk collides with along the way are damaged and stunned.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
hookshot.lore: A somewhat unwieldy device, the Hookshot sends the otherwise clunky Clockwerk armor flying through the air.
hookshot.notes: Hookshot will latch and take Clockwerk to allies, but not damage or disable them.Hookshot's pull and stun pierce magic immunity. The damage does not.

power_cogs.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
power_cogs.desc: Forms a barrier of energized cogs around Clockwerk, trapping any units that are near.  Enemies outside the trap that touch a cog are knocked back, losing health and mana. Once a cog has delivered a shock, it will power down.  Cogs can be destroyed by enemy attacks, but Clockwerk can destroy them with just one.
power_cogs.lore: One of Clockwerk's inventions of which he is most proud is the power cog - though it is sometimes despised by his allies.

rocket_flare.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
rocket_flare.desc: Fires a global range flare that explodes over a given area, damaging enemies and providing vision for 10 seconds.
rocket_flare.lore: What started as a festive display has become a useful scouting and bombardment tool.

eye_of_the_storm.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: PhysicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
eye_of_the_storm.attrib:
RADIUS: 500 / 500 / 500
DURATION: 30
STRIKE INTERVAL: 0.7 / 0.6 / 0.5
ARMOR REDUCTION: 1 / 1 / 1
DAMAGE: 37 / 50 / 63
SCEPTER STRIKE INTERVAL: 0.6 / 0.5 / 0.4
eye_of_the_storm.desc:
A powerful lightning storm strikes out at enemy units with the lowest health, dealing damage and reducing their armor.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
eye_of_the_storm.notes: Each blast targets the lowest health enemy unit within range.

plasma_field.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
plasma_field.desc: Releases a wave of energetic plasma that grows in power as it expands, but also zaps on contraction, dealing damage to enemy units caught in its path. Damage increases with distance from Razor.
plasma_field.lore: The Lightning Revenant rules the Underscape with plasmatic power.

static_link.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy HeroesPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
static_link.attrib:
LINK DURATION: 8
BUFF DURATION: 18 / 18 / 18 / 18
DAMAGE DRAIN RATE: 7 / 14 / 21 / 28
static_link.desc: Creates a charged link between Razor and an enemy Hero, stealing damage from the target and giving it to Razor.
static_link.lore: Razor's polarity channels electricity into his being, draining the power of his opposition.
static_link.notes: The link is broken when either unit dies or the distance between them becomes greater than 800 (1000 with Aether Lens).Can target Spell Immune units.

unstable_current.affects: ABILITY: PassiveDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
unstable_current.desc: Razor moves with increased speed, and any abilities targeted at him are instantly countered with a jolt of electricity which damages, slows, and purges buffs from enemies.
unstable_current.lore: Attacking the Lightning Revenant is rewarded with shock therapy.
unstable_current.notes: Damage activates when the spell cast on Razor.Only activates if the caster is a hero unit.

blink_strike.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
blink_strike.desc: Teleports behind the target unit, striking for bonus damage if it is an enemy.
blink_strike.lore: The Stealth Assassin's agile movement makes him impossible to escape.
blink_strike.notes: Riki's first attack after Blink Strike will be a backstab.Blink Strike's damage is dealt before the next attack.You can Blink Strike to allies, but no damage is dealt.

permanent_invisibility.affects: ABILITY: PassiveDAMAGE TYPE: PhysicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
permanent_invisibility.desc: Riki fades into the shadows, becoming invisible. Every time Riki strikes his enemy from behind, he deals bonus damage based on his Agility. When Riki attacks, he becomes visible.
permanent_invisibility.notes: Riki won't auto attack enemies while invisible.Illusions of Riki will play Backstab animations, but not deal any bonus damage.Bonus damage from Backstab can't be evaded.

smoke_screen.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
smoke_screen.attrib:
RADIUS: 250 / 275 / 300 / 325
MISS RATE: 40% / 50% / 60% / 70%
MOVEMENT SLOW: 25%
DURATION: 6
smoke_screen.desc: Throws down a smoke bomb, silencing enemies, and causing them to miss most attacks, as well as slowing movement.
smoke_screen.lore: Since his escape during the night of his betrayal, Riki has valued the use of a simple smoke screen to confuse his opponents.
smoke_screen.notes: Doesn't prevent the use of active items.

tricks_of_the_trade.desc: CHANNELED - Phases out of the world while striking every enemy from behind in a 500 AoE once per second.
tricks_of_the_trade.lore: The Stealth Assassin is not afraid to fight dirty, and specializes in attacking his opponents from behind.
tricks_of_the_trade.notes: Attacks once when casted and once per second after that.Moving while phased out will cancel the ability.

fade_bolt.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
fade_bolt.attrib:
DAMAGE: 75 / 150 / 225 / 300
JUMP REDUCTION: 4% / 4% / 4% / 4%
HERO DAMAGE REDUCTION: 20 / 25 / 30 / 35
CREEP DAMAGE REDUCTION: 10 / 13 / 15 / 17
DEBUFF DURATION: 10 / 10 / 10 / 10
fade_bolt.desc: Rubick creates a powerful stream of arcane energy that travels between enemy units, dealing damage and reducing their attack damage.  Each jump deals less damage.
fade_bolt.lore: Rubick's favorite spell for dispatching would-be assassins is a rather simple conjuration.

null_field.desc: Rubick's mastery of the arcane protects nearby allies against weaker magics, granting them magic resistance.
null_field.lore: Not every magus can be a Grand Magus...
null_field.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.

spell_steal.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy HeroesPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
spell_steal.desc:
Rubick studies the trace magical essence of one enemy hero, learning the secrets of the last spell the hero cast. Rubick can use this spell as his own for several minutes or until he dies.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
spell_steal.lore: ...but even their lesser magics can be a source of much utility.

telekinesis.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
telekinesis.attrib:
LIFT DURATION: 1.5 / 1.75 / 2 / 2.25
STUN DURATION: 1 / 1.25 / 1.5 / 1.75
IMPACT RADIUS: 325 / 325 / 325 / 325
CAST RANGE: 550 / 575 / 600 / 625
telekinesis.desc: Rubick uses his telekinetic powers to lift the enemy into the air briefly and then hurls them back at the ground. The unit lands on the ground with such force that it stuns nearby enemies.
telekinesis.lore: Even the Grandest Magus may use his powers for enjoyment.
telekinesis.notes: While the target is in the air, Rubick may use a secondary ability to throw the enemy in a targeted direction.When the unit lands, it isn't affected by the area of effect stun.The farthest you can throw an enemy is 375.

telekinesis_land.desc: Chooses the location the target will land when Telekinesis finishes.

demonic_purge.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
demonic_purge.desc:
Purges the target enemy unit, removing positive buffs, and slowing the target for the duration.  The unit slowly regains its speed until the end of the duration, upon which damage is dealt.  Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Demonic Purge.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
demonic_purge.lore: Once Shadow Demon no longer has any need for his collected cultist, he releases it from its subservience - and its life.
demonic_purge.notes: Demonic Purge will slow Spell Immune units.

disruption.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
disruption.attrib:
BANISH DURATION: 2.5 / 2.5 / 2.5 / 2.5
ILLUSION DURATION: 6 / 8 / 10 / 12
ILLUSION DAMAGE: 30% / 45% / 60% / 75%
ILLUSION DAMAGE TAKEN: 150% / 150% / 150% / 150%
disruption.desc: Banishes the targeted unit from the battlefield for a short duration.  Upon returning, two illusions of the banished unit are created under Shadow Demon's control.
disruption.lore: The pain of deception comes not while it happens, but when it is revealed.

shadow_poison.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
shadow_poison.attrib:
STACK DAMAGE: 20 / 35 / 50 / 65
MAX STACKS TO MULTIPLY: 5
RADIUS: 190
DURATION: 10 / 10 / 10 / 10
shadow_poison.desc: Deals damage in a line, and afflicts enemy units with a poison effect. The poison deals 1/2/4/8/16 times the stack damage based on the number of stacks on the target, up to 5 stacks. Additional stacks cause 50 damage each.  This deferred damage is dealt when Shadow Poison's duration is expired, or the Release sub-ability is used.
shadow_poison.lore: The ever growing influence of the Shadow Demon can pollute the most valiant and pure of heroes.
shadow_poison.notes: Shadow Poison can affect units under Disruption.

shadow_poison_release.desc: Releases the poison to do damage on all affected enemies. Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Shadow Poison.

soul_catcher.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: PurePIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
soul_catcher.desc: Curses a random enemy in an area to take increased damage.  Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Soul Catcher.
soul_catcher.lore: Trying to resist the Shadow Demon's corruption is mostly a useless endeavor.

ether_shock.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
ether_shock.desc: Creates a cone of ethereal energy that strikes multiple enemy units.
ether_shock.lore: Originally used to open shows with the travelling con-man, Rhasta's lightning display shocks adversaries in more ways than one.
ether_shock.notes: Can hit secondary targets up to 1000 distance away.

mass_serpent_ward.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: PhysicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
mass_serpent_ward.attrib:
SPLASH RADIUS: 175
SPLASH DAMAGE: 75%
ATTACK DAMAGE: 45 / 60 / 75
DURATION: 45 / 45 / 45
SCEPTER ATTACK DAMAGE: 90 / 110 / 130
mass_serpent_ward.desc:
Summons 10 serpent wards to attack enemy units and structures. The wards are immune to magic, and have a small area of splash damage. It takes two hits to destroy a single ward.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
mass_serpent_ward.lore: Snake charming was a big part of the Shadow Shaman's act; now Rhasta can empower the snakes to do his bidding.
mass_serpent_ward.notes: Serpent Wards deal piercing type splash damage.

shackles.affects: ABILITY: Channeled, Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
shackles.desc: CHANNELED - Magically binds an enemy unit so that it cannot move or attack, while dealing damage over time.
shackles.lore: A self-defense incantation, Rhasta developed shackles after his master was slain in the Bleeding Hills.

voodoo.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
voodoo.desc: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless creature, disabling their attacks and abilities.
voodoo.lore: Rhasta often ended performances by turning himself into a chicken - now, the humiliation is shared.
voodoo.notes: Instantly destroys illusions.The target will have a base movement speed of 100, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.Hex disables damage block.

chakram.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: PurePIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
chakram.attrib:
RADIUS: 200
PASS DAMAGE: 100 / 140 / 180
DAMAGE PER SECOND: 50 / 75 / 100
SLOW: 5%
MANA COST PER SECOND: 20 / 25 / 30
chakram.desc:
Fires your main saw blade at the target location where it will spin in place, dealing damage in an area around it.  Enemies caught in the saw blade will move more slowly for every 5% of health missing. The blade deals damage and cuts down trees in its path when fired and retracted.  While active the ability costs mana, and you lose the ability to attack.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
chakram.notes: The Chakram will return if Timbersaw runs out of mana or moves over 2000 distance away.

chakram_2.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: PurePIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
chakram_2.attrib:
RADIUS: 200
PASS DAMAGE: 100 / 140 / 180
DAMAGE PER SECOND: 50 / 75 / 100
SLOW: 5%
MANA COST PER SECOND: 20 / 25 / 30
chakram_2.desc: Fires a secondary saw blade at the target location where it will spin in place, dealing damage in an area around it.  Additionally, for each 5% of health missing, enemies caught in the saw blade move more slowly. The blade deals damage and cuts down trees in its path when fired and retracted.  While active the ability costs mana, and you lose the ability to attack.
chakram_2.lore: Cut cut cut cut cut cut cut cut cut cut cut!
chakram_2.notes: The Chakram will return if Timbersaw runs out of mana or moves over 2000 distance away.

reactive_armor.attrib:
BONUS ARMOR: 1 / 1.2 / 1.4 / 1.6
BONUS HP REGEN: 1 / 1.2 / 1.4 / 1.6
MAX STACKS: 5 / 10 / 15 / 20
STACK DURATION: 14 / 16 / 18 / 20
reactive_armor.desc: Each time Timbersaw is attacked, he gains increased health regen and armor.
reactive_armor.lore: The saw-suit is equipped to react to the slightest touch with fortified defenses.

timber_chain.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: PurePIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
timber_chain.desc: Timbersaw fires a chain that embeds itself in the first tree it hits, pulling him towards it.  Any enemy in the path takes damage.
timber_chain.lore: You never know when you might need to escape from malevolent saplings.

whirling_death.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
whirling_death.attrib:
RADIUS: 300
DAMAGE: 100 / 150 / 200 / 250
STAT LOSS PERCENT: 15%
STAT LOSS DURATION: 14
whirling_death.desc: Timbersaw whirls extremely sharp edges, damaging enemies and destroying trees around him in an area.  If an enemy hero is affected, it loses some of its primary attribute for a short duration.  Whirling Death will deal Pure damage if a tree is cut down in the process.
whirling_death.lore: In the case that Rizzrack gets surrounded by the the vines and plants of his nightmares, he has an immediate chainsaw defense.

curse_of_the_silent.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
curse_of_the_silent.attrib:
DAMAGE: 14 / 21 / 28 / 35
RADIUS: 425
BASE DURATION: 6
PENALTY DURATION: 4
MOVEMENT SLOW: 9% / 12% / 15% / 18%
curse_of_the_silent.desc: Curses the target area, causing enemy heroes to take damage and slowing their movement speed. Anytime affected enemies cast a spell, the duration is increased.
curse_of_the_silent.lore: Nortrom's lack of incantations is less of a problem for him than it is for his adversaries.
curse_of_the_silent.notes: If an enemy hero affected by Arcane Curse is silenced, Arcane Curse will pause damage, slow and duration.Affects creeps.

glaives_of_wisdom.affects: ABILITY: Auto-Cast, Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: PurePIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
glaives_of_wisdom.desc: Silencer enchants his glaives with his wisdom, dealing additional damage based on his Intelligence.
glaives_of_wisdom.lore: Although lacking in traditional incantations, Nortrom's pedigree of the Aeol Drias gives him uncanny wisdom, which he applies to physical combat.

global_silence.affects: ABILITY: No TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
global_silence.desc:
Silencer stops all sound, preventing enemy heroes and units on the map from casting spells.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
global_silence.lore: With a shock to the ground, all magic and sound pauses, and Nortrom fulfills his prophecy.
global_silence.notes: This skill works on invisible and Spell Immune units, but gaining spell immunity will remove its effect.

last_word.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
last_word.attrib:
DAMAGE: 150 / 200 / 250 / 300
ENEMY CAST TIMER: 4
SILENCE DURATION: 3 / 4 / 5 / 6
last_word.desc: Enchants a target, causing them to be damaged and silenced if they cast a spell or if the enchantment timer expires.
last_word.lore: Nortrom ensures that spells uttered by his opponents will be their last.
last_word.notes: Channeling abilities will trigger this effect once the caster finishes its channel.

hellfire_blast.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
hellfire_blast.attrib:
STUN DURATION: 2
SLOW DURATION: 2
MOVEMENT SLOW: 20%
DAMAGE PER SECOND: 15 / 30 / 40 / 50
hellfire_blast.desc: Wraith King sears an enemy unit with spectral fire, dealing damage and stunning, then dealing damage over time and slowing the target.
hellfire_blast.lore: Ostarion calls on his damned lineage, laying waste to his opponents.

mortal_strike.attrib:
HERO CRITICAL DAMAGE: 150% / 200% / 250% / 300%
NON-HERO CRITICAL DAMAGE: 200% / 300% / 400% / 500%
CRITICAL CHANCE: 15%
mortal_strike.desc: Wraith King passively gains a chance to deal bonus damage on an attack.
mortal_strike.lore: One blow to crush a foe.

reincarnation.affects: ABILITY: PassiveAFFECTS: Allied HeroesPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
reincarnation.attrib:
REINCARNATION TIME: 3 / 3 / 3
MOVEMENT SLOW: 75%
ATTACK SPEED SLOW: 75
SLOW DURATION: 5
SCEPTER ALLY DEATH DELAY: 7
SCEPTER DEATH DELAY RADIUS: 1200
reincarnation.desc:
Wraith King's form regroups after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle.  Upon death, enemy units in a 900 radius will be slowed.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
reincarnation.lore: Conspirators against the Wraith King wonder why he never stays dead.
reincarnation.notes: Wraith King won't revive if he doesn't have enough mana.If Wraith King has an Aegis and Reincarnation off cooldown, Reincarnation will trigger first.Revives with full HP and Mana.Credit for allies whose death was delayed will go to whoever struck the original killing blow.Wraith Delay not affect Techies' Suicide Squad, Attack ability.Wraith Delay affects Wraith King's actual deaths, not Reincarnate deaths.

vampiric_aura.affects: ABILITY: No Target, Aura, ToggleAFFECTS: Allies
vampiric_aura.desc: Nearby friendly units restore health based on the damage they deal when attacking enemy units.
vampiric_aura.lore: Wraith King's blade drains his enemy's essence to feed his aura.
vampiric_aura.notes: Stacks additively with other sources of Lifesteal.Can be toggled to make heroes only.

ancient_seal.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
ancient_seal.desc: Skywrath Mage seals the targeted unit with an ancient rune, silencing it and causing it to take additional damage from spells.
ancient_seal.lore: A holy incantation, whosoever finds themselves touched by Avilliva's sigil must suffer in penitent silence.
ancient_seal.notes: The magic damage resistance reduction doesn't affect creeps.

arcane_bolt.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
arcane_bolt.desc: Skywrath Mage launches a slow-moving bolt of arcane magic, dealing damage to an enemy unit based on Skywrath Mage's intelligence.
arcane_bolt.lore: Within the Ghastly Eyrie's endless intrigue, only the clever and calm can hope to survive.
arcane_bolt.notes: The projectile moves very slowly (500 ms), providing 325 vision around it.  Upon impact, it will reveal the target area for 3.34 seconds.Arcane Bolt cannot be disjointed.

concussive_shot.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
concussive_shot.attrib:
SHOT RANGE: 1600
DAMAGE RADIUS: 200
DAMAGE: 60 / 120 / 180 / 240
SLOW DURATION: 4
SLOW: 30% / 35% / 40% / 45%
concussive_shot.desc: Skywrath Mage sets off a long range shot that hits the closest hero within a long range.  Upon impact, it deals damage and slows in an area of effect.
concussive_shot.lore: Those who serve the court of the Ghastly Eyrie are ever locked in covert war. One must always know where danger lurks nearest.
concussive_shot.notes: Does not work when no heroes are in range or heroes are in fog.Damages creeps around the impact area.Provides 400 vision around the projectile, and reveals the target area for 3.34 seconds upon impact.

mystic_flare.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
mystic_flare.attrib:
RADIUS: 170
DURATION: 2.4
DAMAGE: 600 / 1000 / 1400
SCEPTER COOLDOWN: 20 / 10 / 5
SCEPTER DURATION: 12
mystic_flare.desc:
Skywrath Mage uses his ultimate magical ability to conjure a precise and violent mystical field that lays waste to his adversaries. Deals massive damage distributed evenly among any Heroes in the area over 2.4 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
mystic_flare.lore: Only the most practiced of Skywrath sorcerers could hope to shape the skies into such a storm.
mystic_flare.notes: Mystic Flare only affects Heroes; it does not damage illusions or creep heroes.Spell immune enemies do not count toward the damage distribution.

amplify_damage.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
amplify_damage.desc: Reduces enemy armor to amplify physical damage and provides True Sight of the targeted unit, revealing invisibility.
amplify_damage.lore: Slardar's lure-light reveals even the most hidden of opponents, as well as their vulnerabilities.
amplify_damage.notes: Gives True Sight and vision of the target.Works on Spell Immune units.

bash.affects: ABILITY: PassiveDAMAGE TYPE: PhysicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
bash.desc: Grants a chance that an attack will do bonus damage and stun an enemy.  The duration is doubled against creeps.
bash.lore: Thieves of the wealth of the Deep Ones meet the brutality of the Slithereen Guard in melee combat.
bash.notes: Stun works on Spell Immune units.Does not stack with Skull Basher.

slithereen_crush.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: PhysicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
slithereen_crush.attrib:
RADIUS: 350
MOVEMENT SLOW: 20%
ATTACK SLOW: 20
SLOW DURATION: 2
STUN DURATION: 1.6 / 1.9 / 2.2 / 2.5
slithereen_crush.desc: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy land units.  After the stun, the affected units are slowed.
slithereen_crush.lore: A swift crush of might and water breaks even the toughest of defenses.

sprint.attrib:
BONUS MOVE SPEED: 20% / 28% / 36% / 44%
ADDED DAMAGE TAKEN: 15%
DURATION: 12
sprint.desc: Slardar slithers ahead, moving significantly faster and passing through units, though becoming more vulnerable to damage.
sprint.lore: As Slardar has made the transition from the Deeps, it has been necessary to use his powerful tail for sprinting instead of swimming.
sprint.notes: Activating this skill doesn't interrupt channeling abilities.

dark_pact.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
dark_pact.desc: After a short delay, Slark sacrifices some of his life blood, purging most negative debuffs and dealing damage to enemy units around him and to himself.  Slark only takes 50% of the damage.
dark_pact.lore: Slithereen are capable of quickly regrowing appendages, in case of critical injury, to save their own lives.
dark_pact.notes: 1.5 seconds after cast, a series of 10 pulses separated by 0.1 seconds deal the damage.Each pulse also removes buffs from Slark.You can't kill yourself with this skill.The pulses stop if Slark dies.

essence_shift.attrib:
AGILITY GAINED: 3
ALL ATTRIBUTE LOSS: 1
DURATION: 15 / 30 / 60 / 120
essence_shift.desc: Slark steals the life essence of enemy heroes with his attacks, draining each of their attributes and converting them to bonus Agility.
essence_shift.lore: With each strike at his adversaries, Slark's knowledge of their weaknesses improves.
essence_shift.notes: Attributes cannot be dropped below 1.Essence Shifted stats are returned to normal on death. The stat return for Slark and for the affected hero are separate.

pounce.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
pounce.attrib:
DISTANCE: 700
POUNCE DAMAGE: 50 / 100 / 150 / 200
LEASH DURATION: 3.5
LEASH RADIUS: 325
pounce.desc: Slark leaps forward, grabbing the first hero he connects with.  That unit takes damage and is leashed to Slark, and can only move a limited distance away from Slark's landing position.
pounce.lore: Time in the Dark Reef made Slark a dangerous assassin; aggressive and fearless.
pounce.notes: On cast, Slark leaps forward at a speed of 933.33, stopping when he latches onto an enemy hero or has traveled 700 distance.Spell Immune units cannot be leashed.Trees will be destroyed around Slark's landing location.Blinking or teleporting can break the leash.

shadow_dance.attrib:
DURATION: 4
BONUS MOVEMENT SPEED: 30% / 35% / 40%
HEALTH GAINED PER SECOND: 3% / 5% / 7%
shadow_dance.desc: When used, Slark hides himself in a cloud of shadows, becoming immune to detection. Attacking, casting spells, and using items will not reveal Slark.  Passively, when not visible to the enemy team, Slark gains bonus movement speed and health regeneration.
shadow_dance.lore: The hidden Thirteenth is a slippery foe.
shadow_dance.notes: If Slark is damaged by a neutral unit, the passive movement and health regeneration bonuses are lost for 2 seconds.The passive movement and health regeneration bonuses have a 0.5 second activation and deactivation delay.

assassinate.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
assassinate.desc: Sniper locks onto a target enemy unit and, after 2 seconds, fires a devastating shot that deals damage at long range, and mini-stuns the target.
assassinate.lore: In order to fulfill the prophecy and return to his home town, Kardel must make another shot as perfect as the one on the day of his ancient test.
assassinate.notes: Crosshair effect is only visible to allies.Invisibility doesn't disjoint the projectile.Interrupts channeling spell, including on Spell Immune units.

headshot.affects: ABILITY: PassiveDAMAGE TYPE: PhysicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
headshot.desc: Sniper increases his accuracy, giving him a chance to deal extra damage and briefly stop the movements of his enemies.
headshot.lore: Taking potshots at steepstalkers in his childhood has been thoroughly refined into perfect leads on enemy combatants.

shrapnel.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
shrapnel.desc: Consumes a charge to launch a ball of shrapnel that showers the target area in explosive pellets. Enemies are subject to damage and slowed movement. Reveals the targeted area. Shrapnel charges restore every 55 seconds.
shrapnel.lore: Kardel's modular rifle also fires incendiary rounds, useful for assaulting entrenched locations.
shrapnel.notes: Damage is dealt 11 times, immediately at spell effect then every second.Does not damage buildings.Provides vision in the targeted area.

take_aim.desc: Extends the attack range of Sniper's rifle.
take_aim.lore: Kardel always takes it upon himself to stay as far from harm as he can while still performing his role - taking perfect aim.

desolate.affects: ABILITY: PassiveDAMAGE TYPE: PurePIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desolate.desc: Deals bonus damage whenever Spectre attacks an enemy who is alone.
desolate.lore: Often times, warriors find themselves alone with a vision of Mercurial - the fated question is if it is the true Spectre.
desolate.notes: Damage is dealt before Spectre's attack.Spectre's illusions also have Desolate.

dispersion.desc: Damage done to Spectre is reflected on her enemies, leaving her unharmed. The effect lessens with distance.
dispersion.lore: A daunting task lies before enemies of Mercurial - killing a shadow with blade and magic.
dispersion.notes: The reflected damage is not dealt to Spectre.Illusions don't get this ability.Damage is reflected before reductions, and is returned as the same damage type.

haunt.affects: ABILITY: No TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
haunt.attrib:
HAUNT DURATION: 5 / 6 / 7
HAUNT DAMAGE: 30%
HAUNT DAMAGE TAKEN: 200% / 200% / 200%
haunt.desc:
Creates a spectral nemesis to attack each enemy hero after a short delay. At any moment during the duration, Spectre can use Reality to exchange places of a given haunt.

Haunt illusions are uncontrollable, take extra damage, and deal less damage than Spectre herself.  They move at 400 base movement speed and ignore terrain.
haunt.lore: At the height of combat, Mercurial's physical manifestation shatters, and the shadowy pieces haunt those who still cling to life.
haunt.notes: Haunt illusions are uncontrollable and move at 400 base movement speed.There is a 1 second delay before illusions start attacking their target.

reality.desc: Spectre exchanges places with a chosen Haunt.
reality.lore: The scattered shadows unite into the one true Spectre.

spectral_dagger.affects: ABILITY: Unit Target, Point TargetAFFECTS: Enemy HeroesDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
spectral_dagger.desc: Spectre flings a dagger to draw a Shadow Path, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed of any enemies along the trail. Units hit by the dagger also trail a Shadow Path. While treading the path, Spectre phases through otherwise impassable terrain.
spectral_dagger.lore: Mercurial's dagger eclipses the physical plane in shadow, a state in which mortals cower, but spectres thrive.
spectral_dagger.notes: There is a 2 second grace period after leaving the path where no collision is preserved.

charge_of_darkness.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
charge_of_darkness.desc: Spirit Breaker fixes his sight on an enemy unit and starts charging through all objects.  All enemy units passed through and the targeted unit will be hit by a Greater Bash.  If the targeted unit dies, Spirit Breaker will change his target to the nearest enemy unit to that location.
charge_of_darkness.lore: Barathrum erupts from the darkness with unwieldy force.
charge_of_darkness.notes: Spirit Breaker passes through trees, cliffs, and units.The charge indicator is visible only to allies.Spirit Breaker gains shared vision of the target.

empowering_haste.attrib:
BONUS MOVE SPEED: 6% / 10% / 14% / 18%
AURA RADIUS: 900 / 900 / 900 / 900
CAST ADDED BONUS SPEED: 3% / 5% / 7% / 9%
CAST ADDED SPEED DURATION: 6
empowering_haste.desc: Causes Spirit Breaker to gain power with higher movement speed. His presence increases the movement speed of nearby allied units. Can be cast to improve the movement speed bonus for 6 seconds, however afterward the passive bonus will be halved while the ability is on cooldown.
empowering_haste.lore: Aspiring heroes gain speed and power from simply observing the Spirit Breaker's dominance on the battle field.

greater_bash.affects: ABILITY: PassiveDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
greater_bash.attrib:
CHANCE TO BASH: 17% / 17% / 17% / 17%
MOVESPEED AS DAMAGE: 22% / 28% / 34% / 40%
STUN DURATION: 1 / 1.2 / 1.4 / 1.6
KNOCKBACK DURATION: 0.5 / 0.5 / 0.5 / 0.5
BONUS MOVE SPEED: 15% / 15% / 15% / 15%
SPEED DURATION: 3 / 3 / 3 / 3
greater_bash.desc: Gives a chance to stun and knockback an enemy unit on an attack, as well as gaining bonus movement speed after a bash occurs. Deals a percentage of movement speed as damage.
greater_bash.lore: The signature strike of Barathrum's ghostly ball and chain.
greater_bash.notes: Does not stack with Skull Basher.

nether_strike.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
nether_strike.attrib:
BONUS DAMAGE: 150 / 250 / 350
RANGE: 700
SCEPTER RANGE: 850
SCEPTER BASH RADIUS: 250 / 250 / 250
SCEPTER COOLDOWN: 20 / 20 / 20
nether_strike.desc:
Spirit Breaker slips into the nether realm, reappearing next to his hapless victim. Upon reappearing, a Greater Bash of the current level occurs and deals bonus damage.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
nether_strike.lore: Barathrum temporarily returns to the realm from where he came, bringing with him the retribution of both worlds.
nether_strike.notes: Spirit Breaker appears behind the target to deliver the bash.

ball_lightning.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
ball_lightning.attrib:
SPEED: 1250 / 1875 / 2500
RADIUS: 125 / 200 / 275
MANA DRAIN PER UNIT: 0.7%
ball_lightning.desc: Storm Spirit becomes volatile electricity, charging across the battlefield until he depletes his mana or reaches his target. The activation mana cost is 30+8% of his total mana pool, and the cost per 100 units traveled is 12+0.7% of his total mana pool.  Damage is expressed in damage per 100 units traveled.
ball_lightning.notes: Instant cast abilities can be used while traveling.This ability will destroy trees.Storm Spirit is invulnerable during Ball Lightning.

electric_vortex.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
electric_vortex.attrib:
SELF SLOW: 50%
SELF SLOW DURATION: 3.000000
DURATION: 1 / 1.5 / 2 / 2.5
SCEPTER RADIUS: 475
electric_vortex.desc:
A vortex that pulls an enemy unit to Storm Spirit's location, it also slows the Storm Spirit by 50% for 3 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
electric_vortex.lore: Raijin's thunderous, boisterous energy often draws others into an electrifying situation.

overload.affects: ABILITY: PassiveDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
overload.attrib:
RADIUS: 275
MOVEMENT SLOW: 80%
ATTACK SLOW: 50
DURATION: 0.6 / 0.6 / 0.6 / 0.6
overload.desc: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on his next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.

static_remnant.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
static_remnant.desc: Creates an explosively charged image of Storm Spirit that lasts 12 seconds and will detonate and deal damage if an enemy unit comes near it.
static_remnant.lore: Raijin Thunderkeg's duality allows him to admire himself in shocking fashion.
static_remnant.notes: Remnants take 1 second to materialize after the spell is cast.Remnants grant unobstructed vision for their duration.The explosion actually hits units in a 260 radius, but will only be triggered in 235.

gods_strength.attrib:
BONUS DAMAGE: 100% / 150% / 200%
SCEPTER ALLY AURA RADIUS: 900
SCEPTER ALLY BONUS DAMAGE: 75% / 100% / 125%
gods_strength.desc:
Sven channels his rogue strength, granting bonus damage for 25 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
gods_strength.lore: With the strength that shattered the Sacred Helm, the Rogue Knight stands unopposed in melee combat.
gods_strength.notes: The bonus damage is based on base damage and the primary attribute of Sven.

great_cleave.desc: Sven strikes with great force, cleaving all nearby enemy units with his attack.
great_cleave.lore: The Vigil Knights still seek to reclaim the stolen Outcast Blade from Sven, a weapon capable of cutting wide swaths through lesser warriors.
great_cleave.notes: Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value.Cleave damage goes through spell immunity.The cleave damages a circular area in front of Sven.

storm_bolt.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
storm_bolt.desc: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units.
storm_bolt.lore: The Rogue Knight's iron gauntlet, taken from the school of his father, strikes his foes to their core.

warcry.attrib:
BONUS ARMOR: 5 / 10 / 15 / 20
BONUS SPEED: 12%
RADIUS: 900
DURATION: 8
warcry.desc: Sven's Warcry heartens his allies for battle, increasing their movement speed and armor.  Lasts 8 seconds.
warcry.lore: Calling a few lines from the Vigil Codex fortifies Sven's obedience to his rogue code. So poetic!
warcry.notes: Fully stacks with other armor and speed granting abilities.

focused_detonate.desc: Detonate all remote mines in the target area.
focused_detonate.lore: Why light one fuse when you can light them all?

land_mines.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: PhysicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
land_mines.attrib:
DAMAGE: 150 / 190 / 225 / 260
FULL DAMAGE RADIUS: 200
HALF DAMAGE RADIUS: 500
MINE ACTIVATION TIME: 0.5
MINE FADE TIME: 2
land_mines.desc: Plant an invisible mine that explodes when an enemy steps near.  The explosion will deal less damage if the enemy is farther away from the mine when it explodes.  Mines explode 0.3 seconds after being triggered.  Damages buildings.
land_mines.notes: Land Mines do not block neutral creep camps from spawning.Mines last until they explode or are destroyed.Mines are triggered by invisible units.Mines will not be triggered by some flying units.Grants 10 gold if destroyed by an enemy hero.

minefield_sign.desc:
Plant a warning sign to remind enemies to step lightly. Only one sign can exist at a time. Lasts 180 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

remote_mines.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
remote_mines.attrib:
DAMAGE: 300 / 450 / 600
EXPLOSION RADIUS: 425
MINE DURATION: 600
FADE TIME: 2
CAST RANGE: 500
SCEPTER DAMAGE: 450 / 600 / 750
SCEPTER CAST RANGE: 700
remote_mines.desc:
Plant an invisible explosive that will only detonate when triggered.  Does not damage buildings.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
remote_mines.notes: Grants 10 gold if destroyed by an enemy hero.

stasis_trap.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
stasis_trap.attrib:
TRIGGER RADIUS: 450
TRIGGER DELAY: 1.5
STUN DURATION: 2.5 / 3 / 3.5 / 4
TRAP ACTIVATION TIME: 1.5
TRAP FADE TIME: 2
TRAP DURATION: 360
stasis_trap.desc: Plant an invisible trap that stuns nearby enemy units when triggered.
stasis_trap.notes: Stasis Traps destroy all other Stasis Traps in their area of effect when they detonate.Stasis Traps are not triggered by invisible units.Stasis Traps do not block neutral creep camps from spawning.

suicide.affects: ABILITY: Unit Target, Point TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: PhysicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
suicide.attrib:
FULL DAMAGE RADIUS: 200
PARTIAL DAMAGE RADIUS: 500
FULL DAMAGE: 500 / 650 / 850 / 1150
PARTIAL DAMAGE: 260 / 300 / 340 / 380
suicide.desc: Techies sacrifice themselves for the greater good, dealing massive area of effect damage.  More damage is dealt to units closer to Techies when they explode.  Techies' respawn time is reduced by 50% when killed by this ability.
suicide.notes: Using this ability counts as suicide, and does not award gold or experience to the enemy team.Techies still earn experience for kills made with this ability.This ability destroys trees.

meld.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: PhysicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
meld.attrib:
BONUS DAMAGE: 50 / 100 / 150 / 200
ARMOR REDUCTION: 2 / 4 / 6 / 8
ARMOR REDUCTION DURATION: 10
meld.desc: Templar Assassin conceals herself, becoming invisible as long as she remains still.  If Meld's invisibility is broken by attacking an enemy, Lanaya will deal bonus damage to the enemy and reduce their armor for 10 seconds.
meld.lore: Lanaya is as elusive as her covenant with the Hidden Temple.
meld.notes: Meld is broken by any action other than staying in position.Meld's armor reduction does not work against towers.

psi_blades.affects: ABILITY: PassiveDAMAGE TYPE: PurePIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
psi_blades.desc: Templar Assassin's psi blades slice through the attacked unit, splitting and damaging enemy units directly behind it, while gaining bonus attack range.
psi_blades.lore: Her blades pierce the skin as much as the mind, furthering her understanding of the mystery that is reality.
psi_blades.notes: Split damage hits invisible units.Attack effects like Unique Attack Modifiers and Bash will only be applied to the main target.Attacks against illusions will not split.

psionic_trap.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
psionic_trap.attrib:
MAX TRAPS: 5 / 8 / 11
MIN MOVEMENT SLOW: 30%
MAX MOVEMENT SLOW: 50%
SLOW DURATION: 5
psionic_trap.desc: Templar Assassin places mystical traps that invisibly monitor enemy movement. When sprung at her command, they exert a slowing influence of 30% in the area. Traps charge up to slow an additional 5% every second, up to 50%.
psionic_trap.lore: Calling upon the reach of the Hidden Temple, none escape the eye of the Templar.
psionic_trap.notes: Traps last indefinitely.They have invisibility that fades in over 2 seconds, spell immunity, and 100 HP.Traps have 400/400 vision range and don't prevent neutral camps from spawning.

refraction.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: PhysicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
refraction.desc: Templar Assassin becomes highly elusive, avoiding damage and gaining a bonus to her damage.  The damage and avoidance effects are separate, and have a limited number of instances.
refraction.lore: Manipulating her psionic veil, Lanaya bends nature's law to her will.
refraction.notes: Damage as HP Removal bypasses Refraction (it won't reduce the charges).Only instances of 5 or more damage will trigger Refraction.Refraction is visible to enemies.

trap.affects: ABILITY: No TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
trap.desc: Springs the nearest trap, slowing nearby enemies.

conjure_image.attrib:
ILLUSION DURATION: 32
ILLUSION DAMAGE: 30% / 40% / 50% / 60%
ILLUSION DAMAGE TAKEN: 400%
conjure_image.desc: Creates an illusion of Terrorblade that deals damage.
conjure_image.lore: There's only one thing more dangerous than facing Terrorblade.  Facing MORE Terrrorblades!

metamorphosis.attrib:
DURATION: 40 / 44 / 48 / 52
TRANSFORMATION TIME: 0.35
BASE ATTACK TIME: 1.5
ATTACK RANGE: 550
BONUS DAMAGE: 20 / 40 / 60 / 80
MOVEMENT SPEED LOSS: 25
ILLUSION AURA RADIUS: 900
metamorphosis.desc: Terrorblade transforms into a powerful demon with a ranged attack. Any of Terrorblade's illusions that are within 900 range will also be transformed by Metamorphosis.
metamorphosis.lore: Temper, temper. The rage rises up and takes control.  Meet Terrorblade's own worst self.
metamorphosis.notes: Manta Style's cooldown time will be based on whether Terrorblade was in his ranged or melee form when the item was used.

reflection.affects: ABILITY: No TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
reflection.attrib:
REFLECTION DURATION: 2.5 / 3.5 / 4.5 / 5.5
REFLECTION DAMAGE: 40% / 60% / 80% / 100%
MOVEMENT SLOW: 25%
ATTACK SLOW: 25
RADIUS: 900
reflection.desc: Terrorblade brings forth an invulnerable dark reflection of all nearby enemy heroes. Affected enemy heroes are slowed and attacked by their reflection.
reflection.lore: In the fractal prison of Foulfell, Terrorblade learned the truth of this old tale: you are your own worst enemy.  Now it is a lesson he teaches others.
reflection.notes: Reflections are untargetable, invulnerable illusions.Reflections can only attack their source.

sunder.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
sunder.desc: Severs the life from both Terrorblade and a target hero, exchanging a percentage of both units' current health. Some health points must remain.
sunder.lore: You didn't need that life, did you?  The demon marauder steals that which you hold most dear.

anchor_smash.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: PhysicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
anchor_smash.desc: Tidehunter swings his mighty anchor to damage nearby enemies and reduce their attack damage.
anchor_smash.lore: Stolen from one of Admiral Kunkka's flagships, Leviathan's heavy anchor proves useful as a melee weapon.
anchor_smash.notes: Anchor Smash works on all Ancient creeps except for Roshan.

gush.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
gush.attrib:
SLOW: 40% / 40% / 40% / 40%
ARMOR REDUCTION: 3 / 4 / 5 / 6
SCEPTER RADIUS: 240
SCEPTER COOLDOWN: 7
SCEPTER RANGE: 1800
gush.desc:
Summons a gush of water to damage an enemy unit, reducing their movement speed and armor.  Lasts 4 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
gush.lore: During his championship of the Sunken Isles, Leviathan gained mastery over the open sea.

kraken_shell.attrib:
DAMAGE BLOCK: 12 / 24 / 36 / 48
DAMAGE THRESHOLD: 600 / 550 / 500 / 450
THRESHOLD TIMER: 6 / 6 / 6 / 6
kraken_shell.desc:
Thickens Tidehunter's hide to passively block a portion of any incoming physical attack damage. The hide also removes negative status effects if the damage taken crosses a threshold.

Does not stack with items that provide Damage Block.
kraken_shell.lore: Claddish navymen tell tales of a mighty sea-faring beast that suffered spear and sword but continued to lay waste to the fleet.
kraken_shell.notes: Only damage from player owned sources is counted towards buff removal.The counter will reset if no player owned damage is taken for 6 seconds.Kraken Shell removes most buffs, even if they are generally not purgable.

ravage.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
ravage.desc:
Slams the ground, causing tentacles to erupt in all directions, damaging and stunning all nearby enemy units.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
ravage.lore: Calling to the abyssal god Maelrawn has resulted in entire armadas being lost at sea.
ravage.notes: Ravage will hit invisible units.Ravage waves move outwards at a speed of 775.

heat_seeking_missile.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
heat_seeking_missile.desc:
Launches a pair of rockets at the nearest visible enemy heroes within 2500 range. 

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
heat_seeking_missile.lore: The last contraption Boush was able to save was a retrofitted rocket launcher with a homing mechanism.

laser.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: PurePIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
laser.attrib:
BLIND MISS RATE: 100% / 100% / 100% / 100%
HERO BLIND DURATION: 3 / 3.5 / 4 / 4.5
CREEP BLIND DURATION: 6 / 6 / 6 / 6
CAST RANGE: 650
SCEPTER REFRACT RADIUS: 650
laser.desc:
Fires an intense energy beam, dealing damage and blinding the target, causing it to miss all physical attacks. 

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
laser.lore: Boush perfected this rock cutting laser in his subterranean laboratory, never considering its combat utility.

march_of_the_machines.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
march_of_the_machines.desc: Enlists an army of robotic minions to destroy enemy units in an area around Tinker.
march_of_the_machines.lore: Even though the laboratory has since been sealed off, the ability to radio in robotic drones is still in working order.
march_of_the_machines.notes: Robots spawn at a rate of 24 per second.

rearm.desc: CHANNELED - Resets the cooldown on most of Tinker's items and abilities.
rearm.lore: A new battery here, another set of rockets there, Boush continually improves on existing technology.
rearm.notes: Rearm works on all items except Black King Bar, Arcane Boots, Helm of the Dominator, Hand of Midas, Refresher Orb, Linken's Sphere, Pipe of Insight, and Necronomicon.

avalanche.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
avalanche.desc: Bombards an area with rocks, stunning and damaging enemy land units.
avalanche.lore: Inanimate rock becomes animate when called by the Stone Giant.
avalanche.notes: Deals damage over a 1 second duration.

craggy_exterior.attrib:
CHANCE TO STUN: 10% / 15% / 20% / 25%
STUN DURATION: 1 / 1.25 / 1.5 / 1.75
BONUS ARMOR: 2 / 3 / 4 / 5
RANGE: 300 / 300 / 300 / 300
craggy_exterior.desc: Causes damage to bounce back on Tiny's attackers.  Enemies that attack Tiny from within 300 units have a chance of being stunned.
craggy_exterior.lore: Melee warriors tend to find attacking the Stone Giant largely ineffective.
craggy_exterior.notes: The damage and stun occur when an attack lands.

grow.attrib:
BONUS DAMAGE: 50 / 100 / 150
ATTACK SPEED LOSS: 20 / 35 / 50
ADDED MOVE SPEED: 40 / 50 / 60
TOSS BONUS: 35% / 50% / 65%
SCEPTER BONUS RANGE: 85
SCEPTER CLEAVE DAMAGE: 50%
SCEPTER BONUS BUILDING DAMAGE: 75%
SCEPTER TOSS BONUS: 50% / 65% / 80%
grow.desc:
Tiny gains craggy mass that increases his power at the cost of his attack speed. Increases Tossed unit damage and improves movement speed.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
grow.lore: Watching a hill become a mountain is awe-inspiring - especially if the mountain begins laying waste to adversaries.
grow.notes: Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value.Cleave damage goes through spell immunity.

toss.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
toss.desc: Grabs the nearest unit in a 275 radius around Tiny, ally or enemy, and launches it at the target unit or rune to deal damage where they land.  If the tossed unit is an enemy, it will take an extra 20% damage. Toss does more damage with each level in Grow.
toss.lore: Tiny's gargantuan stature allows him to catapult even the sturdiest of warriors.
toss.notes: If a unit is hit by Avalanche then Tossed, it can be hit a second time by Avalanche if it lands in the area of effect before Avalanche ends.You can toss allies, but they don't take damage.Toss deals 33% of its damage to buildings.

tiny.droles: Carry - Nuker - Pusher - Initiator - Durable - Disabler

eyes_in_the_forest.attrib:
TREE VISION RADIUS: 800
OVERGROWTH RADIUS: 800
OVERGROWTH DAMAGE PER SEC: 175
eyes_in_the_forest.desc: Treant Protector enchants a tree, which grants him unobstructed vision in that location. If Overgrowth is cast, units within a radius of an enchanted tree will be entangled and damaged.
eyes_in_the_forest.lore: One can never be too certain who, or what, might need protecting.
eyes_in_the_forest.notes: Being entangled by Overgrowth through enchanted trees from Eyes of the Forest does damage. Being entangled by Overgrowth directly from Treant Protector does not.If the enemy has True Sight, they will be able to see which trees are enchanted.

leech_seed.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
leech_seed.attrib:
DAMAGE PER PULSE: 15 / 30 / 45 / 60
MOVEMENT SLOW: 28%
RADIUS: 500
DURATION: 4.5
leech_seed.desc: Treant plants a life-sapping seed in an enemy unit, draining its health, while simultaneously slowing it. The seed heals friendly units around it.  Pulses 6 times.
leech_seed.lore: Rooftrellen nurtures the beings under his stewardship, sustained by the lifeforce of trespassers into his sacred ground.

living_armor.affects: ABILITY: Unit Target, Point TargetAFFECTS: Allied UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
living_armor.desc: Infuses the target hero or structure with a protective coating which grants bonus regeneration. Also blocks some damage from all sources. Dispels when a number of damage instances are taken.
living_armor.lore: The roots and tendrils of the Treant Protectors are far-reaching, stimulating the growth and rejuvenation of all of nature.
living_armor.notes: Can be cast through the minimap.

natures_guise.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Allied UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
natures_guise.attrib:
DURATION: 15 / 30 / 45 / 60
FADE TIME: 2
TREE RADIUS: 350
MOVEMENT SPEED: 14% / 16% / 18% / 20%
natures_guise.desc: Causes the targeted unit to blend in with the forest, becoming invisible to enemies and gaining a movement speed bonus when near a tree.  If the unit moves away from a tree or the spell is cast on a unit with no nearby trees, Nature's Guise is lost.  Treant Protector can cast spells and remain invisible under Nature's Guise.
natures_guise.lore: The Protectors don't often come into vision; their natural state being nestled within their leafy brethren.
natures_guise.notes: If cast on a unit that isn't near a tree, it will lose the invisibility almost instantly.Nature's Guise checks in 0.75 second intervals for nearby trees, removing invisibility if none are found.

overgrowth.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
overgrowth.desc: Summons an overgrowth of vines and branches around Treant that prevent afflicted enemies from moving, blinking, going invisible, or attacking.
overgrowth.lore: Rooftrellen calls the ancestral spirit of nature, releasing its power through all of his kin.
overgrowth.notes: Works on Spell Immune units, but if units gain spell immunity after the effect starts, they'll break free.Being entangled by Overgrowth through enchanted trees from Eyes of the Forest does damage. Being entangled by Overgrowth directly from Treant Protector does not.

battle_trance.desc: Troll's presence on the battlefield increases the attack speed of himself and all allied heroes.
battle_trance.lore: An adrenaline rush of pure hatred quickens your blades.

berserkers_rage.attrib:
BONUS HEALTH: 100
BONUS MOVE SPEED: 10 / 20 / 30 / 40
BONUS ARMOR: 3
MELEE BASE ATTACK TIME: 1.55
BASH CHANCE: 10%
BASH STUN DURATION: 0.8 / 1.2 / 1.6 / 2
BASH BONUS DAMAGE: 20 / 30 / 40 / 50
berserkers_rage.desc:
While active, Troll Warlord swaps from using ranged to melee attacks. Melee attacks have a chance to bash, dealing bonus damage and stunning the target. Berserker's Rage also grants additional health, movement speed, armor, and increased attack speed.

Whirling Axes has different functionality while Berserker's Rage is active.
berserkers_rage.lore: Like his anger, Troll Warlord's supply of axes is infinite.
berserkers_rage.notes: The bash stun goes through spell immunity.Doesn't stack with Skull Basher.Manta Style's cooldown time will be based on whether Troll Warlord was in his ranged or melee form when the item was used.

fervor.attrib:
MAX STACKS: 7
ATTACK SPEED PER STACK: 15 / 20 / 25 / 30
fervor.desc: With each continuous blow on the same target, Troll gains increased attack speed.  If Troll changes targets, the stacks drop to zero.
fervor.lore: If at first you don't succeed, strike, strike again.

whirling_axes_melee.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
whirling_axes_melee.attrib:
DAMAGE: 75 / 125 / 175 / 225
RADIUS: 450
BLIND DURATION: 4 / 5 / 6 / 7
MISS CHANCE: 60%
WHIRL DURATION: 3
whirling_axes_melee.desc: Troll hurls two axes around him in a close range area of effect, damaging enemy units and causing them to miss some attacks.
whirling_axes_melee.notes: Only available in melee mode.Both abilities have independent cooldowns.

whirling_axes_ranged.affects: ABILITY: Unit Target, Point TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
whirling_axes_ranged.attrib:
AXE DAMAGE: 75
SLOW DURATION: 3 / 3.75 / 4.5 / 5.25
MOVEMENT SLOW: 30%
whirling_axes_ranged.desc: Troll hurls a fistful of five axes in a cone shape over 900 range, slowing and damaging enemy units.
whirling_axes_ranged.lore: Only axes fueled by hate whirl with such a deadly spin.
whirling_axes_ranged.notes: Only available in ranged mode.Both abilities have independent cooldowns.

frozen_sigil.affects: ABILITY: No TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
frozen_sigil.attrib:
AURA RADIUS: 600
DURATION: 30
MOVEMENT SLOW: 10% / 15% / 20% / 25%
ATTACK SLOW: 30 / 40 / 50 / 60
frozen_sigil.desc: Tusk summons a Frozen Sigil by calling upon the deepest cold of winter. The Sigil creates a snowstorm which slows all enemy units within 600 range.
frozen_sigil.notes: If no order is given, the Sigil will follow Tusk.The Sigil has unobstructed movement, has a 310 movement speed, requires 3/3/4/4 hero attacks to destroy and 12/12/16/16 creep attacks to destroy, provides 400/400 vision, and gives a 90/100/110/120 gold bounty.Heroes deal 1 damage to the sigil, while non-hero units deal 0.25 damage.

ice_shards.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
ice_shards.attrib:
RADIUS: 200
SHARD DAMAGE: 60 / 120 / 180 / 240
SHARD DURATION: 7
CAST RANGE: 1800
ice_shards.desc: Tusk compresses shards of ice into a ball of frozen energy that damages all enemies it comes in contact with. When the ball reaches its target destination the shards are released, creating a barrier that lasts for 7 seconds.
ice_shards.lore: In the frozen tundra near the Barrier, after the last sun of autumn has set, ice can form with alarming speed.

launch_snowball.desc: Launch the snowball toward the target.
launch_snowball.notes: The snowball destroys trees.The snowball travels at 675 movement speed.Doesn't carry illusions, but will carry Meepo clones and other units that Tusk controls.Each Meepo clone added to the snowball will add its own bonus damage and speed.

snowball.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
snowball.attrib:
BASE DAMAGE: 80 / 120 / 160 / 200
BONUS DAMAGE PER ALLY: 20 / 30 / 40 / 50
STUN DURATION: 0.5 / 0.75 / 1 / 1.25
GATHER RADIUS: 100
LAUNCH TIME: 3
snowball.desc: Tusk begins rolling into a snowball. Allies within a 350 radius can also be added to the snowball by right-clicking on them, even while the snowball is moving. Once launched, any enemies caught in the snowball's path will be stunned and take damage. Each allied Hero in the snowball will add to its damage.
snowball.lore: Tales are still told of the wild feat that ended the grand brawl at White Fields.
snowball.notes: The snowball destroys trees.The snowball travels at 675 movement speed.Doesn't carry illusions, but will carry Meepo clones and other units that Tusk controls.Each Meepo clone added to the snowball will add its own bonus damage and speed.Allies can click on a snowball to add themselves to it.

walrus_kick.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
walrus_kick.attrib:
KICK PUSH DISTANCE: 900
MOVE SLOW: 40%
SLOW DURATION: 4
DAMAGE: 350
walrus_kick.desc: Kicks the target unit back, damaging them and slowing their movement speed.

walrus_punch.affects: ABILITY: Auto-Cast, Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
walrus_punch.attrib:
CRIT MULTIPLIER: 350%
AIR TIME: 1
SLOW DURATION: 2 / 3 / 4
MOVEMENT SLOW: 40%
walrus_punch.desc: Tusk connects with his mighty Walrus Punch, a critical strike so powerful it launches its victim into the air. The victim is slowed upon landing.
walrus_punch.lore: It never matters who throws the first punch, only who throws the last.
walrus_punch.notes: Walrus Punch cannot miss.Works fully on Spell Immune units.

decay.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
decay.attrib:
BASE DAMAGE: 20 / 60 / 100 / 140
STRENGTH STEAL: 4
STEAL DURATION: 40
RADIUS: 325
SCEPTER STRENGTH STEAL: 10
decay.desc:
Undying steals strength from all enemy heroes in an area, dealing base damage as he claims the enemy's strength for himself.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
decay.lore: The strength of the living is simply borrowed from the strength of the dead.
decay.notes: The strength stolen stacks, but can't cause a hero to have strength below 1.The strength steal takes effect before the damage is dealt.Affects invisible units.

flesh_golem.affects: ABILITY: No TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
flesh_golem.attrib:
DURATION: 30
MAX DAMAGE AMP: 20% / 25% / 30%
MIN DAMAGE AMP: 1%
MAX MOVE SLOW: 20%
MIN MOVE SLOW: 1%
DEATH HEAL (HEROES): 6%
DEATH HEAL (CREEPS): 2%
flesh_golem.desc: Undying transforms into a horrifying flesh golem that possesses a Plague Aura.  This aura slows all enemy units within 750 range and amplifies the damage they take; the closer to Undying, the more damage and slow.  When a plagued unit dies, Undying is healed equal to a percentage of his own maximum health.
flesh_golem.lore: The flesh of the recently dead add to the power of Dirge's plague.
flesh_golem.notes: Undying is healed when affected units die in range, regardless of who killed it.Dying illusions don't trigger the heal.Plague Aura goes through spell immunity.The minimum damage amplification and move slow from Plague Aura is 1%.

soul_rip.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
soul_rip.attrib:
DAMAGE/HEAL PER UNIT: 18 / 22 / 26 / 30
MAX UNITS: 10 / 12 / 14 / 16
RIP RADIUS: 1300
TOMBSTONE HEAL: 2 / 4 / 6 / 8
soul_rip.desc: Undying rips health away from all nearby units and uses it to heal an ally, or damage an enemy. Soul Rip can also be used to heal Tombstone.
soul_rip.lore: Even allies feel despair in Undying's presence.
soul_rip.notes: Can heal Tombstone, but can't heal or damage other buildings.Does not rip from invisible units.

tombstone.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
tombstone.attrib:
ATTACKS TO DESTROY: 3 / 4 / 5 / 7
TOMBSTONE DURATION: 15 / 20 / 25 / 30
ZOMBIE SPAWN RADIUS: 600 / 800 / 1000 / 1200
DEATHLUST FLAT HEALTH THRESHOLD: 100 / 200 / 300 / 400
DEATHLUST PCT HEALTH THRESHOLD: 20% / 25% / 30% / 35%
ZOMBIE SPAWN INTERVAL: 3
tombstone.desc: Summons a tombstone at the target point.  Zombies will frequently spawn next to every enemy unit in the area around the Tombstone, and attack them.  Zombies have the Deathlust ability, which causes their attacks to slow the target, and if the target reaches below a certain amount of health, increases the attack and movement speed of the zombie.
tombstone.lore: Dirge calls on his fallen brothers to fight for the Dead God.
tombstone.notes: Tombstone is Spell Immune, but can be healed by Soul Rip.Zombies and Tombstone are Spell Immune.If their initial target dies or goes out of vision, the Zombie will die.

earthshock.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
earthshock.desc: Ursa slams the earth, causing a powerful shock to damage and slow all enemy units in a nearby area for 4 seconds.
earthshock.lore: The very steps of a male ursine shake the ground as well as the resolve of opposing warriors.

enrage.affects: ABILITY: No TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
enrage.attrib:
FURY SWIPES MULTIPLIER: 1.5 / 1.75 / 2
DAMAGE REDUCTION: 80%
DURATION: 4
SCEPTER COOLDOWN: 30 / 24 / 18
enrage.desc:
Ursa goes into a frenzy, multiplying his Fury Swipes damage and causing him to take 80% less damage. Removes any existing debuffs.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
enrage.lore: Ulfsaar succumbs to his ancient spirit, becoming the most ferocious creature on the battlefield.

fury_swipes.affects: ABILITY: PassiveDAMAGE TYPE: PhysicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
fury_swipes.attrib:
RESET TIME: 15
RESET TIME (ROSHAN): 6
DAMAGE PER ATTACK: 15 / 20 / 25 / 30
fury_swipes.desc: Ursa's claws dig deeper wounds in the enemy, causing consecutive attacks to the same enemy to deal more damage.  If the same target is not attacked after 15 seconds, the bonus damage is lost.
fury_swipes.lore: In nature, the wounded rarely survive the attacks of hungry predators.

overpower.desc: Using his skill in combat, Ursa gains increased attack speed for a number of subsequent attacks.
overpower.lore: For a behemoth of his size, Ursa is deceptively nimble.
overpower.notes: Overpower isn't removed by Black King Bar.

command_aura.desc: Vengeful Spirit's presence increases the physical damage of nearby friendly units. If Vengeful Spirit is slain, her killer will be possessed with a negative Vengeance Aura, reducing the damage of her killer and its nearby allies until Vengeful Spirit revives.
command_aura.lore: Although they may not share her undying passion for revenge, allies do draw on her fanaticism in combat.
command_aura.notes: The bonus damage provided by the aura is based on base damage and primary attribute.

magic_missile.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
magic_missile.desc: Fires a magic missile at an enemy unit, stunning and dealing damage.
magic_missile.lore: A simple Skywrath technique, the magic missile is Shendel's primary tool for vengeance.

nether_swap.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
nether_swap.attrib:
RANGE: 700 / 950 / 1200
SCEPTER COOLDOWN: 10
SCEPTER ILLUSION DAMAGE DEALT: 50%
SCEPTER ILLUSION DAMAGE TAKEN: 150%
nether_swap.desc:
Instantaneously swaps positions with a target Hero, friend or enemy.  Nether Swap interrupts channeling abilities on the target.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
nether_swap.lore: Martyrdom is a small price to pay for vengeance.
nether_swap.notes: Works on Spell Immune units.Trees near Vengeful Spirit and the target will be destroyed when the spell is cast.Channeling spells are interrupted by Nether Swap.

wave_of_terror.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: PurePIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
wave_of_terror.attrib:
ARMOR REDUCTION: 3 / 4 / 5 / 6
DEBUFF DURATION: 15
VISION DURATION: 3 / 3 / 3 / 3
wave_of_terror.desc: Vengeful Spirit lets loose a wicked cry, weakening the armor of enemies and giving vision of the path ahead.
wave_of_terror.lore: Shendel's haunting voice hints at her approaching vindication.

plague_ward.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: PhysicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
plague_ward.desc: Summons a plague ward to attack enemy units and structures. The ward is immune to magic. Wards gain the Poison Sting level from Venomancer, dealing 50% of the full damage.
plague_ward.lore: A mixture of his old herbalist talents and newfound toxic mastery creates a living embodiment of plague.

poison_nova.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
poison_nova.attrib:
RADIUS: 830
DURATION: 16
DAMAGE: 30 / 55 / 80
SCEPTER COOLDOWN: 140 / 120 / 60
SCEPTER DAMAGE: 60 / 85 / 110
poison_nova.desc:
A spreading ring of poison that does damage over time to enemy units around Venomancer.  Poison Nova cannot deal lethal damage; targets will be left with at least 1 health.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
poison_nova.lore: In the Acid Jungles, creatures releasing noxious poison to their attackers is common; Venomancer spreads this plague beyond the Jidi Isle.

poison_sting.affects: ABILITY: PassiveDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
poison_sting.desc: Adds poison damage to Venomancer's normal attacks, slowing movement speed.
poison_sting.lore: The paralytic sting of the creature which caused his transformation now belongs to the Venomancer.
poison_sting.notes: Poison Sting damage can be lethal.Damage from Poison Sting does not interrupt healing from items, nor does it activate the cooldown on Blink Dagger.

venomous_gale.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
venomous_gale.attrib:
DURATION: 15 / 15 / 15 / 15
INITIAL DAMAGE: 25 / 50 / 75 / 100
DAMAGE PER TICK: 10 / 40 / 70 / 100
SLOW: 50% / 50% / 50% / 50%
venomous_gale.desc: Launches a ball of venom in a line, poisoning enemy units so that they take both initial damage and damage over time, as well as suffering slowed movement.  Venomous Gale deals damage every 3 seconds over its duration.
venomous_gale.lore: A concoction of various stings, poisons, and toxins gathered from the jungles of Jidi Isle, victims surviving it are rare.
venomous_gale.notes: Units afflicted by Venomous Gale can be denied when their HP drops below 25%.Duration damage is dealt every 3 seconds.Slow starts at 50%, and decreases as time passes.

corrosive_skin.affects: ABILITY: PassiveDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
corrosive_skin.attrib:
DURATION: 4
MOVE SLOW: 10% / 15% / 20% / 25%
ATTACK SLOW: 10 / 15 / 20 / 25
MAGIC RESISTANCE: 10% / 15% / 20% / 25%
DAMAGE PER SECOND: 10 / 15 / 20 / 25
MAX RANGE RADIUS: 1400
corrosive_skin.desc: Viper exudes an infectious toxin that damages and slows any enemy that damages it in a 1400 radius. The acid exudate also increases Viper's resistance to magic.
corrosive_skin.lore: It is not unusual for sword and shield alike to corrode in the very hands of those who attack the Netherdrake.
corrosive_skin.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other magic damage resistance sources.

nethertoxin.affects: ABILITY: PassiveDAMAGE TYPE: PhysicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
nethertoxin.attrib:
BASE BONUS DAMAGE: 2.5 / 5 / 7.5 / 10
NON-HERO DAMAGE: 50% / 50% / 50% / 50%
MAX BONUS DAMAGE: 40 / 80 / 120 / 160
