nethertoxin.desc: Nethertoxin causes Viper's normal attack to deal bonus damage to units based on how much health they are missing.  The bonus damage doubles for each 20% of health missing from the target.  Nethertoxin deals half damage to creeps and buildings.
nethertoxin.lore: Poison from the Nether Reaches turns wounds into fatalities, and fatigue into death.

poison_attack.affects: ABILITY: Auto-Cast, Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
poison_attack.attrib:
DURATION: 2 / 2 / 2 / 2
DAMAGE PER SECOND: 10 / 16 / 22 / 28
MOVE SLOW: 10% / 20% / 30% / 40%
ATTACK SLOW: 10 / 20 / 30 / 40
poison_attack.desc: Intensifies Viper's venom, adding an effect to his normal attack that slows attack and movement speed while dealing damage over time.
poison_attack.lore: The Netherdrake's inborn toxic breath quickly drains the vitality of its afflicted.
poison_attack.notes: Successive casts don't increase slow or damage, but refresh the duration.

viper_strike.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
viper_strike.attrib:
DURATION: 5.1 / 5.1 / 5.1
DAMAGE PER SECOND: 60 / 100 / 145
MOVE SLOW: 40% / 60% / 80%
ATTACK SLOW: 40 / 60 / 80
SCEPTER MANA COST: 125 / 125 / 125
SCEPTER COOLDOWN: 12
SCEPTER CAST RANGE: 900
viper_strike.desc:
Viper slows the targeted enemy unit's movement and attack speed while also dealing poison damage over time.  The slowing effect reduces over the duration of the poison.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
viper_strike.lore: Once used to slay his sadistic summoner, the most powerful of Netherdrake infections spreads through the veins of those foolish enough to cross Viper.
viper_strike.notes: Slow works on spell immune units.Units afflicted by Viper Strike can be denied when their HP drops below 25%.

grave_chill.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
grave_chill.attrib:
DURATION: 3 / 4 / 5 / 6
MOVE SPEED DRAIN: 32% / 32% / 32% / 32%
ATTACK SPEED DRAIN: 64 / 64 / 64 / 64
grave_chill.desc: Visage drains the movement and attack speed of the targeted unit, gaining it for itself.
grave_chill.lore: The warmth of the sun is never felt in the dark cold of the Narrow Maze.
grave_chill.notes: The two buffs can be removed separately by purge.The speed gained is independent of the speed lost on the target.

gravekeepers_cloak.attrib:
ARMOR PER LAYER: 1 / 2 / 4 / 5
RESIST PER LAYER: 3% / 6% / 12% / 16%
MAX LAYERS: 4
LAYER RECOVERY TIME: 3
gravekeepers_cloak.desc: Visage generates a layered barrier that protects him from physical and magical attacks.  If he receives damage from a player, one layer is removed, and takes time to recover.
gravekeepers_cloak.lore: Visage's tough scales share equal properties of ghost and stone, making it nearly impervious to blade and magical assault.
gravekeepers_cloak.notes: Each time Visage receives damage greater than 15 that was not self-inflicted and was from a player owned source, a layer is removed.

soul_assumption.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
soul_assumption.attrib:
BASE DAMAGE: 20
DAMAGE PER CHARGE: 65
MAX CHARGES: 3 / 4 / 5 / 6
CHARGE DURATION: 6
GATHER DAMAGE THRESHOLD: 110
GATHER DAMAGE RADIUS: 1375
soul_assumption.desc: Visage gathers charges of soul essence each time nearby heroes take more than 110 damage. When the essence is released, it deals base damage as well as damage for each gathered soul charge.
soul_assumption.lore: The collected souls of the dead reach out to bring another into their fold.
soul_assumption.notes: Charges are only gained for damage greater than 2 and less than 3000 that is dealt by a player or Roshan.  Self-damage or Soul Assumption damage isn't counted.Soul Assumption cannot be disjointed.

summon_familiars.attrib:
FAMILIAR SPEED: 380 / 390 / 400
FAMILIAR MAX DAMAGE: 56 / 98 / 154
DAMAGE RECHARGE TIME: 15
ATTACKS TO DESTROY (HERO): 3
ATTACKS TO DESTROY (CREEP): 6
ATTACKS TO DESTROY (TOWER): 12
summon_familiars.desc:
Conjures two blind Familiars to fight for Visage.  Familiars have high attack power, but each attack drains a charge of damage that recharges slowly over time.  Familiars possess the Stone Form ability, that allows them to turn into stone, stunning enemies upon landing.  While in Stone Form, Familiars are invulnerable, and rapidly regenerate their health and damage.  Familiars grant high bounty when killed.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
summon_familiars.lore: Guardians of the Narrow Maze, Necro'lic's Familiars stand watch over his domain.
summon_familiars.notes: Casting Summon Familiars will replace any existing Familiars.Each Familiar starts with 7 damage charges. Familiars are Spell Immune.

fatal_bonds.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
fatal_bonds.desc: Binds several enemy units together, causing 25% of the damage dealt to one of them to be felt by the others.
fatal_bonds.lore: An ancient incantation that links the vital energies of multiple lifeforms into one collective body.
fatal_bonds.notes: Damage will not disable abilities or items like Blink Dagger which require player based damage.

rain_of_chaos.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
rain_of_chaos.attrib:
SUMMON BLAST RADIUS: 600
GOLEM HEALTH: 900 / 1200 / 1500
GOLEM DAMAGE: 75 / 100 / 125
GOLEM ARMOR: 6 / 9 / 12
GOLEM HEALTH REGEN: 25 / 50 / 75
SCEPTER NUMBER OF GOLEMS: 2
SCEPTER GOLEM HEALTH: 675 / 900 / 1125
SCEPTER GOLEM DAMAGE: 56 / 75 / 94
SCEPTER BOUNTY REDUCTION: 50%
rain_of_chaos.desc:
Summons a Golem from the depths, stunning enemies for one second. The Golem lives 60 seconds, takes reduced damage from spells, has Permanent Immolation and Flaming Fists on attack.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
rain_of_chaos.lore: Demnok unleashes the captive spirit in his Dreadwood staff, causing destruction in enemy ranks.
rain_of_chaos.notes: Spell Immune units will be stunned.This ability destroys trees in its area of effect.

shadow_word.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: HeroesDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
shadow_word.desc: Warlock whispers an incantation, healing a friendly unit or damaging an enemy unit over time.
shadow_word.lore: Demnok's arcane arts have a myriad of uses, allowing them to be powerful friendly enchantments or damaging curses.

upheaval.affects: ABILITY: Channeled, Point TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
upheaval.attrib:
RADIUS: 650 / 650 / 650 / 650
MAX SLOW CHANNEL: 12.5 / 6.5 / 4.5 / 3.5
MAX SLOW: 84%
upheaval.desc: CHANNELED - A powerful slowing current that grows stronger as it's channelled. Lasts up to 16 seconds.  Enemies are slowed for 3 seconds after leaving the area or the spell ends.
upheaval.lore: Demnok manipulates space-time, impairing entire armies.
upheaval.notes: The slow increase is based on length of the channel, not the duration an enemy was standing in the area.

geminate_attack.desc: Allows Weaver to dispatch two attacks at once.
geminate_attack.lore: Skitskurr's relationship with time is somewhat variable, causing his actions to be witnessed - and felt - more than once.
geminate_attack.notes: The second attack leaves Weaver 0.25 seconds after the first, and has no range limit.

shukuchi.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
shukuchi.desc: Weaver shifts out of visibility, gaining the ability to move at maximum speed through physical units--doing harm to any enemies it passes through.
shukuchi.lore: As the Weavers worked in the fabric of creation, small wormholes allowed them to slip through time to better work their craft.
shukuchi.notes: Can only damage the same unit once per cast.

the_swarm.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: PhysicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
the_swarm.attrib:
ATTACK DAMAGE: 20
ATTACK FREQUENCY: 1.25 / 1.1 / 0.95 / 0.8
COUNT: 12 / 12 / 12 / 12
ARMOR REDUCTION: 1 / 1 / 1 / 1
DURATION: 16
ATTACKS TO DESTROY: 8 / 8 / 8 / 8
the_swarm.desc: Weaver launches a swarm of 12 young Weavers that latch on any enemy unit in their path, attacking and reducing armor until it is killed.
the_swarm.lore: Skitskurr opens a gap in the space time fabric, allowing young Weavers to slip through and aid him in combat.
the_swarm.notes: When a beetle latches on a target, it will remain there until it is killed or the duration expires.Beetles are Spell Immune, but can be killed in 4 attacks from a hero, or 8 from other units.Beetles provide 321/321 sight, but will drop off their target if it becomes invisible.

time_lapse.attrib:
SCEPTER COOLDOWN: 16
SCEPTER ALLY CAST RANGE: 1000
time_lapse.desc:
Weaver warps backward to whatever position it was in five seconds earlier--regaining the HP and mana from that time. No effect on cooldown, gold or experience.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
time_lapse.lore: If Skitskurr does not deem the current reality of the world to fit his desires, he simply crawls back in time to right what was wronged.
time_lapse.notes: Removes most negative buffs from Weaver.Time Lapse disjoints projectiles.

focusfire.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
focusfire.attrib:
BONUS ATTACK SPEED: 500
DAMAGE REDUCTION: 50% / 40% / 30%
DURATION: 20
SCEPTER COOLDOWN: 15 / 15 / 15
SCEPTER DAMAGE REDUCTION: 30% / 15% / -0%
focusfire.desc:
Windranger channels the wind to gain 500 additional attack speed against a single enemy unit or structure, though with a reduction to her attack damage.  Extra damage from secondary item effects is not reduced.  Lasts 20 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
focusfire.lore: Lyralei's ability to bombard opponents with a flurry of arrows is unparalleled - even at the expense of accuracy.
focusfire.notes: Can target buildings and Spell Immune units.

powershot.affects: ABILITY: Channeled, Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
powershot.desc: Windranger charges her bow for up to 1 second for a single powerful shot, which deals more damage the longer it is charged. The arrow damages enemies and destroys trees along its path. For each enemy that Powershot hits, its damage is reduced by 10%.
powershot.lore: During her early years of training, Lyralei learned to fire powerful arrows that cleaved even trees to reach their targets.
powershot.notes: Powershot will destroy trees in its area of effect.

shackleshot.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
shackleshot.desc: Shackles the target to an enemy unit or tree in a line directly behind it.  If no unit or tree is present, the stun duration is reduced to 0.75.
shackleshot.lore: Windranger's variety of bow skills includes an arrow with thick ropes attached to encumber any escaping target.
shackleshot.notes: This spell can shackle two enemies together, stunning them both.Can shackle the target to an enemy unit or tree at most 525/500 behind it.Shackleshot can be disjointed.

windrun.affects: ABILITY: No TargetPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
windrun.attrib:
MOVE SPEED BONUS: 50% / 50% / 50% / 50%
EVASION: 100%
ENEMY SLOW: 8% / 16% / 24% / 30%
ENEMY SLOW RADIUS: 300 / 300 / 300 / 300
DURATION: 3 / 4 / 5 / 6
windrun.desc: Increases movement speed and adds evasion from all physical attacks, while slowing movement of nearby enemies.
windrun.lore: Lyralei enchants gusts of winds to fight incoming attacks.
windrun.notes: The slow will affect enemies with spell immunity.Activating Windrun will evade incoming projectiles.

arctic_burn.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
arctic_burn.attrib:
FLIGHT DURATION: 6
BONUS ATTACK RANGE: 275 / 375 / 475 / 575
HEALTH BURN: 8%
BURN DURATION: 5
MOVEMENT SLOW: 19% / 26% / 33% / 40%
ADDED NIGHT VISION RANGE: 400
SCEPTER MANA PER SECOND: 40
arctic_burn.desc:
Winter Wyvern soars upon an arctic wind, granting her unobstructed movement and allowing her to exhale a blistering chill into each attack. While soaring, her attacks travel further and faster, and slow enemies with a magical freeze that strips them of 8% of their current health each second. Her sight is also hardened against night's chill, granting her 400 additional vision range at night while soaring.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
arctic_burn.lore: The same organ where some dragons stoke their inner flame is, in Auroth, a crucible of unimaginable cold. From deep within her frosty gullet, an exhalation sends enemies into burning agony.
arctic_burn.notes: Enemy units can only receive the Arctic Burn debuff once per cast.This ability does not affect Roshan.Reduces Winter Wyvern's attack point to 0.1.

cold_embrace.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Allied UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
cold_embrace.attrib:
DURATION: 4
BASE HEALTH REGEN: 20
MAX HEALTH REGEN: 3% / 4% / 5% / 6%
cold_embrace.desc: Encases an ally in an icy cocoon, freezing them solid while healing a base amount as well as a percentage of their maximum health each second. The cocoon blocks all physical damage.
cold_embrace.lore: From winter's heart comes a cold, healing embrace. The ice slows the blood and allows the spell to better work its curative magic.

splinter_blast.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
splinter_blast.attrib:
SHATTER RADIUS: 500
MOVEMENT SLOW: 25%
SLOW DURATION: 4
splinter_blast.desc: Launches a ball of brittle ice toward an enemy. The ice shatters on impact, leaving the primary target completely unaffected, while hurling damaging splinters into nearby enemies in a 500 radius. Enemies struck by these splinters are slowed by 25%.
splinter_blast.lore: Produced slowly by specialized vesicles in her frozen gullet, Winter Wyvern blast shards of ice at her enemies.
splinter_blast.notes: The primary projectile moves at 500 movespeed, or reaches the target in 1 second, whichever is faster up to 4000 speed.Neither the primary or secondary projectiles can be disjointed.

winters_curse.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
winters_curse.attrib:
CURSE RADIUS: 500
CURSE DAMAGE REDUCTION: 100%
CURSE ATTACK SPEED: 70
CURSE DURATION: 3.25 / 4 / 4.75
winters_curse.desc: Winter Wyvern freezes an enemy in place while striking those nearby with a maddening curse which causes them to attack their frozen ally with increased attack speed. The frozen ally and those cursed to attack their ally are immune to all damage from their enemies.
winters_curse.lore: The oldest of the bookwurm’s spells, this curse lends truth to the old saw: sometimes the enemy of my enemy is my enemy still.
winters_curse.notes: If the target dies to its allies, Winter Wyvern will receive credit for the kill.Will only pierce the spell immunity of the primary target, not the target's surrounding allies.

overcharge.attrib:
ATTACK SPEED: 40 / 50 / 60 / 70
INCOMING DAMAGE REDUCTION: 5% / 10% / 15% / 20%
HEALTH/MANA DRAIN: 4.5% / 4.5% / 4.5% / 4.5%
overcharge.desc: Io gains bonus attack speed and damage reduction, at the cost of draining a percentage of its current health and mana per second.  If Io is Tethered to an ally, that unit also gains the bonuses.
overcharge.lore: Drawing on the energy of matter from all worlds, Io begins the unravelling of time.
overcharge.notes: Io's tethered unit will also benefit from the attack speed and reduction, but only Io pays the drain in HP and mana.

relocate.desc: Teleports Io and any tethered ally to any location. After the spell expires Io and any tethered ally will return to their original location. Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.
relocate.lore: Io is the embodiment of the mystery of the universe.
relocate.notes: Enemies receive a visual indicator in the world and on the minimap of the target location during the cast delay.If Io is disabled during the cast delay, Relocate is cancelled.If an allied hero is Tethered, that hero will teleported along with you. You can break the tether at any time to prevent that hero from teleporting with you.

spirits.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
spirits.attrib:
CREEP DAMAGE: 8 / 14 / 20 / 26
HERO DAMAGE: 25 / 50 / 75 / 100
OSCILLATION RADIUS: 875 / 875 / 875 / 875
EXPLOSION RADIUS: 300 / 300 / 300 / 300
DURATION: 19 / 19 / 19 / 19
spirits.desc: Summon five particle spirits that dance in a circle around Io. If a particle collides with an enemy hero, it explodes, damaging all enemy units in an area around it.  Creeps take minor damage from touching a particle spirit, but do not cause them to explode.  When its duration ends, any remaining Spirits explode.
spirits.lore: Io twists the particles of the universe with its unimaginable capabilities.

spirits_in.desc: Calls the spirits closer to you. Can be toggled on and off.

spirits_out.desc: Sends the spirits farther away from you. Can be toggled on and off.

tether.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: AlliesPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
tether.attrib:
MAX TETHER DISTANCE: 900 / 900 / 900 / 900
MOVEMENT SPEED BONUS: 14% / 15% / 16% / 17%
TETHER DURATION: 12 / 12 / 12 / 12
ENEMY MOVEMENT SLOW: 100%
ENEMY ATTACK SLOW: 100
ENEMY SLOW DURATION: 0.75 / 1.25 / 1.75 / 2.25
tether.desc: Tethers Io to an allied unit, granting bonus movement speed to both. When Io restores health or mana, tethered units target gain 1.5x the amount. Any enemy unit that crosses the tether is slowed. The tether breaks when the allied unit moves too far away, or Io cancels the tether.
tether.lore: The benevolent touch of Io brings strength from between the planes.
tether.notes: If you try to tether a unit that is 700 distance or further away from Io, he will latch on and pull himself closer to the tethered unit (to a distance of 300).The tethered unit will heal 50% faster.

tether_break.desc: Break the link to the tethered unit.

death_ward.affects: ABILITY: Channeled, Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: PhysicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
death_ward.desc:
CHANNELED - Summons a deadly ward to attack enemy heroes within 700 range. Lasts a maximum of 8 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
death_ward.lore: Witch Doctor performs a ritualistic dance, one that haunts the dreams of those who live to recount it.
death_ward.notes: The Death Ward is invulnerable, and is only destroyed if Witch Doctor is interrupted or its duration expires.The Death Ward can be controlled, and made to attack a specific target.Death Ward attacks once every 0.22 seconds.

maledict.affects: ABILITY: Point TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
maledict.attrib:
RADIUS: 180
DURATION: 12
LOST HEALTH BURST DAMAGE: 16% / 24% / 32% / 40%
maledict.desc: Curses all enemy Heroes in a small area, causing them to take a set amount of damage each second, as well as bursts of damage every 4 seconds based on how much health they have lost since the curse began.
maledict.lore: Certain voodoo magics can make an enemy regret engaging the Witch Doctor.
maledict.notes: If an affected hero's health has increased above the amount they had when Maledict was cast, the burst damage will be 0.

paralyzing_cask.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
paralyzing_cask.attrib:
HERO STUN DURATION: 1 / 1 / 1 / 1
CREEP STUN DURATION: 5 / 5 / 5 / 5
HERO DAMAGE: 50 / 50 / 50 / 50
BOUNCES: 2 / 4 / 6 / 8
paralyzing_cask.desc: Launches a cask of paralyzing powder that ricochets between enemy units, stunning and damaging those it hits.
paralyzing_cask.lore: The Witch Doctor recycles the bones of fallen friends and foes, using the powder as part of his arsenal of charms and alchemy.
paralyzing_cask.notes: Targets can be hit multiple times, as long as another unit is struck in between the bounces.

voodoo_restoration.desc: Witch Doctor focuses his magic to heal nearby allied units.
voodoo_restoration.lore: Zharvakko's hocus pocus is not limited only to hexxing his opponents and is quite adept at curing ailments.
voodoo_restoration.notes: Healing is done in 0.33 second intervals.Can heal Spell Immune units.

arc_lightning.affects: ABILITY: Unit TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
arc_lightning.desc: Hurls a bolt of lightning that leaps through nearby enemy units.
arc_lightning.lore: Arc Lightning is Zeus' favorite spell to use against puny mortals.

lightning_bolt.affects: ABILITY: Unit Target, Point TargetAFFECTS: Enemy UnitsDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
lightning_bolt.desc: Calls down a bolt of lightning to strike an enemy unit, causing damage and a mini-stun. When cast, Lightning Bolt briefly provides unobstructed vision and True Sight around the target in a 750 radius. Can be cast on the ground, affecting the closest enemy hero in 325 range.
lightning_bolt.lore: A shocking punishment for rebellious heathen.
lightning_bolt.notes: You can interrupt channeling spells and items with this ability.

static_field.affects: ABILITY: PassiveDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
static_field.desc: Zeus shocks all nearby enemy units whenever he casts a spell, causing damage proportional to their current health.
static_field.lore: The air crackles with static when the Thundergod walks the world.
static_field.notes: The damage from Static Field is dealt before the damage from the used spell.Using items doesn't trigger Static Field.Does not require unit visibility to take effect.

thundergods_wrath.affects: ABILITY: No TargetDAMAGE TYPE: MagicalPIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
thundergods_wrath.attrib:
TRUE SIGHT RADIUS: 500
DURATION: 3 / 3 / 3 / 3
DAMAGE: 225 / 325 / 425
SCEPTER DAMAGE: 440 / 540 / 640
thundergods_wrath.desc:
Strikes all enemy heroes with a bolt of lightning, no matter where they may be.  Thundergod's Wrath also provides True Sight around each hero struck.  If an enemy hero is invisible, it takes no damage, but the True Sight is still created at that hero's location.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
thundergods_wrath.lore: The Lord of Heaven smites all who oppose him, near or far.
